enchantsData.name: Weapon - Elemental Force
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes inflict 3,000 additional Elemental damage when dealing damage with spells and melee attacks. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Weapon - Windsong
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes increase your critical strike, haste, or mastery by 1,500 for 12 sec when dealing damage or healing with spells and melee attacks. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Weapon - Colossus
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to make your damaging melee strikes sometimes activate a Mogu protection spell, absorbing up to 7,500 damage. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Weapon - Jade Spirit
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes increase your Intellect by 1,650 when healing or dealing damage with spells. If less than 25% of your mana remains when the effect is triggered, your Spirit will also increase by 750. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Weapon - Dancing Steel
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes increase your Strength or Agility by 1,650 when dealing melee damage. Your highest stat is always chosen. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Weapon - River's Song
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes increase your dodge by 1,650 for 7 sec when dealing melee damage. Requires a level 372 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Angerhide Leg Armor
enchantsData.use: Permanently attach armor onto pants to increase Strength by 285 and critical strike by 165.

enchantsData.name: Ironscale Leg Armor
enchantsData.use: Permanently attach armor onto pants to increase Stamina by 430 and dodge by 165.

enchantsData.name: Shadowleather Leg Armor
enchantsData.use: Permanently attach armor onto pants to increase Agility by 285 and critical strike by 165.

enchantsData.name: Greater Pearlescent Spellthread
enchantsData.use: Permanently embroiders spellthread into pants, increasing Intellect by 285 and Spirit by 165.

enchantsData.name: Greater Cerulean Spellthread
enchantsData.use: Permanently embroiders spellthread into pants, increasing Intellect by 285 and critical strike by 165.

enchantsData.name: Greater Crane Wing Inscription
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 200 Intellect and 100 critical strike to a shoulder slot item.

enchantsData.name: Greater Ox Horn Inscription
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 300 Stamina and 100 Dodge to a shoulder slot item.

enchantsData.name: Greater Tiger Claw Inscription
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 200 Agility and 100 critical strike to a shoulder slot item.

enchantsData.name: Greater Tiger Fang Inscription
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 200 Strength and 100 critical strike to a shoulder slot item.

enchantsData.name: Lord Blastington's Scope of Doom
enchantsData.use: Permanently attaches Lord Blastington's special scope to a ranged weapon, sometimes increasing Agility by 1800 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Razorice
enchantsData.description: Affixes your weapon with a rune that causes 2% extra weapon damage as Frost damage and increases enemies' vulnerability to your Frost attacks. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Spellshattering
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that deflects 4% of all spell damage and reduces the duration of Silence effects by 50%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Swordshattering
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that increases Parry chance by 4% and reduces the duration of Disarm effects by 50%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that has a chance to heal you for 3% and increase total Strength by 15% for 15 sec. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Cinderglacier
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that has a chance to increase the damage by 20% for your next 2 attacks that deal Frost or Shadow damage.  Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that increases Armor by 4% and total Stamina by 2%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Great Banquet of the Oven
enchantsData.use: Restores 300000 health and 300000 mana over 20 sec. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 250 in a stat for 1 hour. May benefit some more than others.

enchantsData.name: Mogu Fish Stew
enchantsData.use: Restores 300000 health and 300000 mana over 20 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 300 Intellect for 1 hour.

enchantsData.name: Spiced Blossom Soup
enchantsData.use: Restores 300000 health and 300000 mana over 20 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 300 Intellect for 1 hour.

enchantsData.use: Increases Stamina by 1500 for 1 hour. Counts as both a Battle and Guardian elixir. This effect persists through death.

enchantsData.use: Increases Strength by 1000 for 1 hour. Counts as both a Battle and Guardian elixir. This effect persists through death.

enchantsData.name: Flask of the Warm Sun

enchantsData.use: Increases your Agility by 4000 for 25 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Potion of the Jade Serpent
enchantsData.use: Increases your Intellect by 4000 for 25 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Potion of Mogu Power
enchantsData.use: Increases your Strength by 4000 for 25 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Potion of the Mountains
enchantsData.use: Increases armor by 12000 for 25 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Master Mana Potion
enchantsData.use: Restores 28500 to 31500 mana. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Potion of Focus
enchantsData.use: Puts the imbiber in an elevated state of focus where they can restore up to 45000 mana over 10 sec, but they are defenseless until their focus is broken. (1 Min Cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Synapse Springs
enchantsData.description: Permanently attaches synapse springs to your gloves, allowing you to increase your highest primary statistic by 1920 for 10 sec. The gloves can be activated every minute.

enchantsData.name: Fur Lining - Stamina
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchant your bracers to increase Stamina by 750.

enchantsData.name: Nitro Boosts
enchantsData.use:
Permanently attaches overpowered nitro boosts to your belt, allowing you to greatly increase run speed for 5 sec. They rarely explode violently, so don't worry about that.

The nitro boosts can only be activated every 3 minutes and require an Engineering skill of at least 400.

enchantsData.name: Phase Fingers
enchantsData.description: Permanently attaches lightweight transfluxers onto gloves, allowing you to partially phase and increase dodge for 10 sec. Gloves can only be activated once every minute.

enchantsData.name: Lightweave Embroidery
enchantsData.description: Embroiders a subtle pattern of light into your cloak, giving you a chance to increase your Intellect by 2000 for 15 sec when casting a spell.

enchantsData.name: Swordguard Embroidery
enchantsData.description: Embroiders a magical pattern into your cloak, causing your damaging melee and ranged attacks to sometimes increase your attack power by 4000 for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lifeblood
abilitiesData.description: Uses your skill in Herbalism to absorb energy and nutrients from the earth, instantly healing minor wounds and granting 480 haste rating for 20 sec. Can be used while stealthed or invisible.

abilitiesData.name: Moonkin Form
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing Arcane and Nature damage you deal by 10% and increasing your armor by 60%.
extra: While in this form, you increase the spell haste of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 5%.
The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of movement impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Earth and Moon
abilitiesData.description: Your Wrath, Starfire and Wild Mushroom: Detonate spells apply the Earth and Moon effect, which increases spell damage taken by 8% for 15 sec. Also increases your spell damage by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Mark of the Wild
abilitiesData.description: Increases the friendly target's Strength, Agility, and Intellect by 5% for 1 hour. If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Innervate
abilitiesData.description: Causes the target to regenerate 5% of maximum mana over 10 sec.  If cast on self, the caster will regenerate an additional 15% of maximum mana over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rebirth
abilitiesData.description: Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with 20% health and 20% mana.

abilitiesData.name: Lunar Eclipse
abilitiesData.description: When you reach 100 Lunar Energy you will trigger a Lunar Eclipse, increasing all Arcane damage done by 15% and transforming your Hurricane spell into Astral Storm.
extra: When triggered, both Lunar and Solar Eclipse grant 15% spell haste for 15 sec and energize you for 50% of your maximum mana.

abilitiesData.name: Solar Eclipse-boomy
abilitiesData.description: When you reach 100 Solar Energy you will trigger a Solar Eclipse, increasing all Nature damage done by 15%.
extra: When triggered, both Lunar and Solar Eclipse grant 15% spell haste for 15 sec and energize you for 50% of your maximum mana.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Mushroom
abilitiesData.description:
Grow magical mushrooms with 5 health at the target location.
After 6 sec, the mushrooms will become invisible.
Other Wild Mushroom abilities can target these mushrooms for additional effects.
Only 3 mushrooms can be placed at one time.
extra: Use Wild Mushroom: Detonate to detonate all Mushrooms.

abilitiesData.name: Shooting Star
abilitiesData.description: You have a 4% chance when you deal damage with your Moonfire or Insect Swarm to instantly reset the cooldown of your Starsurge and reduce its cast time by 100%. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Insect Swarm
abilitiesData.description: The enemy target is swarmed by insects, causing Nature damage over 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Moonfire
abilitiesData.description: Burns the enemy for Arcane damage and then an additional Arcane damage over 14 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Grace
abilitiesData.description: You gain 15% spell haste after you cast Moonfire, Regrowth, or Insect Swarm, lasting 15 sec. This effect has a 1 minute cooldown. When you gain Lunar or Solar Eclipse, the cooldown of Nature's Grace is instantly reset.

abilitiesData.name: Sunfire
abilitiesData.description: Burns the enemy for Nature damage and then additional Nature damage over 14 sec. Your Wrath and Starsurge critical strikes on the target will extend your Sunfire's duration by 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Starsurge
abilitiesData.description: You fuse the power of the moon and sun, launching a devastating blast of energy at the target. Causes Spellstorm damage to the target and generates 20 Lunar or Solar energy, whichever is more beneficial to you.

abilitiesData.name: Wrath-cata
abilitiesData.description: Causes Nature damage to the target.

abilitiesData.name: Starfire
abilitiesData.description: Causes Arcane damage to the target.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Mushroom: Detonate
abilitiesData.description: Detonates all of your Wild Mushrooms, dealing Nature damage to all nearby targets within 8 yards, and creating a Fungal Growth in each mushroom's wake covering an area within 8 yards, slowing all enemy targets by 50%, and lasting 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Starfall
abilitiesData.description: You summon a flurry of stars from the sky on targets afflicted by your Moonfire or Sunfire within 40 yards of the caster that you're in combat with, each dealing 635 Arcane damage. Maximum 20 stars. Lasts 10 sec. Triggering a Lunar Eclipse resets the cooldown of this spell.
extra: Shapeshifting into an animal form or mounting cancels the effect. Any effect which causes you to lose control of your character will suppress the Starfall effect.

abilitiesData.name: Typhoon
abilitiesData.description: Summons a violent Typhoon that strikes targets in front of the caster within 30 yards, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Hurricane
abilitiesData.description: Creates a violent storm in the target area causing Nature damage to enemies every 1 sec. Lasts 10 sec. Druid must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Perseverance
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Furor
abilitiesData.description: Grants you a 100% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear Form, allows you to keep up to 100 of your Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form, and increases your maximum mana by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Furor R2
abilitiesData.description: Grants you a 66% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear Form, allows you to keep up to 66 of your Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form, and increases your maximum mana by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Fungal Growth
abilitiesData.description: When your Treants die or your Wild Mushrooms are triggered, you spawn a Fungal Growth at its wake covering the area within 8 yards, slowing all enemy targets by 50%. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Viciousness
abilitiesData.description: Increases critical strike chance by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Berserking
abilitiesData.description: Increases your attack and casting speed by 20% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Beast Slaying
abilitiesData.description: Damage dealt versus Beasts increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Leader of the Pack
abilitiesData.description: While in Bear Form or Cat Form, increases critical strike chance of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 5%.
extra: Also causes your melee critical strikes to heal you for 4% of your health and energize you for 8% of your mana. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mangle (Cat)
abilitiesData.description: Mangle the target for 500% normal damage. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Faerie Fire
abilitiesData.description: Faeries surround the target, preventing it from stealthing or turning invisible, and causing 3 applications of the Weakened Armor debuff.
extra: Deals damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle when cast from Bear Form.
Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Savage Roar
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that increases physical damage done by 40%. Only effective in Cat Form. Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point : 18 seconds
2 points: 24 seconds
3 points: 30 seconds
4 points: 36 seconds
5 points: 42 seconds

abilitiesData.name: Rip
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time.  Damage increases per combo point and by your attack power:
extra: 1 point: X damage over 16 sec.
2 points: X damage over 16 sec.
3 points: X damage over 16 sec.
4 points: X damage over 16 sec.
5 points: X damage over 16 sec.
Each time you Shred, Ravage, or Mangle the target while in Cat Form the duration of your Rip on that target is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rake
abilitiesData.description: Rake the target for bleed damage and an additional damage over 15 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Ferocious Bite
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage per combo point and consumes up to 25 additional Energy to increase damage by up to 100%. When used on targets below 25% health, Ferocious Bite will also refresh the duration of your Rip on your target. Critical strike chance increased by 35% against bleeding targets.
extra: 1 point: X damage
2 points: X damage
3 points: X damage
4 points X damage
5 points: X damage

abilitiesData.name: Primal Fury
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a 100% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear Form and your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Charge (Cat)
abilitiesData.description: Causes you to leap behind an enemy, dazing them for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Charge
abilitiesData.description: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing them for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shred
abilitiesData.description: Shred the target, causing 500% damage to the target. Must be behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.
extra: Deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

abilitiesData.name: Ravage
abilitiesData.description: Ravage the target, causing 950% damage to the target. Must be prowling and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.
extra: Ravage has a 50% increased chance to critically strike targets with over 80% health.

abilitiesData.name: Stampede-v2
abilitiesData.description: Summons all of your pets to fight your current target for 20 sec. Your pets deal 25% of their normal damage in Arenas and Battlegrounds while summoned this way.

abilitiesData.name: Tiger's Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases physical damage done by 15% for 6 sec and instantly restores 60 Energy. Cannot be activated while Berserk (Cat) is active. Only useable in Cat Form.

abilitiesData.name: King of the Jungle
abilitiesData.description: While using your Enrage ability in Bear Form, your damage is increased by 15%, and your Tiger's Fury ability also instantly restores 60 Energy.

abilitiesData.name: Berserk
abilitiesData.description: When used in Bear Form, removes the cooldown from Mangle and causes it to hit up to 3 targets and lasts 10 sec.
extra: When used in Cat Form, reduces the cost of all Cat Form abilities by 50% and lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Blood in the Water
abilitiesData.description: When you Ferocious Bite a target at or below 25% health, you have a 100% chance to instantly refresh the duration of your Rip on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Swipe (Cat)
abilitiesData.description: Swipe nearby enemies, inflicting 711% weapon damage.

abilitiesData.name: Mangle (Bear)
abilitiesData.description: Mangle the target for 280% weapon damage and generate 5 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Infected Wounds
abilitiesData.description: Your Shred, Ravage, Maul, and Mangle attacks cause an Infected Wound in the target. The Infected Wound reduces the movement speed of the target by 50% and the attack speed by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Roar
abilitiesData.description: The Druid roars, reducing the physical damage caused by all enemies within 10 yards by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Thrash
abilitiesData.description: Strikes all enemy targets within 8 yards, dealing  bleed damage and an additional damage over 15 sec, and also causing the Weakened Blows effect.
extra: Weakened Blows: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Swipe (Bear)
abilitiesData.description: Swipe nearby enemies, inflicting damage. Damage increased by attack power.

abilitiesData.name: Cat Form
abilitiesData.description:
Shapeshift into Cat Form, causing agility to increase attack power. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various cat abilities.
Each time Thrash hits, it has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle.

abilitiesData.name: Lacerate
abilitiesData.description: Lacerates the enemy target, dealing bleed damage and additional damage over 15 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.
extra: Each time Lacerate hits, it has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle.

abilitiesData.name: Enrage
abilitiesData.description: Generates 20 Rage, and then generates an additional 10 Rage over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Maul
abilitiesData.description: Maul the target for 110% weapon damage. Deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

abilitiesData.name: Pulverize
abilitiesData.description: Deals 60% weapon damage plus additional damage for each of your Lacerate applications on the target, and increases your melee critical strike chance by 3% for each Lacerate application consumed for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Barkskin
abilitiesData.description: The Druid's skin becomes as tough as bark. All damage taken is reduced by 20%. While protected, damaging attacks will not cause spellcasting delays. This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep. Usable in all forms. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Survival Instincts
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 50% for 12 sec. Only usable while in Bear Form or Cat Form.

abilitiesData.name: Frenzied Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Instantly converts up to 60 Rage into up to X health.

abilitiesData.name: Endurance
abilitiesData.description: Base Health increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Aggression
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 10% and causes Faerie Fire (Feral) to apply 3 stacks of the Faerie Fire effect when cast.

abilitiesData.name: Brutal Impact
abilitiesData.description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 1 sec, decreases the cooldown of Bash by 10 sec, decreases the cooldown of Skull Bash by 50 sec, and causes victims of your Skull Bash ability to have 10% increased mana cost for their spells for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Primal Madness
abilitiesData.description: Tiger's Fury and Berserk also increase your current and maximum Energy by 20 during their durations, and your Enrage and Berserk abilities instantly generate 12 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Revitalize
abilitiesData.description: When you periodically heal with your Rejuvenation or Lifebloom spells, you have a 20% chance to instantly regenerate 2% of your total mana. This effect cannot occur more than once every 12 sec. In addition, you also grant Replenishment when you cast or refresh Lifebloom.
extra: Replenishment - Grants up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 10 sec. Lasts for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rejuvenation
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target for every 3 sec for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Growth
abilitiesData.description: Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 30 yards of the target over 7 sec. Prioritizes healing most injured party members. The amount healed is applied quickly at first, and slows down as the Wild Growth reaches its full duration.

abilitiesData.name: Efflorescence
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals a friendly target that has an active Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect, and restores health to the three most injured allies within 10 yards of the initial target every 2 sec for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mastery: Harmony
abilitiesData.description: Your direct healing is increased by an additional 10% and casting your direct healing spells grants you an additional 10% bonus to periodic healing for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lifebloom
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed.
extra: Duration refreshed each time you cast Healing Touch, Nourish, or Regrowth on the target.
This effect can stack up to 3 times on the same target. Lifebloom can be active only on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Malfurion's Gift
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you heal with your Lifebloom spell, you have a 4% chance to cause Omen of Clarity.
extra: In addition, the cooldown of your Tranquility is reduced by 5 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Touch
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Regrowth
abilitiesData.description: Heals an ally, then heals additional damage every 3 sec. for 21 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nourish
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target. Heals for an additional 20% if you have a Rejuvenation, Regrowth, Lifebloom, or Wild Growth effect active on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Empowered Touch
abilitiesData.description: Increases the direct healing done by your Healing Touch, Regrowth and Nourish spells by 10%, and grants those spells a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Lifebloom on targets.

abilitiesData.name: Swiftmend
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals a friendly target that has an active Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect.
extra: In addition, restores health to the three most injured allies within 10 yards of the initial target every 2 sec for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Swiftness
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Cyclone, Entangling Roots, Healing Touch, Hibernate, Nourish, Rebirth, or Regrowth becomes instant, free, and castable in all forms.  The healing and duration of the spell is increased by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Bounty
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 60%.
extra: In addition, when you have Rejuvenation active on three or more targets, the cast time of your Nourish spell is reduced by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Omen of Clarity
abilitiesData.description: Your autoattacks have a small chance to cause you to enter a Clearcasting state.
extra: The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next cast-time damaging or healing spell or offensive feral ability by 100%.

abilitiesData.name: Tranquility
abilitiesData.description: Heals 5 nearby lowest health party or raid targets within 40 yards with Tranquility every 2 sec for 8 sec.
extra: Tranquility heals every 2 sec over 8 sec. Stacks up to 3 times. The Druid must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Tree of Life
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into the tree of life, increasing healing done by 15% and increasing your armor by 15%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects. In addition, some of your spells are temporarily enhanced while shapeshifted. Lasts 25 sec.
extra: Enhanced spells: Lifebloom, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, Wrath

abilitiesData.name: Genesis-mop
abilitiesData.description: Targets all party or raid members within 60 yards and accelerates the caster's Rejuvenation effects, causing them to heal and expire at 400% of the normal rate.

abilitiesData.name: Moonglow
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your damage and healing spells by 9%.

abilitiesData.name: Ferocious Inspiration
abilitiesData.description: All party and raid members have all damage increased by 3% within 100 yards of your pet.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodlust
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee, ranged, and spell haste by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.
extra: Allies receiving this effect will become Sated and be unable to benefit from Bloodlust or Time Warp again for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Embrace of the Shale Spider
abilitiesData.description: Fills all friendly party and raid members with the Shale Spider's embrace, increasing Strength, Agility, and Intellect by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Embrace of the Shale Spider (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Fills all friendly party and raid members with the Shale Spider's embrace, increasing Strength, Agility, and Intellect by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Kings
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing Strength, Agility, and Intellect by 5%.
extra: If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Focus Fire
abilitiesData.description: Consumes your pet's Frenzy Effect stack, restoring 6 Focus to your pet and increasing your ranged haste by 6% for each Frenzy Effect stack consumed. Lasts for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Kill Command
abilitiesData.description: Give the command to kill, causing your pet to instantly inflict damage to its target and apply the Hunter's Mark effect.
extra: The pet must be in combat and within 25 yards of the target to Kill Command.

abilitiesData.name: Aspect of the Hawk
abilitiesData.description: The Hunter takes on the aspects of a hawk, increasing ranged attack power. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Hunter's Mark
abilitiesData.description: Places the Hunter's Mark on the target, increasing the ranged damage of all attackers against that target by 5%. The target can always be seen and tracked by the Hunter.
extra: Arcane Shot, Chimera Shot, Kill Command, and Explosive Shot automatically apply Hunter's Mark.
Lasts for 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Bestial Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Send your pet into a rage, causing 20% additional damage for 10 sec and breaking all effects which cause loss of control of your pet.

abilitiesData.name: Serpent Sting
abilitiesData.description: Causes Nature damage over 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Shot
abilitiesData.description: An instant shot that causes 125% weapon damage plus extra damage as Arcane damage.

abilitiesData.name: Rapid Fire
abilitiesData.description: Increases ranged attack speed by 40% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Call of the Wild
abilitiesData.description: Your pet roars, increasing your pet's and your melee and ranged attack power by 10%. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cobra Shot
abilitiesData.description: Deals weapon damage in the form of Nature damage and increases the duration of your Serpent Sting on the target by 6 sec. Generates 14 Focus.
extra: Useable while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Kill Shot
abilitiesData.description: You attempt to finish the wounded target off, firing a long range attack dealing 420% weapon damage. Kill Shot can only be used on enemies that have 20% or less health.
extra: If Kill Shot fails to kill the target, the cooldown is instantly reset, but cannot be reset more often than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frenzy
abilitiesData.description: Your pet gains 6% attack speed after attacking with a Basic Attack, lasting for 10 sec and stacking up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Aspect of the Fox
abilitiesData.description: The Hunter takes on the aspects of a fox, allowing him to shoot Steady Shot and Cobra Shot while moving and causing him to gain 2 Focus whenever he receives a melee attack.

abilitiesData.name: Explosive Trap
abilitiesData.description: Launch a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing Fire damage and burning all enemies for additional Fire damage over 20 sec to all within 10 yards. Trap will exist for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Multi-Shot
abilitiesData.description: Fires several missiles, hitting your current target and all enemies within 8 yards of that target for 60% of weapon damage.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Presence
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to hit with all spells and attacks by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Gun Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Your chance to critically hit with Guns is increased by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Command
abilitiesData.description: Damage dealt by pets increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell power or attack power. Lasts 15 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Bow Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Your chance to critically hit with Bows is increased by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Time is Money
abilitiesData.description: Cash in on a 1% increased attack and casting speed.

abilitiesData.name: Rocket Barrage
abilitiesData.description: Launches your belt rockets at an enemy dealing fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Torrent
abilitiesData.description: Silence all enemies within 8 yards for 2 sec and restores 6% of your Mana, or 15 Energy, or 15 Runic Power, or 15 Focus. Non-player victim spellcasting is also interrupted for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Trueshot Aura
abilitiesData.description: Grants 10% increased melee and ranged attack power to all party and raid members within 100 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Steady Shot
abilitiesData.description: When you Steady Shot twice in a row, your ranged attack speed will be increased by 15% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Chimera Shot
abilitiesData.description: An instant shot that causes 265% ranged weapon Nature damage, refreshing the duration of your Serpent Sting and healing you for 5% of your total health. Applies the Hunter's Mark effect.

abilitiesData.name: Master Marksman
abilitiesData.description: You have a 50% chance when you Steady Shot to gain the Master Marksman effect, lasting 30 sec. After reaching 3 stacks, your next Aimed Shot's cast time and Focus cost are reduced by 100% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Careful Aim
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Steady Shot and Aimed Shot by 75% on targets who are above 80% health.

abilitiesData.name: Misdirection
abilitiesData.description: The current party or raid member targeted will receive the threat caused by your next damaging attack and all actions taken for 4 sec afterwards.  Transferred threat is not permanent, and will fade after 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Readiness
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on all Hunter abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Steady Shot
abilitiesData.description: A steady shot that causes 66% weapon damage. Generates 14 Focus.
extra: Useable while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Aimed Shot
abilitiesData.description: A powerful aimed shot that deals 450% ranged weapon damage plus .

abilitiesData.name: Rapid Killing R1
abilitiesData.description: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, your next Aimed Shot, Steady Shot or Cobra Shot causes 10% additional damage. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frenzy R2
abilitiesData.description: Your pet gains 4% attack speed after attacking with a Basic Attack, lasting for 10 sec and stacking up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Rapid Recuperation
abilitiesData.description: You gain 12 focus every 3 sec while under the effect of Rapid Fire, and you gain 50 Focus instantly when you gain Rapid Killing.

abilitiesData.name: Hunting Party
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total Agility by an additional 2%, and increases the ranged and melee attack speed of all party and raid members by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Sniper Training
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Kill Shot ability by 15%, and after remaining stationary for 6 sec, your Steady Shot and Cobra Shot deal 6% more damage for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Explosive Shot
abilitiesData.description: You fire an explosive charge into the enemy target, dealing  Fire damage. The charge will blast the target every second for an additional 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Black Arrow
abilitiesData.description: Fires a Black Arrow at the target, dealing Shadow damage over 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lock and Load
abilitiesData.description: You have a 100% chance when you trap a target with Freezing Trap or Ice Trap, and a 20% chance when your Black Arrow deals damage to cause your next two Explosive Shots to cost no Focus and trigger no cooldown. Effect lasts for 12 sec and cannot occur more often than once every 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Trap
abilitiesData.description: Place a frost trap that creates an ice slick around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches it. All enemies within 10 yards will be slowed by 50% while in the area of effect. Trap will exist for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Survival Tactics
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the chance that your trap spells will be resisted by 4%, and reduces the cooldown of your Disengage ability by 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hunter vs. Wild R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total Stamina by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Point of No Escape
abilitiesData.description: Increases the ranged critical strike chance of all of your attacks on targets affected by your Ice Trap and Freezing Trap by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Tactics
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Time Warp
abilitiesData.description: Warp the flow of time, increasing melee, ranged, and spell casting speed by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.
extra: Allies receiving this effect will become unstuck in time, and be unable to benefit from Bloodlust, Heroism, or Time Warp again for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Brilliance
abilitiesData.description: Infuses the target with brilliance, increasing their spell power by 10% and their critical strike chance by 5% for 1 hour.
extra: If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Power
abilitiesData.description: When activated, you deal 20% more spell damage and damaging spells cost 10% more mana to cast. This effect lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mastery: Mana Adept
abilitiesData.description: Increases all spell damage done by up to 12%, based on the amount of mana the Mage has unspent. Each point of Mastery increases damage done by up to an additional 1.5%.

abilitiesData.name: Mage Armor
abilitiesData.description: Increases your resistance to all magic by 5 and causes you to regenerate 3% of your maximum mana every 5 sec. In addition, the duration of all harmful Magic effects used against you is reduced by 35%. Only one type of Armor spell can be active on the Mage at any time. Lasts 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Mirror Image
abilitiesData.description: Creates 3 copies of the caster nearby, which cast spells and attack the mage's enemies. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Mana Gem
abilitiesData.description: Mana gained from your Mana Gem also increases your spell power by 2% of your maximum mana for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Flame Orb
abilitiesData.description: Launches a Flame Orb forward from the Mage's position, dealing Fire damage every second to the closest enemy target for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target with energy, dealing Arcane damage. Generates an Arcane Charge.
extra: Arcane Blast's damage is increased by 50% per Arcane Charge, and its mana cost is increased by 150% per Arcane Charge.

abilitiesData.name: Evocation
abilitiesData.description: Gain 15% of your mana instantly and another 45% of your total mana over 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Explosion
abilitiesData.description: Causes an explosion of arcane magic around the caster, causing Arcane damage to all targets within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Presence of Mind
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.
extra: This spell is not on the global cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Missiles
abilitiesData.description: Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over 2 sec, causing Arcane damage per wave. Generates an Arcane Charge.
extra: Arcane Missiles' damage is increased by 50% per Arcane Charge.
Arcane Missiles has a chance to be activated after each of your damaging spell casts. Limit 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Barrage
abilitiesData.description: Launches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target, causing Arcane damage. Also hits 4 additional nearby targets for 50% damage. Consumes all Arcane Charges.
extra: Arcane Barrage's damage is increased by 50% per Arcane Charge.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the enemy for Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Expansive Mind
abilitiesData.description: Mana pool increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: The Human Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Spirit increased by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Critical Mass
abilitiesData.description: Your Living Bomb and Flame Orb spells deal 15% more damage, and your Pyroblast and Scorch spells have a 100% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to spell damage, increasing spell critical strike chance against that target by 5% and lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Molten Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases damage of all spells against targets with less than 35% health by 12%.

abilitiesData.name: Hot Streak
abilitiesData.description: Your spells no longer trigger Arcane Missiles.  Instead, your critical strikes with Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, Scorch, Pyroblast, or Fire Blast have a chance to cause your next Pyroblast spell cast within 15 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

abilitiesData.name: Combustion
abilitiesData.description: Instantly deals Fire damage and stuns the target for 3 sec.
extra: If the target is currently affected by your Ignite, it also burns the target for additional damage equal to 20% of the damage per tick of the Ignite every 1 sec for 10 sec.
When cast, resets the cooldown of your Inferno Blast ability.

abilitiesData.name: Molten Armor
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell critical strike chance by 5%.
extra: Reduces all physical damage taken by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Pyroblast
abilitiesData.description: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes Fire damage and an additional Fire damage over 18 sec.
extra: Getting two single-target direct-damage Fire critical strikes in a row will make your next Pyroblast instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 25% additional damage.

abilitiesData.name: Fireball
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a fiery ball that causes Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Living Bomb
abilitiesData.description: The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking Fire damage over 12 sec. When this effect ends, or the target dies, it explodes to deal additional Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within 10 yards. Limit 3 targets. This spell is strongest when applied to 1 or 2 targets.

abilitiesData.name: Scorch
abilitiesData.description: Scorch the enemy for Fire damage. Can be cast while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Blast Wave
abilitiesData.description: A wave of flame radiates outward from the target location, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for Fire damage and are slowed by 70% for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Flamestrike
abilitiesData.description: Calls down a pillar of fire, burning all enemies within the area for Fire damage and an additional Fire damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Flamestrike
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 100% and gives you a 100% chance that your Blast Wave spell will also automatically Flamestrike the same location if two or more targets are affected by the Blast Wave.

abilitiesData.name: Dragon's Breath
abilitiesData.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 369 Fire damage and are disoriented for 5 sec. Any direct damaging attack will revive targets.

abilitiesData.name: Impact
abilitiesData.description: Gives your damaging spells a 10% chance to reset the cooldown on Fire Blast and to cause the next Fire Blast you cast to stun the target for 2 sec and spread any Fire damage over time effects to nearby enemy targets within 12 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Enduring Winter-cata
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by 10%.  In addition, your Frostbolt spell has a 100% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Fingers of Frost
abilitiesData.description: Your successful Frostbolts, Frostfire Bolts and Frozen Orb hits have a 15% chance, and your Blizzard ticks have a 5% chance to grant you the Fingers of Frost effect.
extra: The Fingers of Frost effect causes your next Ice Lance or Deep Freeze to act as if your target were frozen, and increases Ice Lance damage by 25% for 15 sec.
Limit 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Brain Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Your most recently applied Nether Tempest, Living Bomb, or Frost Bomb spell has a chance when it deals damage to grant you the Brain Freeze effect.
extra: The Brain Freeze effect causes your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, cost no mana, and act as if your target were frozen for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Deep Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Stuns the target for 5 sec. Only usable on Frozen targets. Deals frost damage to targets that are permanently immune to stuns.

abilitiesData.name: Frostfire Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing Frostfire damage and slowing the target by 40% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cold Snap
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown of your Ice Block, Frost Nova, and Cone of Cold spells, and heals you for 30% of your maximum health.
extra: This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Icy Veins
abilitiesData.description: Hastens your spellcasting, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting by 100%. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frostfire Orb
abilitiesData.description: Launches a Frostfire Orb forward from the Mage's position, dealing Frostfire damage every second to the closest enemy target for 15 secs. Targets damaged by the Frostfire Orb are slowed by 40% for 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frostbolt
abilitiesData.description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Blasts enemies in a 8 yard radius for Frost damage and freezes them in place for up to 8 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilitiesData.description: Summon a Water Elemental to fight for the caster.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Water Elemental's Freeze spell a 100% chance to grant 2 charges of Fingers of Frost when it strikes enemy targets.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Lance
abilitiesData.description: Deals Frost damage to an enemy target. Ice Lance damage is quadrupled against frozen targets.

abilitiesData.name: Blizzard
abilitiesData.description: Ice shards pelt the target area doing Frost damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cone of Cold
abilitiesData.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take Frost damage and are slowed by 60% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Might
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing mastery by 3000.
extra: If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Devotion Aura
abilitiesData.description: Inspire all party and raid members within 40 yards, granting them immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects and reducing all magic damage taken by 20%. Lasts 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Concentration Aura
abilitiesData.description: All party or raid members within 40 yards lose 35% less casting or channeling time when damaged. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Word of Glory
abilitiesData.description: Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to heal a friendly target per charge of Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Light of Dawn
abilitiesData.description: Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to emanate a wave of healing energy, healing up to 6 of the most injured targets in your party or raid within 30 yards per charge of Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Radiance
abilitiesData.description: Imbues a friendly target with radiant energy, healing that target and all allies within 10 yards for 50% of that amount. Grants a charge of Holy Power.
extra: Healing effectiveness diminishes for each player target beyond 6.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Insight
abilitiesData.description: Fills you with Holy Light, increasing your casting speed by 10%, improving healing spells by 5% and giving melee attacks a chance to heal you.

abilitiesData.name: Judgements of the Pure
abilitiesData.description: Your Judgement increases your casting and melee haste by 9% for 1 min  and your mana regeneration from Spirit while in combat by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Beacon of Light
abilitiesData.description: The target becomes a Beacon of Light to all targets within a 60 yard radius.
extra: Only one target can be the Beacon of Light at a time.

Your Holy Light will also heal the Beacon for 100% of the amount healed. Your Holy Radiance, Light of Dawn, Light's Hammer, and Holy Prism will heal for 15% of the amount healed. All other heals will heal for 50% of the amount healed.

abilitiesData.name: Crusader Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that causes 130% weapon damage.
extra: Applies the Weakened Blows effect.
Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Plea
abilitiesData.description: Causes the Paladin to regenerate mana equal to 135% of Spirit (excluding short - duration Spirit bonuses) every 3 sec for 9 sec. Total mana gained will never be less than 12% of caster's maximum mana.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Shock
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing Holy damage to an enemy, or healing to an ally, and granting a charge of Holy Power.
extra: Holy Shock has an additional 25% chance to be a critical strike.

abilitiesData.name: Daybreak
abilitiesData.description: After casting Holy Radiance, your next Holy Shock will also heal other allies within 10 yards of the target for an amount equal to 75% of the original healing done, divided evenly among all targets. Stacks up to 2 times.

abilitiesData.name: Infusion of Light
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy Shock by 10%. In addition, your Holy Shock critical effects reduce the cast time of your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, Divine Light or Holy Radiance by 1.2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Light
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Flash of Light
abilitiesData.description: A quick, expensive heal that heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Light
abilitiesData.description: A large heal that heals a friendly target. Good for periods of heavy damage.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Favor-cata
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell casting haste by 20% and spell critical chance by 20% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Avenging Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Increases all damage and healing caused by 20% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings (Holy)
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Guardian of Ancient Kings to help you heal for 15 sec.
extra: The Guardian of Ancient Kings will heal the targets of your heals for an additional 100% of the amount healed and grants you 10% haste for its duration.

abilitiesData.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings (Retribution)
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Guardian of Ancient Kings to help you deal damage for 30 sec.
extra: The Guardian of Ancient Kings will attack your current enemy.  Both your attacks and the attacks of the Guardian will infuse you with Ancient Power that is unleashed as Ancient Fury when the Guardian departs.

abilitiesData.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings (Protection)
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Guardian of Ancient Kings to protect you for 12 sec.
extra: The Guardian of Ancient Kings reduces damage taken by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Lay on Hands
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to your maximum health.
extra: Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Aura Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Causes your Concentration Aura to make all affected targets immune to Silence and Interrupt effects and improve the effect of Devotion Aura, Resistance Aura, and Retribution Aura by 100%. Lasts 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Judgements of the Just
abilitiesData.description: Your Judgement reduces the melee and ranged attack speed of the target by 20% for 20 sec. In addition, increases the duration of your Seal of Justice effect by 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Vindication
abilitiesData.description: Your Crusader Strike and Hammer of the Righteous reduce physical damage done by their primary targets by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shield of the Righteous
abilitiesData.description: Instantly slam the target with your shield, causing 801 Holy damage, reducing the physical damage you take for 3 sec, and causing Bastion of Glory.
extra: Bastion of Glory - Increases the strength of your Word of Glory when used to heal yourself for 10%. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Inquisition
abilitiesData.description: Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to increase your Holy Damage by 30% and critical strike chance by 10%. Lasts 20 sec per charge of Holy Power consumed.

abilitiesData.name: Shield of the Templar
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of Avenging Wrath by 60 sec and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 120 sec. In addition, your Divine Plea will generate 3 Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Avenger's Shield
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing Holy damage, silencing and interrupting spellcasting for 3 sec, and then jumping to additional nearby enemies.
extra: Affects 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Truth
abilitiesData.description: Fills you with Holy Light, causing melee attacks to deal 12% additional weapon damage as Holy and apply Censure to the target.
extra: Replaces Seal of Command.
Censure - Deals additional Holy damage over 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of Wrath-mop
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a magical hammer that strikes an enemy for Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have 20% or less health.

abilitiesData.name: Judgment
abilitiesData.description: A magic attack that unleashes the energy of a Seal to cause Holy damage.

abilitiesData.name: Consecration
abilitiesData.description: Consecrates the land beneath you, causing 7884 Holy damage over 9 sec to enemies who enter the area.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Wrath-cata
abilitiesData.description: Sends bolts of holy power in all directions, causing Holy damage divided among all targets within 10 yds and stunning all Demons and Undead for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of the Righteous
abilitiesData.description: Hammer the current target for 20% weapon damage, causing a wave of light that hits all targets within 8 yards for 35% Holy weapon damage and applying the Weakened Blows effect. Grants a charge of Holy Power.
extra: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Shield
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount your shield blocks by an additional 20% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Protection
abilitiesData.description: Reduces magical damage taken by 40% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Guardian
abilitiesData.description: All party or raid members within 30 yards, excluding the Paladin, take 20% reduced damage for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ardent Defender
abilitiesData.description: Reduce damage taken by 20% for 10 sec. While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead cause you to be healed for 15% of your maximum health.

abilitiesData.name: Stoneform
abilitiesData.description: Removes all poison, disease and bleed effects and reduces all damage taken by 10% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mace Specialization-v2
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Maces and Two-Handed Maces increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Sword Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Swords and Two-Handed Swords increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Mace Specialization-v3
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Maces and Two-Handed Maces increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Communion
abilitiesData.description: Your auras increase your party and raid's damage dealt by 3%, and your own damage is increased by an additional 2% at all times. In addition, your Judgment causes Replenishment.
extra: Replenishment - Grants up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 10 sec. Lasts for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Templar's Verdict
abilitiesData.description: A powerful weapon strike that consumes 3 charges of Holy Power to deal 275% weapon damage.
extra: 1 Holy Power: X% Weapon Damage
2 Holy Power: X% Weapon Damage
3 Holy Power: X% Weapon Damage

abilitiesData.name: Divine Purpose
abilitiesData.description: Abilities that cost Holy Power have a 25% chance to cause the Divine Purpose effect.
extra: Divine Purpose: Your next Holy Power ability will consume no Holy Power and will cast as if 3 Holy Power were consumed. Lasts 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: The Art of War
abilitiesData.description: Your autoattacks have a 20% chance to make your next Exorcism instant, free and cause 100% additional damage.

abilitiesData.name: Zealotry
abilitiesData.description: Your Crusader Strike generates 3 charges of Holy Power per strike for the next 20 sec. Requires 3 Holy Power to use, but does not consume Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Exorcism
abilitiesData.description: Forcefully attempt to expel the evil from the target with a blast of Holy Light. Causes Holy damage and generates a charge of Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Sanctified Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Avenging Wrath lasts 50% longer and grants more frequent access to one of your abilities while it lasts.
extra: Holy: Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 50% and increases the critical strike chance of Holy Shock by 20%.
Protection: Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 50%, and causes Judgment to generate one additional Holy Power. Avenging Wrath also increases healing received by 20%.
Retribution: Reduces the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Righteousness
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with holy spirit for 30 min, granting each melee attack additional Holy damage.
extra: Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Seals of Command
abilitiesData.description: Your Seal of Righteousness, Seal of Truth, and Seal of Justice now also deal 7% weapon damage when triggered. In addition, your Seal of Righteousness now hits all enemy targets within melee range.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Storm
abilitiesData.description: An area attack that consumes 3 charges of Holy Power to cause 100% weapon damage as Holy damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Power Word: Fortitude
abilitiesData.description: Infuses the target with vitality, increasing Stamina by 10% for 1 hour.
extra: If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Protection
abilitiesData.description: Power infuses the target's party and raid members, increasing their Shadow resistance for 1 hour.  If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Fire
abilitiesData.description: Consumes the enemy in Holy flames that cause Holy damage and additional Holy damage over 7 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Smite
abilitiesData.description: Smite an enemy for Holy damage.

abilitiesData.name: Atonement
abilitiesData.description: When you deal damage with Smite, Holy Fire, and Penance, you instantly heal a nearby low health friendly target for 90% of the damage dealt.
extra: If the Priest is healed through Atonement, the effect is reduced by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Evangelism
abilitiesData.description: When you deal direct damage with Smite, or Holy Fire you gain Evangelism. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts for 20 sec.
extra: Evangelism - Increases the damage done by your Smite, or Holy Fire spells by 4% and reduces the mana cost of those spells by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Archangel
abilitiesData.description: Consumes your Evangelism, increasing your healing done by 5% for each Evangelism consumed for 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Fire
abilitiesData.description: A burst of Holy energy fills the caster, increasing the armor value from items by 60% and spell power by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Focus
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your next Flash Heal, Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing by 25% and increases its critical effect chance by 100%.
extra: Additionally, you become immune to Silence, Interrupt, and Dispel effects for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Greater Heal
abilitiesData.description: A slow casting spell that heals a single target.

abilitiesData.name: Train of Thought
abilitiesData.description: When you heal with Greater Heal, the cooldown of your Inner Focus is reduced by 5 sec.
extra: When you Smite, the cooldown of your Penance is reduced by 0.5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Power Word: Shield
abilitiesData.description: Draws on the soul of the friendly target to shield them, absorbing damage  Lasts 15 sec.  While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage. Once shielded, the target cannot be shielded again for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rapture
abilitiesData.description: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed or dispelled you are instantly energized with 7% of your total mana. This effect can only occur once every 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Penance
abilitiesData.description: Launches a volley of holy light at the target, causing Holy damage to an enemy, or healing to an ally instantly and every 1 sec for 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Borrowed Time
abilitiesData.description: Grants 14% spell haste for your next spell after casting Power Word: Shield. Lasts for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Grace
abilitiesData.description: Your Flash Heal, Greater Heal, Heal and Penance spells bless the target with Grace, increasing all healing received from the Priest by 10%. This effect will stack up to 3 times. Effect lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Inspiration
abilitiesData.description: Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 10% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, Binding Heal, Penance, Prayer of Mending, Prayer of Healing, or Circle of Healing spell.

abilitiesData.name: Prayer of Mending
abilitiesData.description: Places a spell on the target that heals them for the next time they take damage. When the heal occurs, Prayer of Mending jumps to a party or raid member within 10 yards. Jumps up to 5 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
extra: This spell can only be placed on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Flash Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Prayer of Healing
abilitiesData.description: A powerful prayer heals the friendly target's party members within 30 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Aegis
abilitiesData.description: Critical heals and all heals from Prayer of Healing create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Binding Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target and the caster.

abilitiesData.name: Pain Suppression
abilitiesData.description: Instantly reduces a friendly target's threat by 5%, and reduces all damage they take by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Hymn
abilitiesData.description: Heals 5 (12 in 25 player instances) nearby lowest health friendly party or raid targets within 40 yards every 2 sec for 8 sec, and increases healing done to them by 10% for 8 sec. The Priest must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Power Word: Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Summons a holy barrier on the target location that reduces all damage done to friendly targets by 25%. While within the barrier, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage. The barrier lasts for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hymn of Hope
abilitiesData.description: Restores 2% mana to 3 nearby low mana friendly party or raid targets every 2 sec for 8 sec, and increases their total maximum mana by 15% for 8 sec. Maximum of 12 mana restores. The Priest must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowfiend
abilitiesData.description: Creates a shadowy fiend to attack the target.  Caster receives 3% mana when the Shadowfiend attacks. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Power Infusion
abilitiesData.description: Infuses the target with power, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Gift of the Naaru
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target over 15 sec. The amount healed is increased by your spell power or attack power, whichever is higher.

abilitiesData.name: Circle of Healing
abilitiesData.description: Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 30 yards of the target. Prioritizes healing the most injured party members.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Word: Sanctuary
abilitiesData.description: Blesses the ground with divine light, healing all within it every 2 sec for 30 sec. Only one Sanctuary can be active at a time. Healing effectiveness diminishes for each player beyond 6 within the area.

abilitiesData.name: Heavenly Voice
abilitiesData.description: Increases the healing done by your Divine Hymn spell by 100%, and reduces the cooldown by 5 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Will
abilitiesData.description: A burst of Holy energy fills the caster, reducing the mana cost of instant cast spells by 15% and increasing your movement speed by 10%.
extra: You can only have Inner Will or Inner Fire active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Chakra: Sanctuary
abilitiesData.description: Increases the healing done by your area of effect healing spells by 25%, reduces the cooldown of your Circle of Healing spell by 2 sec, and transforms your Holy Word: Chastise spell into Holy Word: Sanctuary.
extra: Holy Word: Sanctuary - Blesses the ground with Divine light, healing all within it for 548 every 2 sec for 30 sec. Only one Sanctuary can be active at any one time. 40 sec cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Chakra: Serenity
abilitiesData.description: Increases the healing done by your single-target healing spells by 25%, causes them to refresh the duration of your Renew on the target, and transforms your Holy Word: Chastise spell into Holy Word: Serenity.
extra: Holy Word: Serenity - Instantly heals the target, and increases the critical effect chance of your healing spells on the target by 25% for 6 sec. 15 sec cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Chakra
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Heal, Flash Heal, Greater Heal, Binding Heal, Prayer of Healing, Prayer of Mending, Mind Spike or Smite will put you into a Chakra state.
extra: Sanctuary (Prayer of Healing, Prayer of Mending) - Increases the healing done by your area of effect spells and Renew by 15% and reduces the cooldown of your Circle of Healing by 2 sec.

Serenity (Heal, Flash Heal, Greater Heal, Binding Heal) - Increases the critical effect chance of your direct healing spells by 10%, and causes your direct heals to refresh the duration of your Renew on the target.
Chastise (Smite, Mind Spike) - Increases your total damage done by Shadow and Holy spells by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Word: Serenity
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals the target, and increases the critical effect chance of your healing spells on the target by 25% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Renew
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target every 3 sec for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Surge of Light
abilitiesData.description: You have a 6% chance when you Smite, Heal, Flash Heal, Binding Heal or Greater Heal to cause your next Flash Heal to be instant cast and cost no mana.

abilitiesData.name: Serendipity
abilitiesData.description: When you heal with Binding Heal or Flash Heal, the cast time of your next Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing spell is reduced by 20% and mana cost reduced by 10%. Stacks up to 2 times. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Guardian Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target. The spirit increases the healing received by the target by 60%, and also prevents the target from dying by sacrificing itself.  This sacrifice terminates the effect but heals the target of 50% of their maximum health. Lasts 10 sec. Castable while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Touch
abilitiesData.description: Causes Shadow damage over 15 sec. Each time Vampiric Touch deals damage the caster gains 2% of maximum mana.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowform
abilitiesData.description: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 25%, increasing your armor by 100%, and increasing all party and raid members spell haste by 5%. However, you may not cast Holy spells except for Renew, Prayer of Mending, and Leap of Faith while in this form.

abilitiesData.name: Dispersion
abilitiesData.description: You disperse into pure Shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 90%.  You are unable to attack or cast spells, but you regenerate 6% mana every 1 sec for 6 sec.
extra: Dispersion can be cast while stunned, feared or silenced. Clears all snare and movement impairing effects when cast, and makes you immune to them while dispersed.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Orbs
abilitiesData.description: You have a 10% chance for your Shadow Word: Pain and Mind Flay spells to grant you a Shadow Orb each time they deal damage. Casting your Mind Blast or Mind Spike spell consumes all Shadow Orbs, increasing damage of that spell by 22% per Shadow Orb, and granting 22% increased damage on your periodic Shadow spells for 15 sec. You can have up to a maximum of 3 orbs.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target for Shadow damage and generates 1 Shadow Orb.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Spike
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target for Shadowfrost damage, but extinguishes your Shadow damage-over-time effects from the target in the process.
extra: Mind Spike also increases the critical strike chance of your next Mind Blast on the target by 30%. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Word: Pain
abilitiesData.description: A word of darkness that causes Shadow damage instantly, and additional Shadow damage over 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Flay
abilitiesData.description: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Devouring Plague
abilitiesData.description: Consumes all of the caster's Shadow Orbs to deal Shadow damage and additional Shadow damage every 1 sec for 6 sec. Also heals the caster for 1% of their maximum health when it deals periodic damage.
extra: Damage and healing increased based on the number of Shadow Orbs consumed.

abilitiesData.name: Empowered Shadow
abilitiesData.description: After consuming a Shadow Orb, for 15 sec your periodic shadow damage spells deal increased damage.

abilitiesData.name: Pain and Suffering
abilitiesData.description: Your Mind Flay has a 60% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target, and reduces the damage you take from your own Shadow Word: Death by 40%.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Word: Death
abilitiesData.description: A word of dark binding that inflicts Shadow damage to the target. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.
extra: If the target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, the caster takes damage equal to the damage inflicted upon the target.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Melt
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done with your Shadow Word: Death by 30% on targets at or below 25% health, and when you deal damage with Mind Spike, the cast time of your next Mind Blast is reduced by 50% lasting 6 sec. Mind Melt can stack up to 2 times.

abilitiesData.name: Masochism
abilitiesData.description: When you take a damaging attack equal to or greater than 10% of your total health or damage yourself with your Shadow Word: Death, you instantly gain 10% of your total mana.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Sear
abilitiesData.description: Causes an explosion of shadow magic around the target, causing Shadow damage every 1 sec for 5 sec to all enemies within 10 yards around the target.

abilitiesData.name: Master Poisoner
abilitiesData.description: Increases the spell damage taken by any target the Rogue has poisoned by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Expose Armor
abilitiesData.description: Weaken the target's defenses, applying the Weakened Armor debuff. Awards 1 combo point.
extra: Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Relentless Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 Energy.

abilitiesData.name: Overkill
abilitiesData.description: While stealthed, and for 20 seconds after breaking stealth, you regenerate 30% additional energy.

abilitiesData.name: Venomous Wounds
abilitiesData.description: Each time your Rupture or Garrote deals damage to an enemy that you have poisoned, you have a 60% chance to deal additional Nature damage and to regain 10 Energy. If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy proportional to the remaining Rupture duration.

abilitiesData.name: Murderous Intent
abilitiesData.description: When you Backstab an enemy that is below 35% health, you instantly recover 30 Energy.

abilitiesData.name: Ruthlessness
abilitiesData.description: Gives your melee finishing moves a 60% chance to add a combo point to your target.

abilitiesData.name: Seal Fate-cata
abilitiesData.description: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Mutilate
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attacks with both weapons for 280% weapon damage with each weapon. Awards 2 combo points.

abilitiesData.name: Backstab
abilitiesData.description: Backstab the target, causing 380% weapon damage to the target. Must be behind the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Stealth
abilitiesData.description: Conceals you in the shadows, allowing you to stalk enemies without being seen. Lasts until canceled.

abilitiesData.name: Garrote
abilitiesData.description: Garrote the enemy, silencing them for 3 sec and causing damage over 18 sec, increased by your attack power. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Vendetta
abilitiesData.description: Marks an enemy for death, increasing all damage you deal to the target by 30% and granting you unerring vision of your target, regardless of concealments such as stealth and invisibility. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rupture
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage over time, increased by your attack power.  Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point: X damage over 8 seconds
2 points: X damage over 12 seconds
3 points: X damage over 16 seconds
4 points: X damage over 20 seconds
5 points: X damage over 24 seconds

abilitiesData.name: Slice and Dice
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that consumes combo points on any nearby target to increase melee attack speed by 40%. Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point: 12 seconds
2 points: 18 seconds
3 points: 24 seconds
4 points: 30 seconds
5 points: 36 seconds

abilitiesData.name: Envenom
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that deals instant Nature damage proportional to the number of combo points on the target.  Following the Envenom attack, your poison application chance is increased by 15%, for 1 sec plus an additional 1 sec per combo point.
extra: 1 point: X damage
2 points: X damage
3 points:  X damage
4 points X damage
5 points: X damage
Replaces Eviscerate.

abilitiesData.name: Cut to the Chase
abilitiesData.description: Your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities have a 100% chance to refresh your Slice and Dice duration to its 5 combo point maximum.

abilitiesData.name: Vanish
abilitiesData.description: Allows you to vanish from sight, entering an improved stealth mode for 3 sec. For the first 3 sec after vanishing, damage and harmful effects received will not break stealth.  Also breaks movement impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilitiesData.description: The threat caused by your next damaging attack and all actions taken for 6 sec afterwards will be transferred to the target party or raid member, and all damage caused by the target is increased by 15% during this time. Transferred threat is not permanent, and will fade after 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cold Blood
abilitiesData.description: When activated, generates 25 Energy and increases the critical strike chance of your next non-periodic offensive ability by 100%.

abilitiesData.name: Fan of Knives
abilitiesData.description: Instantly whirl around, releasing a spray of knives at all targets within 10 yards, dealing Physical damage. This attack has a chance of applying your active poisons at their normal rate. Awards combo points if it strikes your current combo target.

abilitiesData.name: Shortblade Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Daggers and One-Handed Swords increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Savage Combat
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total attack power by 6% and all physical damage caused to enemies you have poisoned is increased by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% and your melee attack speed by 20% for 15 sec.
extra: While Adrenaline Rush is active, the global cooldown of Sinister Strike, Revealing Strike, Eviscerate, Slice and Dice, and Rupture reduced by 0.2 sec

abilitiesData.name: Killing Spree
abilitiesData.description: Step through the shadows to an enemy within 10 yards, attacking it every 0.5 sec with both weapons until 7 assaults are made, and increasing all damage done by 50% for the duration. Cannot hit invisible or stealthed targets.
extra: Blade Flurry Effect: Killing Spree will teleport to and damage a nearby enemy target every 0.5 sec instead of focusing on your primary target.

abilitiesData.name: Restless Blades
abilitiesData.description: Your damaging finishing moves reduce the cooldown of your Adrenaline Rush, Killing Spree, Redirect, and Sprint abilities by 2 sec per combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Revealing Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that deals 160% weapon damage and exposes the target's vulnerabilities, increasing the effectiveness of your offensive finishing moves on that target by 35%, and giving your Sinister Strikes a 20% chance to generate an extra combo point, for 24 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Eviscerate
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage per combo point:
extra: 1 point: X damage
2 points: X damage
3 points:  X damage
4 points X damage
5 points: X damage

abilitiesData.name: Sinister Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that causes damage in addition to 240% of your normal weapon damage.
