abilitiesData.name: Blade Flurry
abilitiesData.description: While active, your attacks strike up to 4 additional nearby opponents for 40% of normal damage but Energy regeneration is reduced by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

abilitiesData.name: Honor Among Thieves
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all party and raid members by 5%. When any player in your party or raid critically hits with a spell or ability, you have a 100% chance to gain a combo point on your current target. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Hemorrhage
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that deals 160% weapon damage (232% if a dagger is equipped) causing profuse bleeding that deals an additional 50% of the direct strike's damage over 24 sec. Awards 1 combo point.
extra: Replaces Sinister Strike.

abilitiesData.name: Find Weakness
abilitiesData.description: Your Ambush, Garrote, and Cheap Shot abilities reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, causing all your attacks to bypass 100% of that enemy's armor for 10 sec. Bypasses less armor on players.

abilitiesData.name: Ambush
abilitiesData.description: Ambush the target, causing 325% weapon damage. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Awards 2 combo points

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Dance
abilitiesData.description: Enter the Shadow Dance for 8 sec, allowing the use of abilities that ordinarily require Stealth. The Energy cost of Ambush is reduced by 20 while Shadow Dance is active.

abilitiesData.name: Premeditation
abilitiesData.description: When used, adds 2 combo points to your target. You must add to or use those combo points within 20 sec or the combo points are lost.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowstep
abilitiesData.description: Step through the shadows and appear behind a target. Movement speed is increased by 70% for 2 sec afterwards.

abilitiesData.name: Initiative R1
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a 50% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

abilitiesData.name: Recuperate
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that consumes combo points on any nearby target to restore 3% of maximum health every 3 sec. Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point  : 6 seconds
2 points: 12 seconds
3 points: 18 seconds
4 points: 24 seconds
5 points: 30 seconds

abilitiesData.name: Preparation-cata
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Sprint, Vanish, Evasion, and Dismantle abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Master of Subtlety
abilitiesData.description: Attacks made while stealthed and for 6 seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional 10% damage.

abilitiesData.name: Serrated Blades
abilitiesData.description: Your Eviscerate has a 20% chance per combo point to refresh your Rupture on the target to its original duration.

abilitiesData.name: Energetic Recovery
abilitiesData.description: Empowers your Recuperate ability, causing its periodic effect to also restore 12 Energy.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Oath
abilitiesData.description: Grants 5% spell haste to all party and raid members within 100 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Totemic Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Causes your Fire totems to increase the spell power of party and raid members within 100 yards by 10% .

abilitiesData.name: Windfury Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Windfury Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 40 yards by 10%. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Wrath of Air Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Wrath of Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem provides 5% spell haste to all party and raid members within 40 yards. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Strength of Earth Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Strength of Earth Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases the Strength and Agility of all party and raid members. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Heroism
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee, ranged, and spell casting speed by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.
extra: Allies receiving this effect will become Exhausted and be unable to benefit from Heroism or Time Warp again for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Surge
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Flame Shock periodic damage ticks a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of your Lava Burst spell.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Burst
abilitiesData.description: You hurl molten lava at the target, dealing Fire damage. Lava Burst will always deal a critical strike. If your Flame Shock is on the target, Lava Burst will deal 50% additional damage.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Shield
abilitiesData.description: The caster is surrounded by a reactive lightning barrier. When a spell, melee or ranged attack hits the caster, the attacker will be struck for Nature damage. This effect may only occur once every few seconds. Lasts 1 hour.
extra: Only one of your Elemental Shields can be active on you at once.

abilitiesData.name: Rolling Thunder
abilitiesData.description: When you deal damage with Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning while your Lightning Shield ability is active, you have a 60% chance to recover 2% of your mana and to generate an additional Lightning Shield charge, up to a maximum of 9 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Shock
abilitiesData.description: Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing Nature damage and applying the Weakened Blows effect.
extra: Weakened Blows: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Fulmination
abilitiesData.description: When you have more than 3 Lightning Shield charges active, your Earth Shock spell will consume any surplus charges, instantly dealing their total damage to the enemy target.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Elemental Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Fire Totem with 154755 health at the feet of the caster, calling forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on the caster's enemies. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Elemental Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Earth Totem with 154755 health at the feet of the caster, calling forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect the caster and his allies. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Call upon elemental forces, empowering you with 30% haste for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Feedback
abilitiesData.description: Your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells reduce the remaining cooldown on your Elemental Mastery talent by 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Flametongue Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with fire, increasing magical damage done by 7%. Each hit causes additional Fire damage, based on the speed of the weapon. Slower weapons cause more fire damage per swing. Lasts 60 minutes

abilitiesData.name: Searing Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Fire Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 1 min that repeatedly attacks an enemy within 25 yards fo Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Spring Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Mana Spring Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 min that restores mana every 5 seconds to all party and raid members within 40 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Stoneskin Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Stoneskin Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem protects party and raid members within 40 yards, increasing armor. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Flame Shock
abilitiesData.description: Instantly sears the target with fire, causing Fire damage immediately and Fire damage over 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Fires a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing Nature damage. Can be cast while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Thunderstorm
abilitiesData.description: You call down a bolt of lightning, energizing you and damaging nearby enemies within 10 yards. Restores 15% mana to you and deals Nature damage to all nearby enemies, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec and knocking them back 20 yards. This spell is usable while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Lightning
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Magma Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Fire Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 1 min that causes Fire damage to creatures within 8 yards every 2 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Shields
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 15%, increases the amount of mana gained from your Water Shield orbs by 15%, and increases the amount of healing done by your Earth Shield orbs by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Shields R1
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 5%, increases the amount of mana gained from your Water Shield orbs by 5%, and increases the amount of healing done by your Earth Shield orbs by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Warding
abilitiesData.description: Reduces magical damage taken by 12%.

abilitiesData.name: Unleashed Rage
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Stream Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Healing Stream Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 15 sec that heals the most injured party or raid member every 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid the Shaman in battle, lasting 30 sec. Spirit Wolves are immune to movement-impairing effects, and their attacks heal them and their master for 150% of damage done.

abilitiesData.name: Stormstrike-cata
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike an enemy with both weapons, dealing 380% weapon damage and granting you an additional 25% chance to critically strike that enemy with your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lightning Shield, and Earth Shock spells for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Lash
abilitiesData.description: You charge your off-hand weapon with lava, instantly dealing 300% of that weapon's damage to an enemy target and spreading your Flame Shock from the target to up to four enemies within 12 yards. Damage is increased by 40% if your off-hand weapon is enchanted with Flametongue.

abilitiesData.name: Maelstrom Weapon
abilitiesData.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to reduce the cast time and mana cost of your next Nature spell with a base cast time shorter than 10 seconds by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Unleash Flame
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes the Flametongue enchantment upon the Shaman's weapon, dealing Fire damage to target enemy and increasing the damage dealt by the Shaman's next Fire spell by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Unleash Elements
abilitiesData.description: Focuses the elemental force imbued in the Shaman's weaponry, with the concentrated effects depending on the enchantment unleashed.
extra: See individual weapon imbue spell tooltips for details regarding the effects of unleashing each.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Nova-cata
abilitiesData.description: Ignites your Flame Shock spell on any nearby enemies, causing each of them to emit a wave of flames that deals Fire damage to every other enemy within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Ancestral Swiftness-cata
abilitiesData.description: Your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.
extra: Passive: Increases spell haste by 5% and melee haste by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Windfury Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with wind. Each hit has a 20% chance of triggering three extra attacks with bonus attack power. Lasts 60 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Ancestral Healing
abilitiesData.description: Your critical heals reduce physical damage taken by 10% for 15 sec, and heals you cast increase allies' maximum health by 10% of the amount healed, up to a maximum of 10% of their health.

abilitiesData.name: Mastery: Deep Healing
abilitiesData.description: Increases the potency of your healing spells by up to 40%, based on the current health level of your target (lower health targets are healed for more). Each point of Mastery increases healing by up to an additional 3.0%.

abilitiesData.name: Focused Insight
abilitiesData.description: After casting any Shock spell, your next heal's mana cost is reduced by 75% of the cost of the Shock spell, and its healing effectiveness is increased by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Telluric Currents
abilitiesData.description: Your attunement to natural energies causes your Lightning Bolt spell to restore mana equal to 40% of damage dealt.

abilitiesData.name: Earthliving Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with earthen life. Increases spell healing by 110 and gives each heal up to a 20% chance to trigger the Earthliving effect on the target, healing additional health over 12 sec. Single-target direct heals on targets below 35% of maximum health will always trigger this effect. Lasts 60 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Water Shield
abilitiesData.description: The caster is surrounded by globes of water, granting mana per 5 sec. When a spell, melee, or ranged attack hits the caster, the reactive shield generates mana. This effect can only occur once every 3 seconds. Lasts 1 hour.
extra: Only one of your Elemental Shields can be active on you at once.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Shield
abilitiesData.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing the effectiveness of Shaman healing spells on that target by 20%, and causing attacks to heal the shielded target. 9 charges. Lasts 10 min. This effect can only occur once every few seconds.
extra: Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time, only one Earth Shield may be on a target at a time, and only one of your Elemental Shields can be active on you at once.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Swiftness V2
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Wave
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals the friendly target, then jumps to heal the most injured nearby targets. If cast on a party or raid member, the heal will only jump to other members. Heals 4 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Riptide
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target and more over 18 sec. Your Chain Heal spells are 25% more effective when their primary target is affected by your Riptide.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Rain
abilitiesData.description: Calls forth healing rains to blanket the area targeted by the Shaman, restoring health to allies in the area every 2 sec for 10 sec. Healing effectiveness diminishes for each player beyond 6 within the area.

abilitiesData.name: Greater Healing Wave
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Tidal Waves
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you gain the Tidal Waves effect, which reduces the cast time of your Healing Wave and Greater Healing Wave spells and increases the critical effect chance of your Healing Surge spell. 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
abilitiesData.description: Calls upon spiritual guidance, permitting movement while casting non-instant Shaman spells. This spell may be cast while casting other spells. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Spirit Link Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 10 yards by 10%. Every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed, such that each player ends up with the same percentage of their maximum health. Lasts 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Tide Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec. Party and raid members within 40 yards of the totem gain 200% of the caster's Spirit (excluding short - duration Spirit bonuses).

abilitiesData.name: Summon Felhunter
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felhunter under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Fel Intelligence
abilitiesData.description: Increases party and raid members' maximum mana and causes them to regenerate mana every 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow and Flame
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Shadow Bolt and Incinerate spells by 12%, and your Shadow Bolt and Incinerate have a 100% chance to cause the Shadow and Flame effect to the target.
extra: The Shadow and Flame effect causes the target to be vulnerable to spell damage, increasing spell critical strike chance against that target by 5% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of the Elements
abilitiesData.description: Curses the target, increasing magic damage taken by 5% for 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Soulstone
abilitiesData.description: Creates a Soulstone. When cast on live targets, the soul of the target is stored and they will be able to resurrect upon death. If cast on a dead target, they are instantly resurrected. Targets resurrect with 30% health and 30% mana.

abilitiesData.name: Demon Soul
abilitiesData.description: You and your summoned demon fuse souls, granting the Warlock a temporary power depending on the demon currently enslaved.
extra: Imp - Critical strike chance of your cast time Destruction spells increased by 30% for 20 sec.
Voidwalker - All threat generated by you transferred to your Voidwalker for 15 sec.
Succubus - Shadow Bolt damage increased by 10% for 20 sec.
Felhunter - Periodic shadow damage increased by 20% for 20 sec.
Felguard - Spell haste increased by 15% and fire and shadow damage done increased by 10% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Intent
abilitiesData.description: Infuses all party and raid members with shadow, increasing their spell power by 10% and Stamina by 10% for 1 hour.
extra: If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Pandemic
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the global cooldown of your Bane and Curse spells by .5 sec.
extra: Your Drain Soul has a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Unstable Affliction spell when dealing damage on targets below 25% health.

abilitiesData.name: Unstable Affliction
abilitiesData.description: Shadow energy slowly destroys the target, causing damage over 14 sec.
extra: If the Unstable Affliction is dispelled it will cause damage to the dispeller and silence them for 4 sec. This damage always critically strikes.

abilitiesData.name: Corruption
abilitiesData.description: Corrupts the target, causing Shadow damage over 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Everlasting Affliction
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Corruption, Seed of Corruption and Unstable Affliction by 15%.
extra: And your Drain Life, Drain Soul, and Haunt spells have a 100% chance to reset the duration of your Corruption spell on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Swap
abilitiesData.description: You copy your Shadow damage-over-time effects from the target, preserving their power and duration.
extra: For 3 sec afterwards, the next target you cast Soul Swap: Exhale on will be afflicted by the copied Shadow damage-over-time effects.
You cannot Soul Swap to the same target.

abilitiesData.name: Doomguard
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Doomguard to fight beside you for 45 sec.
extra: The Doomguard will assist you by attacking the target which is afflicted by your Bane of Doom or Bane of Agony spell.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Haunt
abilitiesData.description: You send a ghostly soul into the target, dealing Shadow damage and increasing all periodic damage done by your spells on the target by 35% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Bane of Doom
abilitiesData.description: Banes the target with impending doom, causing Shadow damage every 15 sec. When Bane of Doom deals damage, it has a 20% chance to summon a Demon guardian.
extra: Only one target can have Bane of Doom at a time, only one Bane per Warlock can be active on any one target. Lasts for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowflame-cata
abilitiesData.description: Reduces movement speed by 30% and deals Shadowflame damage over 6 sec. Generates 2 Demonic Fury every time it deals damage.

abilitiesData.name: Drain Soul
abilitiesData.description: Drains the soul of the target, causing Shadow damage every 2 sec and energizing one Soul Shard after it deals damage twice. If the target dies and yields experience or honor, three Soul Shards are energized. Lasts 12 sec.
extra: If the target is at or below 20% health when Drain Soul deals damage, it deals 100% additional damage and causes all of your other periodic Affliction damage effects to instantly deal 60% of their normal periodic damage.

abilitiesData.name: Soulburn
abilitiesData.description: Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.
extra: Affected Spells:
Summon Demon
Drain Life
Health Funnel
Curses
Demonic Circle: Teleport
Seed of Corruption
Unending Breath
Soul Swap

abilitiesData.name: Fel Flame
abilitiesData.description: Deals Shadowflame damage to an enemy target. Generates Burning Embers or Demonic Fury.

abilitiesData.name: Agony
abilitiesData.description: Inflicts increasing agony on the target, causing Shadow damage over 24 sec.
extra: This damage is dealt slowly at first and builds up each time it deals damage.

abilitiesData.name: Soulburn: Seed of Corruption
abilitiesData.description: Grants the Soulburn empowerment to your Seed of Corruption spell.
extra: Your Seed of Corruption detonation effect will afflict Corruption on all enemy targets. The Soul Shard will be refunded if the detonation is successful.

abilitiesData.name: Seed of Corruption
abilitiesData.description: Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target, causing Shadow damage over 18 sec.
extra: When the target takes X total damage from the caster or dies, the seed will inflict Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target.

abilitiesData.name: Demonic Pact
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell damage by 2%, and your summoned demon grants the Demonic Pact effect to all nearby friendly party and raid members.
extra: The Demonic Pact effect increases spell power by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Gul'dan
abilitiesData.description: Summons a falling meteor to strike the target and all enemies within 6 yards for Shadowflame damage and inflicting them with Shadowflame.
extra: Shadowflame: Reduces movement speed by 30% and deals Shadowflame damage over 6 sec. Generates 2 Demonic Fury every time it deals damage.

abilitiesData.name: Immolate
abilitiesData.description: Burns the enemy for Fire damage and then an additional Fire damage over 15 sec. Critical Strikes generate Burning Embers.
extra: Replaces Corruption.

abilitiesData.name: Cremation
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Hellfire by 30%, and your Hand of Gul'dan has a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Immolate on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Felguard
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felguard under the command of the Warlock.
extra: Felguard are powerful melee fighters who excel against multiple targets and reduce healing received by their target.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Harvest
abilitiesData.description: You seek out nearby wandering souls, regenerating 45% health and 3 soul shards over 9 sec. Cannot be cast when in combat.

abilitiesData.name: Incinerate
abilitiesData.description: Deals Fire damage to your target. Generates Burning Embers. Critical Strikes double this effect.

abilitiesData.name: Felstorm
abilitiesData.description: The Felguard recklessly swings its weapon, striking all nearby targets within 8 yards for 100% weapon damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.
extra: The Felguard cannot perform any other abilities during Felstorm.

abilitiesData.name: Metamorphosis
abilitiesData.description: Temporarily transform into a demon, increasing damage dealt by 24%. Metamorphosis prevents the use of Hand of Gul'dan.

abilitiesData.name: Immolation Aura-mop
abilitiesData.description: Ignites the area surrounding the caster, causing Fire damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Fire
abilitiesData.description: Burn the enemy's soul, causing Fire damage.
extra: Soul Fire always critically strikes. In addition, the damage is increased by your critical strike chance.

abilitiesData.name: Decimation
abilitiesData.description: When you Shadowbolt, Incinerate or Soul Fire a target that is at or below 25% health, the cast time of your Soul Fire spell is reduced by 40% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hellfire
abilitiesData.description: Ignites the area surrounding the caster, causing Fire damage to himself and Fire damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec. Lasts 14 sec.
extra: Generates 10 Demonic Fury per second plus 3 Demonic Fury per second on secondary targets.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Imp
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Imp under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Pact
abilitiesData.description: Increases party and raid members' Stamina.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Leech
abilitiesData.description: Your Shadowburn, Soul Fire and Chaos Bolt instantly restore 4% of your total health and mana when they deal damage and also grant Replenishment.
extra: Replenishment - Grants up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 10 sec. Lasts for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Soul Fire
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Fire and Shadow damage done by 8% for 20 sec after you deal damage with Soul Fire.

abilitiesData.name: Empowered Imp
abilitiesData.description: Your Imp's Firebolt has a 4% chance to cause your next Soul Fire spell to be instant cast within 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Havoc
abilitiesData.description: Causes the next Chaos Bolt or three other single target spells cast by the Warlock to also strike this target. Lasts 15 sec.
extra: Only one target can have Bane of Havoc at a time, and only one Bane per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Conflagrate
abilitiesData.description: Target enemy instantly explodes, dealing Fire damage. If the target is afflicted by Immolate, their movement speed is reduced by 50% for 5 sec.
extra: Generates Burning Embers. Critical strikes double this effect.

abilitiesData.name: Chaos Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes a blast of chaos, causing Shadow damage.
extra: Chaos Bolt always critically strikes. In addition, the damage is increased by your critical strike chance.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowburn
abilitiesData.description: Instantly blasts the target for Shadow damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.
extra: Restores 15% of your total mana after 5 sec. If the target dies within 5 sec, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Burning Ember instead.

abilitiesData.name: Rain of Fire
abilitiesData.description: Calls down a fiery rain to burn enemies in the area of effect for Fire damage over 8 sec.
extra: Deals 50% additional damage if the target is immolated.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Frenzy
abilitiesData.description: Your bleed effects cause targets to take an extra 4% physical damage. Applying a bleed effect increases bleed damage taken by the target by 30% for 1 min. In addition, your autoattacks have a 10% chance to generate 20 additional Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Battle Shout
abilitiesData.description: Increases the attack power of all raid and party members within 100 yards by 10%. Lasts 5 min.
extra: Generates 20 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Commanding Shout
abilitiesData.description: Increases the Stamina of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%. Lasts 5 min.
extra: Generates 20 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Sunder Armor
abilitiesData.description: Sunders the target, causing Weakened Armor.
extra: Weakened Armor: Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec.  Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Colossus Smash
abilitiesData.description: Smashes a target for 175% weapon damage and weakens their defenses, allowing your attacks to bypass 100% of their armor for 6 sec, and causes the Physical Vulnerability effect on the target. Bypasses less armor on players.
extra: Physical Vulnerability: Weakens the constitution of an enemy target, increasing their physical damage taken by 4% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Deadly Calm
abilitiesData.description: For the next 10 sec, none of your abilities cost rage, but you continue to generate rage. Cannot be used during Inner Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Battle Stance
abilitiesData.description: An aggressive combat stance.
extra: Generates high Rage from normal melee attacks.

abilitiesData.name: Tactical Mastery
abilitiesData.description: You retain up to an additional 50 Rage when you change stances.

abilitiesData.name: Rend
abilitiesData.description: Wounds the target causing them to bleed for damage over 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Overpower
abilitiesData.description: Instantly overpower the enemy causing 105% weapon damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged or parried. Overpower has a 60% increased chance to be a critical strike.
extra: Overpower is activated by Taste for Blood.

abilitiesData.name: Shattering Throw
abilitiesData.description: Throws your weapon at the enemy causing damage (based on attack power), reducing the armor on the target by 20% for 10 sec or removing any invulnerabilities.

abilitiesData.name: Thunder Clap
abilitiesData.description: Blasts enemies within 8 yards for damage and applies the Weakened Blows effect.
extra: Weakened Blows: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Taste for Blood
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Overpower critical strike chance by 60%. In addition, whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a 100% chance of allowing the use of Overpower for 9 sec. This effect will not occur more than once every 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Berserker Stance
abilitiesData.description: A reckless combat stance.
extra: Generates some Rage from normal melee attacks and some Rage from damage taken.

abilitiesData.name: Mortal Strike
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that deals 175% weapon damage plus 1 and causes Mortal Wounds on the target.
extra: Generates 10 Rage
Mortal Wounds: Grievously wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing received for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lambs to the Slaughter
abilitiesData.description: Your Mortal Strike causes the Slaughter effect, which refreshes the duration of Rend on the target and increases the damage of your Execute, Overpower, Slam and Mortal Strike by 10%. Lasts 15 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodrage
abilitiesData.description: Generates 20 rage at the cost of health, and then generates an additional 10 rage over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Rage
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Strike and Cleave by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Recklessness
abilitiesData.description: Grants your special attacks an additional 30% chance to critically hit. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Strike
abilitiesData.description: An attack that instantly deals 110% weapon damage. Use when you have more Rage than you can spend.

abilitiesData.name: Battle Trance
abilitiesData.description: Your Bloodthirst, Mortal Strike and Shield Slam hits have a 15% chance to make your next special attack that costs more than 5 Rage consume no Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Execute
abilitiesData.description: Attempt to finish off a wounded foe, causing physical damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

abilitiesData.name: Slam
abilitiesData.description: Slams the opponent, causing 275% weapon damage.

abilitiesData.name: Sweeping Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Your melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent for 75% damage. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cleave
abilitiesData.description: A sweeping attack that strikes the target and an additional nearby target, dealing 82% weapon damage (115% if a one - handed weapon is equipped).
extra: Use when you have more Rage than you can spend.

abilitiesData.name: Blood and Thunder
abilitiesData.description: When you Thunder Clap a target affected by your Rend, you have a 100% chance to affect every target with Rend.

abilitiesData.name: Bladestorm
abilitiesData.description: You become a whirling storm of destructive force, striking all targets within 8 yards for 120% weapon damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.
extra: During a Bladestorm, you can continue to dodge, block, and parry, and are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects. However, you can only perform shout abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Whirlwind
abilitiesData.description: In a whirlwind of steel you attack all enemies within 8 yardss causing 85% weapon damage to each enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Axe Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Fist Weapons, Axes, and Two-Handed Axes increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Rampage
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all party and raid members within 100 yds by 5%. In addition, improves your critical strike chance by an additional 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Berserker Rage
abilitiesData.description: You become Enraged, generating 10 Rage and increasing physical damage done by 10% for 6 sec.
extra: Also removes and grants immunity to Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects for the duration of Berserker Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Death Wish
abilitiesData.description: When activated you become Enraged, increasing your physical damage by 20% but increasing all damage taken by 20%. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Executioner
abilitiesData.description: Your Execute hits have a 100% chance to improve your melee attack speed by 5% for 9 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodthirst
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attack the target, dealing 90% weapon damage with your main hand weapon and restoring 1% of your health. Bloodthirst has double the normal chance to be a critical strike.
extra: Generates 10 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Raging Blow
abilitiesData.description: A mighty blow that deals 190% weapon damage from both melee weapons.
extra: Becoming Enraged enables one use of Raging Blow.
Limit 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodsurge
abilitiesData.description: Your Bloodthirst hits have a 20% chance of making your next 3 Wild Strikes free and reducing their global cooldown to 1 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Single-Minded Fury
abilitiesData.description: When you dual-wield one-handed weapons, you deal 20% additional damage and Slam hits with both weapons.

abilitiesData.name: Titan's Grip
abilitiesData.description: Allows you to equip two-handed axes, maces and swords in one hand.

abilitiesData.name: Devastate
abilitiesData.description: Deals 220% weapon damage and sunders the target, causing Weakened Armor.
extra: Replaces Sunder Armor.
Weakened Armor: Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec.  Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Throw
abilitiesData.description: Throws your weapon at the enemy causing damage (based on attack power). This ability causes high threat

abilitiesData.name: Charge
abilitiesData.description: Charges an enemy, stunning it for 1.5 sec.
extra: Generates 20 Rage.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Leap
abilitiesData.description: Leap through the air towards a targeted location, slamming down with destructive force to deal damage on all enemies within 8 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Block
abilitiesData.description: Raise your shield, blocking every melee attack against you for 6 sec. These blocks can be critical blocks.
extra: Maximum 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Heavy Repercussions
abilitiesData.description: While your Shield Block is active, your Shield Slam hits for an additional 100% damage.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Slam
abilitiesData.description: Slam the target with your shield, causing damage (based on attack power).
extra: Generates 20 Rage in Defensive Stance.

abilitiesData.name: Vigilance
abilitiesData.description: Focus your protective gaze on a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30% for 12 sec.
extra: During the duration of Vigilance, your Taunt has no cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Shout
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the physical damage caused by all enemies within 10 yards by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Retaliation
abilitiesData.description: Instantly counterattack any enemy that strikes you in melee for 12 sec. Melee attacks made from behind cannot be counterattacked. A maximum of 20 attacks will cause retaliation.

abilitiesData.name: Sword and Board
abilitiesData.description: Your Devastate has a 30% chance of resetting the cooldown of your Shield Slam and increasing the Rage it generates by 5. Lasts 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Revenge
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attack an enemy and two additional enemies for damage. A successful dodge or parry will reset the cooldown on Revenge.
extra: Generates 20 Rage in Defensive Stance.

abilitiesData.name: Shockwave
abilitiesData.description: Sends a wave of force in front of you, causing damage (based on attack power) and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards in a frontal cone for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Enraged Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals you for 10% of your total health, and an additional 10% over 5 sec.
extra: Can be used while stunned.
Effects are doubled if used while Enraged.

abilitiesData.name: Bastion of Defense
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 6% while in Defensive Stance. In addition, when you block, dodge or parry an attack you have a 20% chance to become Enraged, increasing physical damage done by 10% for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Last Stand
abilitiesData.description: Increases current and maximum health by 30% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Wall
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 40% for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Deep Wounds
abilitiesData.description: Your Mortal Strike, Bloodthirst, and Devastate cause the target to bleed for Physical damage over 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Quickness
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the chance that melee and ranged attackers will hit you by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Health regeneration rate increased by 10%. 10% of total Health regeneration may continue during combat.

abilitiesData.name: Abomination's Might
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee attack power by 20% and ranged attack power by 10% of party and raid members within 100 yards. Also increases your total Strength by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Scarlet Fever
abilitiesData.description: Causes your Blood Boil to refresh your diseases on targets it damages, and your Blood Plague to also afflict enemies with Weakened Blows.
extra: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Horn of Winter
abilitiesData.description: The Death Knight blows the Horn of Winter, which generates 10 Runic Power and increases attack power of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Raise Ally
abilitiesData.description: Pours dark energy into a dead target, reuniting spirit and body to allow the target to reenter battle with 20% health and 20% mana.

abilitiesData.name: Death Strike
abilitiesData.description: Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 185% weapon damage to an enemy and heals you for 20% of the damage you have sustained from non-player sources during the preceding 5 sec (minimum of at least 7% of your maximum health). This attack cannot be parried.

abilitiesData.name: Mastery: Blood Shield
abilitiesData.description: Each time you heal yourslef with Death Stike while in Blood Presence, you gain 50% of the amount healed as a damage absoption shield. Each point of Mastery increases the shiled by an additional 6.25%.

abilitiesData.name: Outbreak
abilitiesData.description: Instantly applies Blood Plague and Frost Fever to the target enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Plague
abilitiesData.description: A disease that deals Shadow damage every 3 sec for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Fever
abilitiesData.description: A disease dealing Frost damage every 3 sec for 30 sec. Caused by Icy Touch and other spells.

abilitiesData.name: Icy Touch
abilitiesData.description: Chills the target for Frost damage and infects them with Frost Fever, a disease that deals periodic damage and reduces melee and ranged attack speed by 20% for 21 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Plague Strike
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that deals 100% weapon damage and infects the target with Blood Plague, a disease dealing Shadow damage over time.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Presence
abilitiesData.description: You assume the presence of Blood, increasing Stamina by 25%, increasing base armor by 55%, and reducing damage taken by 10%. Threat generation is also significantly increased.
extra: Only one Presence may be active at a time, and assuming a new Presence will consume any stored Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Bone Shield-cata
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones.  The shield begins with 6 charges, and each damaging attack consumes a charge. While at least 1 charge remains, you take 20% less damage from all sources. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Tap
abilitiesData.description: Each Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike generates 2 Blood Charges, up to a maximum of 12 charges. Blood Tap consumes 5 Blood Charges to activate a random fully-depleted rune as a Death Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Empower Rune Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Empower your rune weapon, immediately activating all your runes and generating 25 Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Raise Dead
abilitiesData.description: Raises a Ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one Ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Dancing Rune Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Summons a second rune weapon that fights on its own for 12 sec, mirroring the Death Knight's attacks. The rune weapon also assists in defense of its master, granting an additional 20% parry chance while active.

abilitiesData.name: Rune Strike
abilitiesData.description: Strike the target for 200% weapon damage. This attack cannot be dodged, blocked, or parried.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Rites
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you hit with Death Strike or Obliterate, the Frost and Unholy Runes will become Death Runes when they activate. Death Runes count as a Blood, Frost or Unholy Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the enemy, causing 80% weapon damage. Damage is increased by 12.5% for each of your diseases on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Death and Decay
abilitiesData.description: Corrupts the ground targeted by the Death Knight, causing Shadow damage every sec that targets remain in the area for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Pestilence
abilitiesData.description: Spreads existing Blood Plague and Frost Fever infections from your target to all other enemies within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Boil
abilitiesData.description: Boils the blood of all enemies within 10 yards, dealing Shadow damage. Deals 50% additional damage to targets infected with Blood Plague or Frost Fever.

abilitiesData.name: Rune Tap
abilitiesData.description: Converts 1 Blood Rune into 10% of your maximum health.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Blood
abilitiesData.description: Temporarily grants the Death Knight 15% of maximum health and increases the amount of health received from healing spells and effects by 25% for 10 sec. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

abilitiesData.name: Icebound Fortitude
abilitiesData.description: The Death Knight freezes his blood to become immune to Stun effects and reduce all damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Army of the Dead
abilitiesData.description: Summons an entire legion of Ghouls to fight for the Death Knight for 40 sec. The Ghouls will swarm the area, taunting and fighting anything they can. While channeling Army of the Dead, the Death Knight takes less damage equal to his Dodge plus Parry chance.

abilitiesData.name: Anti-Magic Shell
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the Death Knight in an Anti-Magic Shell, absorbing 75% of the damage dealt by harmful spells (up to a maximum of 50% of the Death Knight's health) and preventing application of harmful magical effects. Damage absorbed generates Runic Power. Lasts 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Death Pact
abilitiesData.description: Drain vitality from an undead minion, healing the Death Knight for 50% of his/her maximum health and causing the minion to suffer damage equal to 50% of its maximum health.

abilitiesData.name: Scent of Blood
abilitiesData.description: You have a 15% chance after dodging, parrying or taking direct damage to gain the Scent of Blood effect, causing your next 3 melee hits to generate 10 Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Virulence
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your diseases by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Crimson Scourge
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage dealt by your Blood Boil by 10%, and when you land a melee attack on a target that is infected with your Blood Plague, there is a 10% chance that your next Blood Boil or Death and Decay will consume no runes.

abilitiesData.name: Brittle Bones
abilitiesData.description: Your Frost Fever also applies the Physical Vulnerability effect.
extra: Weakens the constitution of an enemy target, increasing their physical damage taken by 4% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Icy Talons
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%, and your own attack speed by an additional 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Blood of the North
abilitiesData.description: Permanently transforms your Blood Runes into Death Runes. Death Runes count as a Blood, Frost, or Unholy Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Killing Machine
abilitiesData.description: Your autoattacks have a chance to grant a 100% critical strike bonus to your next Obliterate or Frost Strike.

abilitiesData.name: Rime
abilitiesData.description: Your Obliterate has a 45% chance to cause your next Howling Blast or Icy Touch to consume no runes.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the enemy, causing 115% weapon damage as Frost damage.

abilitiesData.name: Runic Empowerment
abilitiesData.description: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate a random fully-depleted rune.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Presence
abilitiesData.description: You are infused with unholy fury, increasing haste by 10%, and movement speed by 15%.
extra: Only one Presence may be active at a time, and assuming a new Presence will consume any stored Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Pillar of Frost
abilitiesData.description: Calls upon the power of Frost to increase the Death Knight's Strength by 20%. Icy crystals hang heavy upon the Death Knight's body, providing immunity against external movement such as knockbacks. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Howling Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing Frost damage to that foe, and Frost damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

abilitiesData.name: Obliterate
abilitiesData.description: A brutal instant attack that deals 250% weapon damage. Total damage is increased by 12.5% for each of your diseases on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Ebon Plaguebringer
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage your diseases deal by 60%, causes your Plague Strike to also apply Frost Fever, and causes your Blood Plague to also apply the Physical Vulnerability effect.
extra: Weakens the constitution of an enemy target, increasing their physical damage taken by 4% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Festering Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant attack that deals 200% weapon damage and increases the duration of your Blood Plague, Frost Fever, and Chains of Ice effects on the target by up to 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Reaping
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you hit with Blood Strike, Pestilence, or Festering Strike, the Runes spent will become Death Runes when they activate. Death Runes count as a Blood, Frost or Unholy Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Infusion
abilitiesData.description: Grants your successful Death Coils a chance to empower your active Ghoul, increasing its damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Transformation
abilitiesData.description: Consume 5 charges of Shadow Infusion on your Ghoul to transform it into a powerful undead monstrosity for 30 sec. The Ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.

abilitiesData.name: Death Coil
abilitiesData.description: Fire a blast of unholy energy, causing Shadow damage to an enemy target or healing damage on a friendly Undead target.

abilitiesData.name: Runic Corruption
abilitiesData.description: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate Runic Corruption, increasing your rune regeneration rate by 100% for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Frenzy
abilitiesData.description: Incites a friendly party or raid member into a killing frenzy for 30 sec. The target is Enraged, increasing their melee and ranged haste by 20%, but causes them to lose health equal to 2% of their maximum health every 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Gargoyle
abilitiesData.description: A Gargoyle flies into the area and bombards the target with Plague damage modified by the Death Knight's attack power. Persists for 30 sec

abilitiesData.name: Scourge Strike
abilitiesData.description: An unholy strike that deals 135% of weapon damage as Physical damage. In addition, for each of your diseases on your target, you deal an additional 25% of the Physical damage done as Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Sudden Doom
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cost of Death Coil by 20%.
extra: While in Unholy Presence, grants your main-hand autoattacks a chance to make your next Death Coil cost no Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Heart Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the target and up to two additional nearby enemies, causing 105% weapon damage on the primary target, with each additional enemy struck taking 50% less damage than the previous target. Damage dealt to each target is increased by an additional 15% for each of your diseases present.

abilitiesData.name: Butchery
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you kill an enemy that grants experience or honor, you generate up to 20 Runic Power. In addition, you generate 2 Runic Power per 5 sec while in combat.

abilitiesData.name: Ignite
abilitiesData.description: Your critical strikes from non-periodic Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 40% of your spell's damage over 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Seals of Command
abilitiesData.description: Your Seal of Righteousness, Seal of Truth, and Seal of Justice now also deal 7% weapon damage when triggered. In addition, your Seal of Righteousness now hits all enemy targets within melee range.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Orb
abilitiesData.description: The priest is surrounded by Shadow Orbs, stacking up to 3 times. When the priest casts Mind Blast or Mind Spike, all Shadow Orbs are consumed, each increasing the spell damage done.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Blood Tap
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Blood Tap ability by 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Anti-Magic Zone
abilitiesData.description: Places a large, stationary Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage done to party or raid members inside it by 40%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Force of Nature
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Treant to assist in the Druid's current combat role for 15 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.
extra:
Balance:
Casts Wrath for 1 Nature damage every 2 sec and will cast Entangling Roots.

Feral:
Melees for Physical damage every 2 sec and will cast Entangling Roots.

Guardian:
Melees for Physical damage every 2 sec and will use Taunt.

Restoration:
Heals a nearby injured ally every 2.5 sec and will use Swiftmend.

abilitiesData.name: Shooting Stars
abilitiesData.description: You have a 30% chance when you deal critical periodic damage with your Moonfire or Sunfire to instantly reset the cooldown of your Starsurge and cause its next cast within 12 sec to be instant.

abilitiesData.name: Ancient Hysteria
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee, ranged, and spell casting speed by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.
extra: Allies receiving this effect will become Sated and be unable to benefit from Bloodlust or Time Warp again for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Ancient Hysteria (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee, ranged, and spell casting speed by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.
extra: Allies receiving this effect will become Sated and be unable to benefit from Bloodlust or Time Warp again for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Eternal Glory
abilitiesData.description: Your Word of Glory has a 30% chance not to consume Holy Power.

abilitiesData.name: Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heal your target.

abilitiesData.name: Instant Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 20% chance of poisoning the enemy which instantly inflicts Nature damage.

abilitiesData.name: Deadly Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour.  Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy for Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal Nature damage.

abilitiesData.name: Coup de Grace
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Lethality
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Mutilate and Hemorrhage abilities by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Bandit's Guile
abilitiesData.description: Your Sinister Strike and Revealing Strike abilities have a 100% chance to grant you an evolving insight into an opponent's defenses, increasing damage to that target by up to 30%. Opponents can adapt over time, negating this benefit, and Striking a different opponent will begin the cycle anew.

abilitiesData.name: Terrifying Roar (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The devilsaur lets out a terrifying roar, increasing the critical strike chance of all party and raid members by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Roar of Courage (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The beast lets out a roar of courage, increasing the mastery of all party and raid members by 3000 within 100 yards. Lasts for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Tear Armor (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Tears at the enemy's armor with the raptor's talons, causing Weakened Armor.
extra: Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Breath (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Breathes lightning, increasing magic damage taken by 5% for 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ravage (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Violently attacks an enemy, causing the enemy target to take 4% increased physical damage for 25 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Gore (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Your boar gores the enemy, causing it to take 30% additional damage from bleed effects for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Qiraji Fortitude (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Increases party and raid members' Stamina by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Flametongue Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Flametongue Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases the spell power of all party and raid members within 40 yards by 6%. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Mangle
abilitiesData.description: Mangle the target for 285% normal damage and causes the target to take 30% additional damage from bleed effects for 1 min. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Tongues
abilitiesData.description: Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30%. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mind-numbing Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 50% chance of poisoning the enemy, increasing their casting time by 30% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Slow
abilitiesData.description: Reduces target's movement speed by 60%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 60% and increases casting time by 30%. Lasts 15 sec. Slow can only affect one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Necrotic Strike
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that deals 100% weapon damage and absorbs the next healing received by the target. For 10 sec, or until the full amount of healing is absorbed, the target's casting time is increased by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Weakness
abilitiesData.description: Target's physical damage done is reduced by 10% for 2 min. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Lichborne
abilitiesData.description: Draw upon unholy energy to become undead for 10 sec. While undead, you are immune to Charm, Fear, and Sleep effects, and Death Coil will heal you.

abilitiesData.name: Earthquake
abilitiesData.description: You cause the earth at the target location to tremble and break, dealing Physical damage every 1 sec to enemies in an 8 yard radius with a 10% chance of knocking down affected targets. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Doomguard
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Doomguard to attack the target for 1 min. Doomguard will cast Doom Bolt until it departs.

abilitiesData.name: Molten Core
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cast time and mana cost of your next Soul Fire spell by 50%.
extra: Lasts 30 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Infernal
abilitiesData.description: Summons a meteor from the Twisting Nether, causing Fire damage and stunning all enemy targets in the area for 2 sec. An Infernal rises from the crater, under the command of the caster for 1 min.
extra: The Infernal deals strong area of effect damage, and will be drawn to attack targets near the impact point.

abilitiesData.name: Sudden Death
abilitiesData.description: Your autoattack and Strikes of Opportunity hits have a 10% chance of resetting the cooldown on your Colossus Smash.
extra: Your Execute hits have a 100% chance of making any Overpower free for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Enrage-alternate
abilitiesData.description: Mortal Strike, Bloodthirst, Colossus Smash, Devastate, and Shield Slam critical strikes and critical blocks Enrage you, generating 10 Rage and increasing physical damage done by 10% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rocket Jump
abilitiesData.description: Activates your rocket belt to jump forward. Other effects which slow the rate of falling cannot be used within 10 sec after using this ability.

abilitiesData.name: Darkflight
abilitiesData.description: Activates your true form, increasing current movement speed by an additional 40% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Presence
abilitiesData.description: Strengthens you with the presence of Frost, increasing Runic Power generation by 20%, and reducing the duration of effects that remove control of your character by 20%.
extra: Only one Presence may be active at a time, and assuming a new Presence will consume any stored Runic Power.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be delayed by damage.

abilitiesData.name: Soulburn: Soul Fire
abilitiesData.description: Burn the enemy's soul, causing Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Embrace
abilitiesData.description: Your Shadow Bolt and Haunt spells apply the Shadow Embrace effect, increasing all Shadow periodic damage dealt to the target by you by 5%. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Surge-cata
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target.

abilitiesData.name: Sprint
abilitiesData.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec. Does not break stealth.

abilitiesData.name: Wound Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a chance of poisoning the enemy, causing Nature damage and reducing all healing effects used on them by 25% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Sin and Punishment
abilitiesData.description: When your Vampiric Touch is dispelled, the dispeller and all nearby enemy targets within 6 yards have a 100% chance to be instantly feared in horror for 3 sec.
extra: When your Mind Flay critically hits, the cooldown of your Shadowfiend is reduced by 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Furious Howl (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The wolf lets out a furious howl, increasing the critical strike chance of all party and raid members by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Thorns
abilitiesData.description: Thorns sprout from the friendly target causing Nature damage to attackers when hit. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Incite
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike by 15%, and gives your Heroic Strike criticals a 100% chance to cause the next Heroic Strike to also be a critical strike. These guaranteed criticals cannot re-trigger the Incite effect.

abilitiesData.name: Throwdown
abilitiesData.description: Knocks the target to the ground and stuns it for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Drums of War R1
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the Rage cost of your Pummel, Demoralizing Shout, Intimidating Shout and Challenging Shout by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Bear Form
abilitiesData.description:
Shapeshift into Bear Form, increasing armor contribution from cloth and leather items by 120% and Stamina by 20%. Significantly increases threat generation, causes Agility to increase attack power, and also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various bear abilities.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of movement slowing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Astral Communion
abilitiesData.description: Commune with the sun and moon, gaining 25 Lunar or Solar energy every 1 sec for 4 sec. Generates the power type most beneficial to you

abilitiesData.name: Incarnation
abilitiesData.description: Grants a superior shapeshifting form appropriate to your specialization for 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this form for the duration of Incarnation.
extra: Balance: Chosen of Elune: Improved Moonkin Form that gains 25% increased Arcane and Nature damage while Eclipse is active.

Feral: King of the Jungle:
Improved Cat Form that allows the use of all abilities which normally require stealth, allows the use of Prowl while in combat, and removes the positional requirement of Ravage.

Guardian: Son of Ursoc:
Improved Bear Form that reduces the cooldown on melee damage abilities and Growl to 1.5 sec.

Restoration: Tree of Life:
Tree of Life Form that increases healing done by 15%, increases armor by 120%, and enhances Lifebloom, Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Entangling Roots spellcasts.

abilitiesData.name: Celestial Alignment
abilitiesData.description: Grants you the simultaneous damage benefit of both your Lunar Eclipse and Solar Eclipse, increasing damage done by your Nature and Arcane spells by 15%. In addition, casting Moonfire also applies the periodic damage effect of Sunfire to your target.
extra: Activating this ability consumes all Lunar and Solar Energy and prevents gaining more during its duration. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Might of Ursoc
abilitiesData.description: Increases current and maximum health by 30% for 20 sec. Activates Bear Form.

abilitiesData.name: Prowl
abilitiesData.description: Allows the Druid to vanish from sight, entering an improved stealth mode, but reduces movement speed by 30%. Lasts until cancelled.

abilitiesData.name: Predatory Swiftness
abilitiesData.description: Your finishing moves have a chance per combo point to make your next Entangling Roots, Healing Touch, Hibernate, or Rebirth become instant, free, and castable in all forms.

abilitiesData.name: Symbiosis
abilitiesData.description: Grants the Druid one ability belonging to the target's class, varying by the Druid's specialization.
extra: In exchange, grants the target one Druid ability based on their class and combat role.
Lasts 1 hour and persists through death.

abilitiesData.name: Dream of Cenarius
abilitiesData.description: The Emerald Dream grants a benefit which varies by your combat specialization.
extra:
Balance:
Increases healing from Healing Touch by 20% and casting Healing Touch increases the damage bonus of your next Eclipse by 25%.

Feral:
Increases healing from Healing Touch by 20% and casting Healing Touch causes your next two melee abilities to deal 30% additional damage.

Guardian:
Increases healing from Healing Touch by 20%, Critical Strike chance of Mangle (Bear) by 10%, and your Mangle (Bear) critical strikes have a 40% chance to make your next Healing Touch or Rebirth instant, free, and castable in all forms, and benefit from Attack Power instead of Spell Power.

Restoration:
Increases Wrath damage by 20% and your Wrath spell causes a nearby ally to be healed for 100% of the damage done.

abilitiesData.name: Savage Defense
abilitiesData.description: Increases chance to dodge by 45% for 6 sec.
extra: Maximum 3 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Tooth and Claw
abilitiesData.description: Your autoattacks in Bear Form have a 40% chance to empower your next Maul for 10 sec. Empowered Maul causes its victim's next autoattack within 15 sec to deal less damage.

abilitiesData.name: Roiling Blood
abilitiesData.description: Your Blood Boil ability now also triggers Pestilence if it strikes a diseased target.

abilitiesData.name: Plague Leech
abilitiesData.description: Draw forth the infection from an enemy, consuming your Blood Plague and Frost Fever diseases on the target to activate two random fully-depleted runes as Death Runes.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Blight
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a vile swarm of unholy insects for 10 sec, stinging all enemies within 10 yards every 1 sec, infecting them with Blood Plague and Frost Fever.

abilitiesData.name: Purgatory
abilitiesData.description: An unholy pact grants you the ability to fight on through damage that would kill mere mortals. When you would sustain fatal damage, you instead are wrapped in a Shroud of Purgatory, absorbing incoming healing equal to the amount of damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.
extra: If any healing absorption remains when Shroud of Purgatory expires, you die. Otherwise, you survive. This effect may only occur every 3 min.

abilitiesData.name: Death's Advance
abilitiesData.description: You passively move 10% faster, and movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 70% of normal movement speed.
extra: When activated, you gain 30% movement speed and may not be slowed below 100% of normal movement speed for 6 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Chilblains
abilitiesData.description: Victims of your Frost Fever disease are Chilled, reducing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Asphyxiate
abilitiesData.description: Lifts an enemy target off the ground and crushes their throat with dark energy, stunning them for 5 sec. Functions as a silence if the target is immune to stuns.
extra: Replaces Strangulate.

abilitiesData.name: Death Siphon
abilitiesData.description: Deal Shadowfrost damage to an enemy, healing the Death Knight for 150% of damage dealt.

abilitiesData.name: Conversion
abilitiesData.description: Continuously converts Runic Power to health, restoring 3% of maximum health every 1 sec. Only base Runic Power generation from spending runes may occur while Conversion is active. This effect lasts until canceled, or Runic Power is exhausted.

abilitiesData.name: Gorefiend's Grasp
abilitiesData.description: Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 20 yards of a target (hostile or friendly), pulling them to the target's location.

abilitiesData.name: Remorseless Winter
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a swirling tempest of frigid air for 8 sec, chilling enemies within 8 yards every 1 sec. Each pulse reduces targets' movement speed by 15% for 3 sec, stacking up to 5 times. Upon receiving a fifth application, an enemy will be stunned for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Desecrated Ground
abilitiesData.description: Corrupts the ground in a 8 yard radius beneath the Death Knight for 10 sec. While standing in this corruption, the Death Knight is immune to effects that cause loss of control. This ability instantly removes such effects when activated.

abilitiesData.name: Feline Swiftness
abilitiesData.description: Increases your movement speed by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Displacer Beast
abilitiesData.description: Teleports the Druid up to 20 yards forward, activates Cat Form, and increases movement speed for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Charge
abilitiesData.description: Fly to a nearby ally's position.

abilitiesData.name: Ysera's Gift
abilitiesData.description: Every 5 sec, heals you for 5% of your maximum health. If you are at full health, the most injured nearby ally will be healed instead.

abilitiesData.name: Renewal
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals the Druid for 30% of maximum health. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Cenarion Ward
abilitiesData.description: Protects a friendly target, causing any damage taken to heal the target every 2 sec for 6 sec. Gaining the healing effect consumes the Cenarion Ward. Useable in all shapeshift forms. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Faerie Swarm
abilitiesData.description: Causes 3 applications of the Weakened Armor debuff and reduces the target's movement speed for 15 sec.
extra: While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.
Deals damage when cast from Bear Form. Useable in all shapeshift forms, but incurs a 6 sec cooldown while in Bear Form or Cat Form.

abilitiesData.name: Mass Entanglement
abilitiesData.description: Roots your target in place for 20 sec and spreads to additional nearby enemies. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Soul of the Forest
abilitiesData.description: Aessina's blessing grants a benefit which varies by your combat specialization.
extra:
Balance:
Your Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge casts have a 8% chance to cause your next Astral Communion to instantly grant 100 Lunar or Solar Power.

Feral:
Your finishing moves grant 4 Energy per combo point.

Guardian:
Mangle (Bear) now generates 30% more Rage and deals 15% more damage.

Restoration:
You gain 100% haste for your next spell when you cast Swiftmend.

abilitiesData.name: Disorienting Roar
abilitiesData.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursol to roar, disorienting all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Any damage caused will remove the effect. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Ursol's Vortex
abilitiesData.description: Conjures a vortex of wind at the destination location that reduces the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%.
extra: The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center.
Lasts 10 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Mighty Bash
abilitiesData.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursoc to stun the target for 5 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

abilitiesData.name: Heart of the Wild
abilitiesData.description: Increases Stamina, Agility, and Intellect by 6% at all times. When activated, dramatically improves the Druid's ability to perform roles outside of Guardian specialization for 45 sec. Grants the following benefits in the listed roles:
extra:
Feral:
While in Cat Form, Agility, Hit Chance, and Expertise increased.

Restoration:
Healing increased and mana cost of all healing spells reduced by 100%. Allows Rejuvenation to be cast while shapeshifted.

Balance:
Spell Damage and Hit Chance increased. Mana cost of all damage spells reduced by 100%.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Vigil
abilitiesData.description: Increases all damage and healing done by 12% for 30 sec. While active, all single-target healing spells also damage a nearby enemy target for 25% of the healing done, and all single-target healing and damage spells and abilities also heal a nearby friendly target for 25% of the amount done.

abilitiesData.name: Posthaste
abilitiesData.description: Your Disengage frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Narrow Escape
abilitiesData.description: When you Disengage, you also activate a web trap which encases all targets within 8 yards in sticky webs, preventing movement for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Chimera
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of Disengage by 10 sec, and the cooldown of Deterrence by 60 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Binding Shot
abilitiesData.description: You fire a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yards of the landing arrow for 10 sec.
extra: If targets move 5 yards from the arrow they are stunned for 5 sec (3 sec PvP) and will be immune to the effects of Binding Shot for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Wyvern Sting
abilitiesData.description: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 30 sec. Any damage will cancel the effect. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Intimidation
abilitiesData.description: Command your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Exhilaration
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals you for 30% and your pet for 100% of total health.

abilitiesData.name: Aspect of the Iron Hawk
abilitiesData.description: The Hunter takes on the aspects of an iron hawk, increasing ranged attack power by 25%, and reducing all damage taken by 10%. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.
extra: Replaces Aspect of the Hawk.

abilitiesData.name: Spirit Bond
abilitiesData.description: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 3% of total health every 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Fervor
abilitiesData.description: Instantly restores 50 Focus to you and your pet and an additional 50 Focus over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dire Beast
abilitiesData.description: Summons a powerful wild beast to attack your target for 15 sec. Each time the beast deals damage, you will gain 5 Focus.

abilitiesData.name: Thrill of the Hunt
abilitiesData.description: You have a 30% chance when you fire a ranged attack that costs Focus or Kill Command to reduce the Focus cost of your next 3 Arcane Shots or Multi-Shots by 20.

abilitiesData.name: A Murder of Crows
abilitiesData.description: Summons a flock of crows to attack your target over the next 30 sec. If used on a target below 20% health, the cooldown is reduced to 60 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Blink Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Your pet's Basic Attacks deal 50% increased damage, can now be used from 30 yards away, and will instantly teleport them behind their target.

abilitiesData.name: Lynx Rush
abilitiesData.description: Your pet rapidly charges from target to target, attacking 9 times over 4 sec. Each attack causes the target to bleed for damage over 15 sec, stacking up to 9 times.
extra: The pet must be within 10 yards of the target to Lynx Rush.

abilitiesData.name: Legacy of the Emperor
abilitiesData.description: You extol the words of the last emperor, increasing Strength, Agility, and Intellect by 5%.
extra: If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Cackling Howl (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The hyena lets out a cackling howl, increasing the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10% for 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Cackling Howl
abilitiesData.description: The hyena lets out a cackling howl, increasing the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10% for 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Serpent's Swiftness (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10% for 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Serpent's Swiftness
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10% for 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Swiftblade's Cunning
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Aura
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee and ranged attack speed of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Grace of Air
abilitiesData.description: Empowering winds swirl around the Shaman, granting all nearby party and raid members 3000 Mastery.

abilitiesData.name: Spirit Beast Blessing (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The spirit beast blesses your allies, increasing the mastery of all party and raid members by 3000 within 100 yards. Lasts for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Legacy of the White Tiger
abilitiesData.description: You honor the White Tiger's legacy, increasing critical strike chance by 5%.
extra: If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

abilitiesData.name: Burning Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Fiery elemental energy emanates from the Shaman, empowering all nearby party and raid members and increasing their spell power by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Judgments of the Bold
abilitiesData.description: Your Judgment hits grant one charge of Holy Power and cause the Physical Vulnerability effect.
extra: Weakens the constitution of an enemy target, increasing their physical damage taken by 4% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Still Water (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Infuses all party and raid members within vision with still water, increasing their spell power by 10% and their critical strike chance by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Energizing Spores (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds all friendly party and raid members with energizing spores, increasing spell haste by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Breath (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: Breathes Fire on the target, increasing magic damage taken by 5% for 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dust Cloud (Pet)
