abilitiesData.description: Your tallstrider kicks up a cloud of dust, causing all enemies within 10 yards to be afflicted by 3 stacks of Weakened Armor.
extra: Weakens the armor of the target by 4% for 30 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Glyph of Colossus Smash
abilitiesData.description: Your Colossus Smash also applies the Sunder Armor effect to your target.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Roar (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The bear roars, reducing the physical damage caused by all enemies within 8 yards by 10% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Keg Smash
abilitiesData.description: You smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yards. Also drenches targets in your Dizzying Haze and applies the Weakened Blows effect. Generates 2 Chi.
extra: Dizzying Haze: You hurl a keg of your finest brew, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50% for 15 sec. Deals a high amount of threat.
Affected targets have a 3% chance to have their melee attacks misfire and strike themselves instead for damage.
Weakened Blows: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Screech (Pet)
abilitiesData.description: The Carrion Bird screeches, reducing the physical damage caused by all enemies within 8 yards by 10% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Banner
abilitiesData.description: Throw down a war banner within 30 yards that decreases the damage dealt by all enemies within 30 yards of the banner by 10%. Lasts 15 sec.
extra: You can Intervene to your war banner.

abilitiesData.name: Rallying Cry
abilitiesData.description: Temporarily grants you and all party or raid members within 30 yards 20% of maximum health for 10 sec. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

abilitiesData.name: Smoke Bomb
abilitiesData.description: Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud. Allies take 20% less damage while within the cloud.

abilitiesData.name: Skull Banner
abilitiesData.description: Throw down a war banner at your feet that increases the critical damage of party or raid members within 40 yards of the banner by 20%. Lasts 10 sec.
extra: You can Intervene to your war banner.

abilitiesData.name: Stormlash Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster, empowering allies within 40 yards with lightning. While empowered, allies' spells and attacks will trigger bursts of electricity, dealing additional Nature damage to their target. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Snake Trap
abilitiesData.description: Place a nature trap that will release several venomous snakes to attack the first enemy to approach. The snakes will die after 15 sec. Trap will exist for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Glaive Toss
abilitiesData.description: You hurl two glaives toward a target, each dealing damage to each enemy struck and reducing movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.  The primary target will take 4 times as much damage from each strike.
extra: The Glaives will return back to you, damaging and snaring targets again as they return.

abilitiesData.name: Rabid
abilitiesData.description: Increases your pet's attack speed by 70% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Beast Cleave
abilitiesData.description: After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all other nearby enemy targets for 75% as much for the next 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Barrage
abilitiesData.description: Rapidly fire a spray of shots forward for 3 sec, dealing a total of 640% weapon damage to the enemy target and an average of 320% weapon damage to each other enemy target in front of you.
extra: Useable while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Deterrence
abilitiesData.description: When activated, causes you to deflect melee attacks, ranged attacks, and spells, and reduces all damage taken by 30%. While Deterrence is active, you cannot attack. Lasts 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rune of Power
abilitiesData.description: Places a Rune of Power on the ground, which lasts for 1 min. While standing within 5 yds of your own Rune of Power, your mana regeneration is increased by 75% and your spell damage is increased by 15%. Only 2 Runes of Power can be placed at one time.
extra: Replaces Evocation.

abilitiesData.name: Alter Time
abilitiesData.description: Alter the fabric of time, causing the caster to return to their current location, health, mana, buffs, and debuffs, when cast a second time, or after 6 sec.
extra: Effect negated if the caster dies within the 6 sec before the effect occurs or moves too far away.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Armor
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell haste by 7%.
extra: If an enemy strikes the caster, their movement is slowed by 30% for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Floes
abilitiesData.description: Allows you to move while casting and channeling the next Mage spell that has a base cast or channel time less than 4 sec. This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown, and accumulates up to 3 charges. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nether Tempest
abilitiesData.description: Places a Nether Tempest on the target which deals Arcane damage over 12 sec. Each time Nether Tempest deals damage, an additional 50% of that damage is also dealt to a random target within 10 yards. This spell is strongest when applied to 3 or 4 targets.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Bomb
abilitiesData.description: Places a Frost Bomb on the target.  After 4 sec, the bomb explodes, dealing Frost damage to the primary target, and Frost damage to all other targets within 10 yds.  All affected targets are slowed by 70% for 2 sec. Frost Bomb's countdown and cooldown are reduced by haste. This spell is strongest when it can hit 5 or more targets with the explosion.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Block
abilitiesData.description: You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells.
extra: Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Greater Invisibility
abilitiesData.description: Instantly makes the caster invisible, reducing all threat, and removing two damage over time effects. While invisible, you are untargetable by enemies.  Lasts 20 sec. Invisibility is cancelled if you perform any actions.
extra: Damage taken is reduced by 90% while invisible and for 3 sec after coming out of invisibility.
Replaces Invisibility.

abilitiesData.name: Temporal Shield
abilitiesData.description: Envelops you in a temporal shield for 4 sec, reducing all damage taken by 15%. 100% of the damage taken while shielded will be healed back over 6 sec. This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Heating Up
abilitiesData.description: Scored a spell critical. A second spell critical in a row will make your next Pyroblast spell instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 25% additional damage.

abilitiesData.name: Inferno Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the enemy for Fire damage, and is guaranteed to critical strike. Upon impact, it spreads any Pyroblast, Ignite, and Combustion effects to up to 3 nearby enemy targets within 10 yards.
extra: Replaces Fire Blast.

abilitiesData.name: Invocation
abilitiesData.description: Removes Evocation's cooldown and reduces its channel period and duration by 50%.
extra: Completing an Evocation causes you to deal 15% increased spell damage, but passively regenerate 50% less mana, for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Frozen Orb
abilitiesData.description: Launches a Frozen Orb forward from the Mage's position, releasing Frostbolts that deals Frost damage to all nearby enemy targets for 10 sec. Grants the Mage 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first reaches a target.
extra: Targets damaged by the Frost Orb are slowed by 30% for 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Light's Hammer
abilitiesData.description: Hurl a Light-infused hammer into the ground, where it will blast a 10 yard area with Arcing Light for 14 sec.
extra: Deals Holy damage to enemies and reduces their movement speed by 50% for 2 sec. Heals allies every 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Selfless Healer
abilitiesData.description: Your successful Judgments reduce the cast time and mana cost of your next Flash of Light by 35% per stack and improves its effectiveness by 20% per stack when used to heal others. Stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Avenger
abilitiesData.description: Abilities that generate Holy Power will deal 30% additional damage and healing, and generate 3 charges of Holy Power for the next 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Sacrifice
abilitiesData.description: Places a Hand on a party or raid member, transferring 30% damage taken to the Paladin. Lasts 12 sec or until the Paladin has transferred 100% of their maximum health.  Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Protection
abilitiesData.description: Places a Hand on a party or raid member, protecting them from all physical attacks for 10 sec, but during that time they cannot attack or use physical abilities.  Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.
extra: Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance.  Causes Forbearance for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Speed of Light
abilitiesData.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Execution Sentence
abilitiesData.description: A hammer slowly falls from the sky, causing Holy damage over 10 sec. This damage is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of damage. Dispelling the effect triggers the final burst.
extra: If used on friendly targets, the falling hammer heals the target for healing over 10 sec. This healing is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of healing. Dispelling the effect triggers the final burst.

abilitiesData.name: Righteous Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases your threat generation while active, making you a more effective tank.

abilitiesData.name: Eternal Flame
abilitiesData.description: Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to place a protective Holy flame on a friendly target, which heals them and additional healing every 3 sec for 30 sec. Healing increased per charge of Holy Power. The heal over time is increased by 50% if used on the Paladin.
extra: Replaces Word of Glory.

abilitiesData.name: Grand Crusader
abilitiesData.description: When you dodge or parry a melee attack you have a chance of refreshing the cooldown on your next Avenger's Shield and causing it to generate a charge of Holy Power if used within 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Halo
abilitiesData.description: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Deals Holy damage to enemies, and heals allies, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Star
abilitiesData.description: Fires a Divine Star in front of you, traveling 24 yds, causing Divine damage to all enemies and healing all allies within 4 yds of its path.
extra: After reaching its destination it will return to you, also dealing damage and healing to all targets in its path.

abilitiesData.name: Spirit Shell
abilitiesData.description: For the next 10 sec, your Heal, Flash Heal, Greater Heal, and Prayer of Healing no longer heal but instead create absorption shields that last 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Void Shift
abilitiesData.description: You and the currently targeted party or raid member swap health percentages. Increases the lower health percentage of the two to 25% if below that amount.

abilitiesData.name: Mindbender
abilitiesData.description: Creates a Mindbender to attack the target. Caster receives 1.75% mana when the Mindbender attacks. Lasts 15 sec.
extra: Replaces Shadowfiend.

abilitiesData.name: Fade
abilitiesData.description: Fade out, temporarily reducing all your threat for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: From Darkness, Comes Light
abilitiesData.description: Discipline, Holy: You have a 15% chance when you Smite or cast a healing spell to cause your next Flash Heal to be instant cast and have no mana cost. Limit 2 charges.
extra: Shadow: Periodic damage from your Vampiric Touch has a 20% chance to cause your next Mind Spike to not consume your damage-over-time effects, become instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 50% additional damage. Limit 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Insight
abilitiesData.description: Discipline: When you cast Penance, there is a 100% chance your next Power Word: Shield will both ignore and not cause the Weakened Soul effect.
extra: Holy: When you cast Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing, there is a 40% chance your next Prayer of Mending will not trigger its cooldown, and will jump to each target instantly.
Shadow: Periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast within 12 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

abilitiesData.name: Cascade
abilitiesData.description: Launches a Holy bolt at the target that grows in power as it travels, which causes damage to an enemy, or healing an ally.
extra: This effect can bounce from allies to other allies, or from enemies to other enemies. Each time it bounces it will split into 2 bolts, preferring farther away targets, and never hitting the same target twice. Cascade can bounce up to 4 times.

abilitiesData.name: Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heal your target.

abilitiesData.name: Lightwell
abilitiesData.description: Creates a Holy Lightwell. Every 1 sec the Lightwell will attempt to heal party and raid members lower than 50% health every 2 for 6 sec. Attacks done to the target equal to 30% of your total health will cancel the effect. Lightwell lasts for 3 min or until 15 heals are expended.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Embrace
abilitiesData.description: Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy, causing you and your allies to be healed for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal, split evenly between them. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dispatch
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that exploits the vulnerability of foes with less than 35% health remaining, causing 645% weapon damage to the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 1 combo point.
extra: Replaces Sinister Strike.

abilitiesData.name: Blindside
abilitiesData.description: Performing a successful Mutilate has a 30% chance of leaving you in an advantageous position, enabling a single use of Dispatch with no energy cost, regardless of the enemy target's health.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Blades
abilitiesData.description: Draw upon the surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your autoattacks to deal pure Shadow damage and your combo-point-generating abilities to generate an additional combo point when used. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Leeching Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Your melee attacks have a 50% chance to poison the target for 10 sec. Your subsequent weapon strikes against the poisoned target will heal you for 10% of damage dealt.

abilitiesData.name: Redirect
abilitiesData.description: Transfers any existing combo points to the current enemy target. Requires active combo points.

abilitiesData.name: Cloak of Shadows
abilitiesData.description: Instantly removes all existing harmful spell effects, provides a brief moment of immunity against magical damage and harmful effects, and then causes you to resist all spells for 5 sec. Does not remove effects that prevent you from using Cloak of Shadows.

abilitiesData.name: Evasion
abilitiesData.description: Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Combat Readiness
abilitiesData.description: Enter into a state of heightened awareness, deflecting enemy weapon strikes with increasing effectiveness. Successive attacks will deal 10% less damage per application, stacking 5 times.
extra: Lasts for 20 sec, but if 10 sec elapse without any incoming weapon strikes, this state will end.

abilitiesData.name: Feint
abilitiesData.description: Performs an evasive maneuver, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 50% for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Anticipation-cata
abilitiesData.description: When one of your attacks generates a combo point on a target that already has 5 combo points, you gain an Anticipation charge, up to a maximum of 5.
extra: When you perform an offensive finishing move on an enemy, any Anticipation charges are consumed to grant you an equal number of combo points on that target.

abilitiesData.name: Crimson Tempest
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that consumes combo points on any nearby target to slash at the flesh of all enemies within 8 yards, dealing Physical damage and causing victims to bleed and suffer an additional 240% of the initial damage over 12 sec:
extra: 1 point: X damage
2 points: X damage
3 points:  X damage
4 points X damage
5 points: X damage

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Blast
abilitiesData.description: Harness and direct the raw power of the elements towards an enemy target, dealing Elemental damage and increasing the caster's Agility, Critical Strike, Haste, or Mastery by 3500 for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ascendance
abilitiesData.description: The Shaman surrenders his physical form to the power of the elements, gaining the ability to transform into a being of raw elemental energy for 15 sec.
extra: Elemental: While in the form of a Flame Ascendant, Lava Burst has no cooldown and Chain Lightning is empowered to become Lava Beam.
Enhancement: While in the form of an Air Ascendant, autoattacks and Stormstrike deal pure Nature damage and have a 30-yard range.
Restoration: While in the form of a Water Ascendant, all healing done is duplicated and distributed evenly among nearby allies.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Beam
abilitiesData.description: Unleash a blast of superheated flame at the enemy, dealing Fire damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects up to 5 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Spirit Walk
abilitiesData.description: Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Stormblast
abilitiesData.description: Hurl a staggering lightning blast at an enemy, dealing Nature damage equal to 380% weapon damage and granting you an additional 25% chance to critically strike that enemy with your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lightning Shield, and Earth Shock for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Tide Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Water Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 10 sec. The Healing Tide Totem pulses every 2 sec, healing the 5 (12 in 25 player instances) most injured party or raid members within 40 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Ancestral Guidance
abilitiesData.description: When you deal direct damage or healing for the next 10 sec, 40% of damage or 60% of healing is copied as healing to up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members.

abilitiesData.name: Shamanistic Rage
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and causes your skills, totems, and offensive spells to consume no mana for 15 sec. This spell is usable while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Astral Shift
abilitiesData.description: Seek haven by shifting partially into the elemental planes, reducing damage taken by 40% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Reinforce
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the elemental's creator with an earthen shield, reducing all damage taken by 20%, and increasing healing done by 10%, while the channel continues.

abilitiesData.name: Primal Elementalist
abilitiesData.description: Your Earth and Fire Elemental Totems draw forth powerful primal elementals directly from the elemental planes. These servitors are 80% more powerful than regular elementals, act as pets directly under your control, and gain additional abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Empower
abilitiesData.description: Empowers the elemental's creator with fiery energy, increasing all damage dealt by 5%, and healing done by 10%, while the channel continues.

abilitiesData.name: Conductivity
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Healing Wave, Greater Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Chain Heal, your Healing Rain's duration is increased by 4 sec.
extra: When you cast Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Earth Shock, or use Stormstrike, your Healing Rain's duration is increased by 4 sec.
classes: This cannot cause Healing Rain to last longer than 40 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Unleash Life
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes the Earthliving enchantment upon the Shaman's weapon, healing a friendly target and increasing the effect of the Shaman's next direct heal or Healing Rain by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Soul: Misery
abilitiesData.description: Infuses your soul with the misery of fallen foes, increasing spell haste by 30% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Malefic Grasp
abilitiesData.description: Binds the target in twilight, causing Shadow damage over 4 sec.
extra: Every 1 sec, when Malefic Grasp deals damage, it causes all of your other periodic Affliction damage effects to instantly deal 30% of their normal periodic damage.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Terrorguard
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Terrorguard to attack the target for 1 min. The Terrorguard casts Doom Bolt until it departs.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Abyssal
abilitiesData.description: Summons a meteor from the Twisting Nether, causing Fire damage and stunning all enemy targets in the area for 2 sec. An Abyssal rises from the crater, under the command of the caster for 1 min.
extra: The Abyssal deals strong area of effect damage, and will be drawn to attack targets near the impact point.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Observer
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Observer under the command of the Warlock.
extra: Observers are drawn to magic and heal themselves by stealing beneficial magic effects from enemies.

abilitiesData.name: Life Tap
abilitiesData.description: Restores mana.

abilitiesData.name: Unending Resolve
abilitiesData.description: The Warlock hardens his skin, reducing all damage taken by 40% and preventing his spells from being interrupted or silenced for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Healthstone
abilitiesData.description: Instantly restores 20% of your health. (2 min cooldown)

abilitiesData.name: Mortal Coil
abilitiesData.description: Causes the enemy target to run in horror for 3 sec. The caster restores 15% of their maximum health.

abilitiesData.name: Grimoire of Service
abilitiesData.description: Instantly summon a second demon, who fights for 20 sec. The demon will instantly use one of their special abilities when summoned:
extra: Grimoire: Imp: Immediately cleanses a hostile magic effect from their master.
Grimoire: Voidwalker Immediately taunts their target when summoned.
Grimoire: Succubus Immediately seduces their target if it is Humanoid.
Grimoire: Felhunter Immediately interrupts their target when summoned.
Grimoire: Felguard Immediately stuns their target when summoned.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Soul: Knowledge
abilitiesData.description: Your soul is infused with demonic knowledge, increasing the effects of Mastery: Master Demonologist by an additional 30% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Imp Swarm
abilitiesData.description: Summons 4 Wild Imps from the Twisting Nether to attack the target.
extra: The Wild Imps passive effect is disabled while Imp Swarm is on cooldown. Imp Swarm's cooldown is reduced by spell haste. Also increases Wild Imp's cooldown by 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Doom
abilitiesData.description: Inflicts impending doom upon the target, causing 4674 Shadow damage over 1 min.
extra: When Doom critically strikes, a Wild Imp will be summoned to attack the target.

abilitiesData.name: Touch of Chaos
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes energy at the enemy, causing Chaos damage and extending the duration of Corruption.

abilitiesData.name: Mannoroth's Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases the area of your area of effect by 500% and damage by 100% of your Seed of Corruption, Hellfire, Immolation Aura and Rain of Fire for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Void Ray
abilitiesData.description: Deals Shadowflame damage to all enemies in a 20 yard line.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Soul: Instability
abilitiesData.description: Infuses your soul with unstable power, increasing your critical strike chance by 30% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Fire and Brimstone
abilitiesData.description: Your Immolate, Incinerate, Conflagrate, and Curse spells consume a Burning Ember and will hit all targets within 10 yards of the target and deal 43.4% of their normal damage.

abilitiesData.name: Dragon Roar
abilitiesData.description: Roar ferociously, causing damage to all enemies within 8 yards, knocking them back and knocking them down for 0.50 sec. Dragon Roar is always a critical strike and ignores all armor on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Storm Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Hurl your weapon at an enemy, causing 125% weapon damage and stunning the target for 4 sec. Deals 500% weapon damage to targets that are permanently immune to stuns.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Strike
abilitiesData.description: A quick strike with your off-hand weapon that deals 230% weapon damage and causes Mortal Wounds on the target.
extra: Mortal Wounds: Grievously wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing received for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Meat Cleaver
abilitiesData.description: Dealing damage with Whirlwind increases the number of targets your next Raging Blow will hit by 1. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Using Raging Blow will consume this effect.

abilitiesData.name: Defensive Stance
abilitiesData.description: A tanking combat stance.
extra: Decreases damage taken by 25%.
Significantly increases threat generation.
Generates 1 Rage every 3 sec while in combat.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodbath
abilitiesData.description: For the next 12 sec, causes your melee special attacks to deal an additional 30% damage as a bleed over 6 sec. While bleeding, the target moves at 50% reduced speed.

abilitiesData.name: Weakened Blows
abilitiesData.description: Demoralizes the target, reducing their physical damage dealt by 10% for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Raise your shield, absorbing damage for the next 6 sec.
extra: Consumes up to 60 Rage to increase the amount absorbed. Absorption amount increases with attack power.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Reaper
abilitiesData.description: Strikes an enemy for 130% weapon damage and afflicts the target with Soul Reaper. After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health, this effect will deal Shadow damage. If the enemy dies before this effect triggers, the Death Knight gains 50% haste for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Black Ox Statue
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location. Lasts for 15 min. Only one Black Ox Statue can be summoned at any one time.
extra: The Black Ox Statue interacts with your Provoke and Leer of the Ox abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Expel Harm
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals yourself, and causes 50% of the amount healed to instantly be dealt to a nearby enemy as Nature damage within 10 yards. Generates 1 Chi.

abilitiesData.name: Tiger Palm
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: Attack with the palm of your hand, dealing damage.
extra: Also grants you Tiger Power, causing your attacks to ignore 30% of enemies' armor for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Blackout Kick
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: Kick with a blast of Chi energy, dealing Physical damage.
extra: Mistweaver: Also empowers you with Serpent's Zeal, causing you and your summoned Jade Serpent Statue to heal nearby injured targets equal to 25% of your auto-attack damage.
Windwalker: If behind the target, you deal an additional 20% damage over 4 sec. If in front of the target, you are instantly healed for 20% of the damage done.

abilitiesData.name: Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger
abilitiesData.description: Invokes the White Tiger Celestial, summoning an effigy at the command of the caster. The effigy will assist you, attacking your primary target and also inflicting tiger lightning every 1 sec to 3 nearby enemies within 10 yards dealing damage. Lasts for 45 sec.
extra: Brewmaster: Xuen will also taunt the target, forcing it to attack him.

abilitiesData.name: Stance of the Sturdy Ox
abilitiesData.description: Reduces damage taken by 25%, increases Energy regeneration by 10%, reduces the chance to be critically hit by 6%, increases your Stamina by 20% and allows you to Stagger damage.
extra: Stagger: You shrug off physical attacks, causing 80% of the damage to happen instantly and the remaining 20% to be divided over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Tiger Power
abilitiesData.description: Your attacks ignore 30% armor.

abilitiesData.name: Shuffle
abilitiesData.description: You become adept in the ways of the Brewmaster, amplifying three of your abilities.
extra: Fortifying Brew: Also increases your Stagger amount by 20% while active.
Tiger Palm: Tiger Palm no longer costs Chi, and when you deal damage with Tiger Palm the amount of your next Guard is increased by 15%. Lasts 30 sec.
Blackout Kick: After you Blackout Kick, you gain Shuffle, increasing your parry chance by 20% and your Stagger amount by an additional 20% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Elusive Brew
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to dodge melee and ranged attacks by 30% for 1 sec per stack of Elusive Brew active, consuming your Elusive Brew charges.

abilitiesData.name: Purifying Brew
abilitiesData.description: Instantly purifies all of your staggered damage.

abilitiesData.name: Touch of Death
abilitiesData.description: You exploit the enemy target's weakest point, instantly killing them.
extra: Only usable on non-player targets who have equal or less health than you.

abilitiesData.name: Chi Wave
abilitiesData.description: You cause a wave of Chi energy to flow through friend and foe, dealing Nature damage or healing. Bounces up to 7 times to the nearest targets within 25 yards.
extra: When bouncing to allies, Chi Wave will prefer those injured over full health.

abilitiesData.name: Jab
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: You Jab the target, dealing damage and generating 1 Chi.

abilitiesData.name: Rushing Jade Wind
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: You summon a whirling tornado around you which deals damage to all nearby enemies every 0.75 sec, within 8 yards. Generates 1 Chi, if it hits at least 3 targets. Lasts 6 sec.
extra: Replaces Spinning Crane Kick.

abilitiesData.name: Breath of Fire
abilitiesData.description: Breathes fire causing damage to all targets in front of you within 8 yards.
extra: If Dizzying Haze is on the target, they will burn for an additional damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Avert Harm
abilitiesData.description: You cause 20% of all damage party and raid members within 10 yards take to be re-directed to you. Lasts for 6 sec.
extra: The damage received through Avert Harm can be Staggered. Avert Harm is cancelled if you reach 10% or lower health.

abilitiesData.name: Guard
abilitiesData.description: You Guard against future attacks, absorbing damage for 30 sec.
extra: Any heals you apply to yourself while Guarding are increased by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Fortifying Brew
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: Turns your skin to stone, increasing your health by 20%, and reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Zen Meditation
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 90% and redirects to you up to 5 harmful spells cast against party and raid members within 30 yards. Lasts 8 sec.
extra: Being the victim of a melee attack will break your meditation, cancelling the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Diffuse Magic
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by 90% and clears all magical effects on you, reversing them back to their original caster if within 40 yards if possible. Lasts for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dampen Harm
abilitiesData.description: You dampen the damage from the most harmful attacks done to you. The next 3 attacks within 45 sec that deal damage equal to 20% or more of your total health are reduced by half.
extra: Dampen Harm can be cast while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Stance of the Wise Serpent
abilitiesData.description: Increases healing done by 20%, replaces your Energy resource with Mana, grants hit and expertise equal to 50% Spirit gained from items or effects.
extra: Increases haste from items by 50%. Your attack power is equal to 200% of your spell power, and you no longer benefit from other sources of attack power.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Jade Serpent Statue
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Jade Serpent Statue at the target location. Lasts for 15 min. Only one statue can be active at a time.
extra: Eminence (Passive): When the Monk deals non-autoattack damage, the summoned Jade Serpent Statue will heal the lowest health nearby target within 20 yards equal to 25% of the damage done.
Serpent's Accord (Passive): When you cast Soothing Mist, the Jade Serpent Statue will also cast Soothing Mist on an injured ally within 40 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Serpent's Zeal
abilitiesData.description: When you Blackout Kick, you gain Serpent's Zeal causing you and your summoned Jade Serpent Statue to heal nearby injured targets equal to 25% of your auto-attack damage.

abilitiesData.name: Muscle Memory
abilitiesData.description: When you successfully Jab or damage at least 3 enemies with Spinning Crane Kick, you gain Muscle Memory, causing your next Tiger Palm or Blackout Kick to deal 150% increased damage and restore 4% mana.

abilitiesData.name: Spinning Crane Kick
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: You spin while kicking the air, dealing damage to all nearby enemies every 0.75 sec, within 8 yards. Movement speed is reduced by 30%. Generates 1 Chi, if it hits at least 3 targets. Lasts 2.25 sec.
extra: During Spinning Crane Kick, you can continue to dodge and parry.

abilitiesData.name: Crackling Jade Lightning
abilitiesData.cost: 1.57% mana per sec / 20 Energy per sec
abilitiesData.requirement: Serpent Stance, Ox Stance, Tiger Stance
abilitiesData.description: Channels Jade lightning at the target, causing Nature damage over 6 sec. When dealing damage, you have a 30% chance to generate 1 Chi.
extra: If the enemy attacks you within melee range while victim to Crackling Jade Lightning, they are knocked back a short distance. This effect has an 8 sec cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Surging Mist
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target. Generates 1 Chi.
extra: If cast while channeling Soothing Mist, Surging Mist will be instant cast and heal that target over all others.

abilitiesData.name: Vital Mists
abilitiesData.description: You become adept in the ways of the Mistweaver, amplifying four of your abilities.
extra: Crackling Jade Lightning: Damage increased by 100%.
Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%. When you Tiger Palm, you gain Vital Mists, reducing the cast time and mana cost of your next Surging Mist by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 30 sec.

Blackout Kick: Blackout Kick also hits 4 additional nearby targets for 50% damage.
When you Blackout Kick, you gain Serpent's Zeal causing yo and your summoned Jade Serpent Statue to heal nearby injured targets equal to 25% of your auto-attack damage.
Spinning Crane Kick: While channeling Spinning Crane Kick, you also heal nearby injured allies every 0.75 sec for 2.25 sec. Healing yourself does not count for Chi generation

abilitiesData.name: Chi Burst
abilitiesData.description: You summon a torrent of Chi energy and hurl it forward, up to 40 yds, dealing Nature damage to all enemies, and healing to all allies in its path. Chi Burst will always heal the Monk.
extra: While casting Chi Burst, you continue to dodge, parry, and auto-attack.

abilitiesData.name: Chi Torpedo
abilitiesData.description: Torpedo a distance in front of you, dealing Nature damage to all enemies and healing to all allies in your path.
extra: Chi Torpedo replaces Roll, and travels farther than Roll.

abilitiesData.name: Uplift
abilitiesData.description: Heals all targets with your Renewing Mist active for 1.

abilitiesData.name: Thunder Focus Tea
abilitiesData.description: You receive a jolt of energy, doubling the healing done by your next Surging Mist or causing your next Uplift to refresh the duration of your Renewing Mists on all targets. Lasts for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Renewing Mist
abilitiesData.description: You surround the target with healing mists, restoring health every 2 sec for 18 sec. Generates 1 Chi.
extra: Each time Renewing Mist heals, it also travels to the closest nearby injured friendly target within 20 yards, up to 2 times.

abilitiesData.name: Enveloping Mist
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target over 6 sec, and increases the healing the target receives from your Soothing Mist by 30%.
extra: If cast while channeling Soothing Mist, Enveloping Mist will be instant cast.

abilitiesData.name: Soothing Mist
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target over 8 sec.
extra: When you heal with Soothing Mist, you have a 30% chance to generate 1 Chi.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Tea
abilitiesData.description: Consumes up to 2 Mana Tea stacks, restoring 4% mana for each stack.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Sphere
abilitiesData.description: You form a Healing Sphere out of healing mists at the target location for 1 min. If allies walk through it, they consume the sphere, healing themselves.
extra: Maximum of 3 Healing Spheres can be active by the Monk at any given time.
If the Healing Sphere expires before being used, an ally nearby within 6 yards of the sphere will be healed for 50% of the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Revival
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals all party and raid members within 100 yards, and clears them of any harmful Magical, Poison and Disease effects.

abilitiesData.name: Life Cocoon
abilitiesData.description: Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy, absorbing damage and increasing all periodic healing taken by 50%. Lasts for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Chi Brew
abilitiesData.description: Instantly restores 2 Chi, and generates 2 stacks of Mana Tea. Maximum 2 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Rising Sun Kick
abilitiesData.description: You kick upwards, dealing damage and applying Mortal Wounds to the target.
extra: Also causes all targets within 8 yards to take an increased 20% damage from your abilities for 15 sec.
Mortal Wounds: Grievously wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing received for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Tigereye Brew
abilitiesData.description: For each 4 Chi you consume through use of abilities and attacks, you gain a charge of Tigereye Brew. Use Tigereye Brew to consume the charges, granting you 6% increased damage and healing for 15 sec.
extra: Tigereye Brew can stack up to 20 times, but you can only consume up to 10 stacks at a time for 60% increased damage.

abilitiesData.name: Fists of Fury
abilitiesData.description: Pummel all targets in front of you with rapid hand strikes, stunning them and dealing damage immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. Damage is spread evenly over all targets.

abilitiesData.name: Stance of the Fierce Tiger
abilitiesData.description: Increases your movement speed by 10%, increases damage done by 10% and increases the amount of Chi generated by your Jab and Expel Harm abilities by 1.

abilitiesData.name: Energizing Brew
abilitiesData.description: Regenerates 60 Energy over 6 sec. Can only be used while in combat.

abilitiesData.name: Combo Breaker
abilitiesData.description: You have a 12% chance when you Jab to cause your next Tiger Palm or Blackout Kick to cost no Chi within 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Storm, Earth, and Fire
abilitiesData.description: The Monk splits, summoning an   elemental spirit to attack the target. The Monk can split into up to 2 elemental spirits at a time.
extra: The spirits will attack their targets and mirror your damaging abilities. However, for each elemental spirit summoned the Monk's own damage will be reduced.
1 Spirit Summoned - Monk and spirit deal 70% of the Monk's normal damage.
2 Spirits Summoned - Monk and spirits deal 55% of the Monk's normal damage.
The elemental spirits will last until the Monk cancels the effect or their target dies or is otherwise unavailable.

abilitiesData.name: Touch of Karma
abilitiesData.description: All damage you take is redirected to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec instead of you. Damage cannot exceed your total health. Lasts for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Survival Instincts
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 50% for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Wild Mushroom: Bloom
abilitiesData.description: Causes your Wild Mushroom to bloom, healing all allies within 10 yards.
extra: Bonus healing on the Wild Mushroom will be divided across all targets healed.

abilitiesData.name: Ironbark
abilitiesData.description: The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing all damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Pyroblast!
abilitiesData.description: Getting two direct-damage critical strikes in a row will make your next Pyroblast spell instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 25% additional damage.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Shield-mop
abilitiesData.description: Protects you from all damage and spells for 8 sec, but reduces all damage you deal by 50%. Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance.  Causes Forbearance for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
abilitiesData.description: Destruction: You sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, increase the power of many of your single target spells by 15% and regenerate 2% of maximum health every 5 sec. Lasts for 1 hour.
extra: Affliction: You sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, increase the power of many of your single target spells by 20% and regenerate 2% of maximum health every 5 sec. Lasts for 1 hour.
Demonology: You sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, increase the power of many of your single target spells by 25% and regenerate 2% of maximum health every 5 sec. Lasts for 1 hour.

abilitiesData.name: Powershot
abilitiesData.description: You wind up a powerful shot, which deals 600% weapon damage to the target and 300% weapon damage to all enemies in between you and the target.
extra: Enemies hit by Powershot are also knocked back.

abilitiesData.name: Blazing Speed
abilitiesData.description: Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by 150% for 1.50 sec.
extra: This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Flameglow
abilitiesData.description: Protects you with fiery energy, absorbing damage from each attack against you (up to a maximum of 30% of the attack).

abilitiesData.name: Ring of Frost
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Ring of Frost at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become frozen for 10 sec. Lasts 10 sec. 10 yd radius. Limit 10 targets.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Ward
abilitiesData.description: Places an Ice Ward on a friendly target. When an enemy strikes the target, all enemies within 10 yds will become frozen in place for 5 sec. 1 charge. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frostjaw
abilitiesData.description: Silences and freezes the target in place for 8 sec. Lasts half as long versus Player targets. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Cauterize
abilitiesData.description: An attack which would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 50% of your maximum health, and you will burn for 40% of your maximum health over the next 6 sec.
extra: Cauterize cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Incanter's Ward
abilitiesData.description: Places a magical ward on you, absorbing damage for 8 sec. Absorbed damage will restore up to 18% of your maximum mana.
extra: When this effect ends, you gain up to 15% increased spell damage for 25 sec, based on the absorption used.

Passive:
Increases spell damage by 6% and increases mana regeneration by 65%. This effect is deactivated while Incanter's Ward is on cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Celerity
abilitiesData.description: Allows you to Roll and Chi Torpedo more often, increases their maximum number of charges by 1, and reduces their cooldown by 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Tiger's Lust
abilitiesData.description: Instantly clears the target of all immobilizing and movement impairing effects, and increases their movement speed by 70% for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Momentum
abilitiesData.description: Every time you Roll or Chi Torpedo, your movement speed is increased by 25% for 10 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

abilitiesData.name: Zen Sphere
abilitiesData.description: Forms a Zen Sphere above the target, healing the target and dealing Nature damage to the nearest enemy within 10 yards of the target every 2 sec for 16 sec. Only two Zen Spheres can be summoned at any one time.
extra: If the target of the Zen Sphere reaches 35% or lower health or if the Zen Sphere is dispelled or expires it will detonate, dealing Nature damage and healing to all targets within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Power Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Every 20 sec, you gain Power Strikes, causing your next Jab, Soothing Mist, Spinning Crane Kick, Expel Harm, or Crackling Jade Lightning to generate 1 additional Chi.
extra: If you are already at maximum Chi, a Chi Sphere will be summoned near you.

abilitiesData.name: Ascension
abilitiesData.description: Increases your maximum Chi by 1, your maximum mana by 15%, and your energy regen by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Ring of Peace
abilitiesData.description: Forms a sanctuary around the friendly target, instantly silencing all enemies for 3 sec and disarming them for 4 sec. In addition, enemies within the Ring of Peace who attack or cast harmful spells will be disarmed for an additional 4 sec or silenced for an additional 3 sec. Ring of Peace lasts for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Charging Ox Wave
abilitiesData.description: A mighty Ox effigy rushes forward 30 yards in front of you, stunning all enemies within its path for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Leg Sweep
abilitiesData.description: You knock down all enemies within 5 yards, effectively stunning them for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Elixirs
abilitiesData.description: Every 18 sec, you gain Healing Elixirs.
extra: Healing Elixirs heals you for 15% of your total health the next time a damaging attack brings you below 35% of your maximum health, or you drink a Brew or Tea while injured.

abilitiesData.name: Long Arm of the Law
abilitiesData.description: A successful Judgment increases your movement speed by 45% for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Pursuit of Justice-cata
abilitiesData.description: You gain 15% movement speed at all times, plus an additional 5% movement speed for each current charge of Holy Power up to 3.

abilitiesData.name: Fist of Justice
abilitiesData.description: Stuns the target for 6 sec.
extra: Replaces Hammer of Justice.

abilitiesData.name: Repentance
abilitiesData.description: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 1 min. Any damage from sources other than Censure will awaken the target. Usable against Demons, Dragonkin, Giants, Humanoids and Undead.

abilitiesData.name: Evil is a Point of View
abilitiesData.description: Your Turn Evil now also affects Humanoids and Beasts.

abilitiesData.name: Sacred Shield
abilitiesData.description: Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec. The shield absorbs damage every 6 sec.
extra: Can be active only on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Purity
abilitiesData.description: Places a Hand on the friendly target, reducing damage taken by 10% and damage from harmful periodic effects by an additional 80% (less for some creature attacks) for 6 sec. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Unbreakable Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection and Lay on Hands by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Clemency
abilitiesData.description: You can use Hand of Freedom, Hand of Protection, Hand of Sacrifice and Hand of Salvation twice each before incurring their cooldowns.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Prism
abilitiesData.description: Sends a beam of light toward a target, turning them into a prism for Holy energy.
extra: If an enemy is the prism, they take Holy damage and radiate healing to 5 nearby allies within 15 yards.
If an ally is the prism, they are healed for and radiate Holy damage to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Void Tendrils
abilitiesData.description: Summons Shadowy tendrils out of the ground, rooting up to 5 enemy targets within 8 yards of the caster for 20 sec. Killing the tendril will cancel the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Psyfiend
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Psyfiend that stands in place for 10 sec. The Psyfiend casts a Psychic Terror on a nearby enemy within 20 yards every 2 sec, preferring anything attacking the Priest.
extra: Psychic Terror causes enemies to flee for 30 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Dominate Mind
abilitiesData.description: Controls a mind up to level 4 for 30 sec. Does not work versus Mechanical beings.

abilitiesData.name: Body and Soul
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Power Word: Shield or Leap of Faith, you increase the target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Angelic Feather
abilitiesData.description: Place a feather at the target location. If allies walk through it, they gain 80% increased movement speed for 6 sec.
extra: Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time. Accumulates an additional charge once every 10 sec. Maximum 3 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Phantasm
abilitiesData.description: When you Fade, you remove all movement impairing effects from yourself, and your movement speed is unhindered for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Solace and Insanity
abilitiesData.description: Discipline, Holy: You gain the Power Word: Solace ability.
extra: Shadow: Casting Mind Flay while your target is affected by your Devouring Plague causes your Mind Flay to deal 33% additional damage per orb consumed by Devouring Plague.
Power Word: Solace: Strike an enemy with the power of the heavens, dealing Holy damage and an additional Holy damage over 7 sec and restoring 1% of maximum mana.
Damage dealt by Power Word: Solace will instantly heal a nearby low health friendly target within 40 yards from the enemy target for 100% of the damage dealt (50% when healing the Priest).
Replaces Holy Fire.

abilitiesData.name: Desperate Prayer
abilitiesData.description: Instantly heals the caster for 30% of their total health.

abilitiesData.name: Spectral Guise
abilitiesData.description: Your shadow blurs into the darkness, leaving your true form behind. As a shadow you are stealthed, but remain in combat. Lasts 6 sec or until your true form is hit by 3 direct attacks.

abilitiesData.name: Angelic Bulwark
abilitiesData.description: Anytime a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 20% of your total health lasting for 20 sec.
extra: This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Twist of Fate
abilitiesData.description: After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, you deal 15% increased damage and healing for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nightstalker
abilitiesData.description: Increases your movement speed while stealthed by 20%, and the damage your abilities deal while stealthed by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Subterfuge
abilitiesData.description: Your Stealth breaks 3 sec after dealing or receiving hostile actions, rather than doing so immediately.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Focus-cata
abilitiesData.description: Abilities cost 75% less Energy while you are stealthed.

abilitiesData.name: Deadly Throw
abilitiesData.description:
Finishing move that reduces the movement speed of the target by 50% for 6 sec. If performed with 3 combo points, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for a period of time.
Damage dealt:
extra: 1 point: X Damage
2 points: X Damage
3 points: X Damage
4 points: X Damage
5 points: X Damage

abilitiesData.name: Nerve Strike
abilitiesData.description: A successful Kidney Shot or Cheap Shot also reduces the damage dealt by the target by 50% (25% on player targets) and healing done by the target by 10% for 6 sec after the effect fades.

abilitiesData.name: Cheat Death
abilitiesData.description: An attack that would otherwise be fatal will instead reduce you to no less than 10% of your maximum health, and damage taken will be reduced by 85% for 3 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once per 90 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Elusiveness
abilitiesData.description: Your Feint ability also reduces all damage taken by 30% for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilitiesData.description: Your Ambush, Garrote, and Cheap Shot abilities can now be used from 40 yards away, and will cause you to appear behind your target.

abilitiesData.name: Burst of Speed
abilitiesData.description: Increases movement speed by 70% for 4 sec and removes any movement-slowing effects. Does not break stealth.

abilitiesData.name: Prey on the Weak
abilitiesData.description: When you disable an enemy with Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Gouge, Sap, or Blind, they suffer 10% increased damage from all sources for the duration of the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Paralytic Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 20% chance of poisoning the enemy. Stacks up to 4 times on a single target, and upon a fourth application, the enemy will be stunned for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dirty Tricks
abilitiesData.description: Your Gouge and Blind no longer have an Energy cost, and no longer break from damage dealt by your Poison and Bleed effects.

abilitiesData.name: Shuriken Toss
abilitiesData.description: A ranged attack that deals Physical damage to an enemy target. If the enemy is farther than 10 yards away, your autoattacks will be replaced with ranged shuriken for up to 10 sec, granting them a 30 yd range. Shurikens are coated in your Lethal Poison. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Marked for Death
abilitiesData.description: Mark the target, instantly generating 5 combo points on them. If the target dies within 1 min Marked for Death's cooldown is reset.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Guardian
abilitiesData.description: Whenever a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, your maximum health is increased by 25% for 10 sec, and your threat level towards the attacker is reduced.  This effect cannot occur more often than once every 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Stone Bulwark Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Earth Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec that grants the caster a shield absorbing damage for 10 sec, and additional damage every 5 sec thereafter.

abilitiesData.name: Frozen Power
abilitiesData.description: Your Frost Shock now also roots the target in ice for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Earthgrab Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Earth Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 20 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, causing roots to ensnare the legs of all enemies within 10 yards for 5 sec, preventing movement. Enemies that have already been rooted once by the totem will instead have their movement speed reduced by 50%.
extra: Replaces Earthbind Totem.

abilitiesData.name: Windwalk Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 6 sec, granting raid members within 40 yards immunity to movement-impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Call of the Elements-cata
abilitiesData.description: When activated, immediately finishes the cooldown on all totems with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Totemic Persistence
abilitiesData.description: Summoning a second totem of the same element no longer causes the first totem to be destroyed.
extra: Only one totem may benefit from this effect at a time. Does not affect Fire totems.

abilitiesData.name: Totemic Projection
abilitiesData.description: Relocates your active totems to the specified location.

abilitiesData.name: Echo of the Elements
abilitiesData.description: When one of your spells causes direct damage or healing, you have a chance to gain Echo of the Elements, duplicating that spell's effect.

abilitiesData.name: Rushing Streams
abilitiesData.description: Your Healing Stream Totem now heals two targets at once for 15% additional healing.

abilitiesData.name: Unleashed Fury
abilitiesData.description: Your elemental weapon imbues are empowered, granting additional effects when triggered with Unleash Elements:
extra: Flametongue Weapon: Increases the enemy target's damage taken from your Lightning Bolt by 30%, and from your Lava Burst by 10% for 10 sec.
Windfury Weapon: For 8 sec, your melee autoattacks can trigger Static Shock.
Earthliving Weapon: Further increases the effectiveness of your next single-target heal on the targeted ally by 50%.
Frostbrand Weapon: You leech heat from the enemy target, gaining 50% movement speed for 4 sec.
Rockbiter Weapon: You take 40% reduced damage from the enemy target for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Restores 30% of you and your pet's maximum health and increases all healing received by 25% over 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Leech-cata
abilitiesData.description: Based on your specialization, different spells grant you and your pet a shadowy shield that absorbs 20% if Affliction, 10% of the damage if Demonology or Destruction, of the damage dealt for 15 sec.
extra: Affliction: Malefic Grasp, Drain Soul, Fel Flame, and Haunt
Demonology: Shadow Bolt, Soul Fire, Fel Flame, and Touch of Chaos
Destruction: Incinerate, Fel Flame, Shadowburn, and Chaos Bolt

abilitiesData.name: Harvest Life
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage of your Drain Life spell by 50% and the healing of your Drain Life spell by 150%.

abilitiesData.name: Demonic Breath
abilitiesData.description: Sends a cone of dark energy before you, reducing the movement speed by 50% of all enemy targets within 10 yards for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowfury
abilitiesData.description: Shadowfury is unleashed, stunning all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Link-cata
abilitiesData.description: 20% of all damage taken is split with your summoned demon. Additionally, 3% of all damage you deal is converted to healing on you and your summoned demon.

abilitiesData.name: Sacrificial Pact
abilitiesData.description: Your demon sacrifices 25% of its current health to shield its master for 400% of the sacrificed health. Lasts 20 sec.
extra: If you have no demon, your health is sacrificed instead. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Dark Bargain
abilitiesData.description: Prevents all damage for 8 sec.
extra: When the shield fades, 50% of the damage prevented is dealt over 8 sec. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects

abilitiesData.name: Blood Horror
abilitiesData.description: While active, any time an enemy melee attack deals damage to the Warlock, the enemy will run in horror for up to 4 sec. 1 charge. Blood Horror lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Burning Rush
abilitiesData.description: Drains 4% of your maximum health per second to increase your movement speed by 50%. During Burning Rush, movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed.
extra: Lasts until cancelled.

abilitiesData.name: Unbound Will
abilitiesData.description: Purge all Magic effects, movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character or demon.

abilitiesData.name: Grimoire of Supremacy
abilitiesData.description: You command stronger demons, replacing your normal minions. These demons deal 20% additional damage and have more powerful abilities.
extra: Spells Learned:
Summon Fel Imp
Summon Voidlord
Summon Shivarra
Summon Observer
Summon Abyssal
Summon Terrorguard
Demonology:  Summon Wrathguard

abilitiesData.name: Archimonde's Darkness
abilitiesData.description: Your Dark Soul spells have two charges.

abilitiesData.name: Kil'jaeden's Cunning
abilitiesData.description: You can cast Malefic Grasp, Incinerate and Shadow Bolt while moving.

abilitiesData.name: Juggernaut
abilitiesData.description: You can Charge every 12 sec instead of every 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Double Time
abilitiesData.description: You can use Charge twice in a row. Each use has a 20 sec recharge time.
extra: Charge can only grant Rage once every 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Warbringer
abilitiesData.description: Your Charge also pins a target to the ground, rooting it for 4 sec and reducing movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Second Wind
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you are below 35% health, you regenerate 3% health per second.

abilitiesData.name: Impending Victory
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attack the target causing damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.
extra: Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory.
Replaces Victory Rush.

abilitiesData.name: Staggering Shout
abilitiesData.description: Causes all enemies within 20 yards that are snared to become rooted for 5 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Piercing Howl
abilitiesData.description: Snares all enemies within 15 yards, reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Disrupting Shout
abilitiesData.description: Interrupts all spellcasting within 10 yards and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
extra: This ability shares a 15 sec cooldown with Pummel.

abilitiesData.name: Mass Spell Reflection
abilitiesData.description: Reflects the next spell cast on you and on all party and raid members within 20 yards for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Safeguard
abilitiesData.description: Run at high speed towards a party or raid member, removing all movement-impairing effects upon you, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them and reducing their damage taken by 20% for 6 sec.
extra: Replaces Intervene.

abilitiesData.name: Avatar
abilitiesData.description: You transform into a colossus for 24 sec, breaking all roots and snares and increasing your damage dealt by 20%.

Horned Mace of the Old Ones
Xifeng, Longblade of the Titanic Guardian

set_bonus.value: Increases the critical strike chance of your Death Coil and Frost Strike abilities by 5%.
Each time you gain a Death Rune or trigger your Killing Machine talent, you also gain 1% increased attack power for 30 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.
Your Horn of Winter ability also grants you 3 runic power every 5 sec for 2 min.
Your Obliterate and Scourge Strike abilities instantly deal 6% additional damage as Fire damage.
Sudden Doom has a 30% chance and Rime has a 60% chance to grant 2 charges when triggered instead of 1.
Runic Empowerment has a 25% chance and Runic Corruption has a 40% chance to also grant 710 mastery rating for 12 sec when activated.
Increases the damage done by your Death Strike ability by 5%.
Increases the duration of your Icebound Fortitude ability by 50%.
Your melee attacks cause Burning Blood on your target, which deals 840 Fire damage every 2 sec for 6 sec and causes your abilities to behave as if you had 2 diseases present on the target.
When your Dancing Rune Weapon expires, you gain 15% additional parry chance for 12 sec.
When an attack drops your health below 35%, one of your Blood Runes will immediately activate and convert into a Death Rune for the next 20 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Your Vampiric Blood ability also affects all party and raid members for 50% of the effect it has on you.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Serpent Sting ability by 5%.
Reduces the cast time of your Steady Shot and Cobra Shot by 0.2 sec.
Your Steady Shot and Cobra Shot have a 10% chance to trigger a Flaming Arrow, dealing 80% instant weapon damage as Fire.
You have a 10% chance from your autoshots to make your next shot or Kill Command cost no focus.
Steady Shot and Cobra Shot generate double the amount of focus.
Your Arcane Shot ability has a chance to grant 30% haste to you and your pet for 15 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of Arcane Missiles, Ice Lance, and Pyroblast by 5%.
Reduces the cast time of Arcane Blast, Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, and Frostbolt by 10%.
You have a chance to summon a Mirror Image to assist you in battle for 15 sec when you cast Frostbolt, Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, or Arcane Blast.
Your spells have an increased chance to trigger Brain Freeze or Hot Streak. In addition, Arcane Power decreases the cost of your damaging spells by 10% instead of increasing their cost.

Your Arcane Blast has a 100% chance and your Fireball, Pyroblast, Frostfire Bolt, and Frostbolt spells have a 50% chance to grant Stolen Time, increasing your haste rating by 50 for 30 sec and stacking up to 10 times. When Arcane Power, Combustion, or Icy Veins expires, all stacks of Stolen Time are lost.
Each stack of Stolen Time also reduces the cooldown of Arcane Power by 7 sec, Combustion by 5 sec, and Icy Veins by 15 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab, Mutilate, and Sinister Strike abilities by 5%.
Each of your melee autoattacks has a 1% chance to activate Deadly Scheme for 15 sec, increasing the critical strike chance on your next Eviscerate or Envenom by 100%.
Your melee critical strikes deal 6% additional damage as Fire over 4 sec.
Your Tricks of the Trade ability also causes you to gain a 25% increase to one of your combat ratings at random for 30 sec.
After triggering Tricks of the Trade, your abilities cost 20% less energy for 6 sec.
Increases the duration of Shadow Dance by 2 sec, Adrenaline Rush by 3 sec, and Vendetta by 9 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Chaos Bolt, Hand of Gul'dan, and Haunt spells by 10%.
Periodic damage from your Immolate and Unstable Affliction spells has a 2% chance to cause your 2 next Fel Flame spells to deal 300% increased damage.
Your periodic damage has a chance to summon a Fiery Imp to assist you in battle for 15 sec.
Casting your Shadow Bolt, Incinerate, Soul Fire, and Drain Soul spells has a 5% chance to increase all Shadow and Fire damage you deal by 20% for 8 sec.
The duration of your Doomguard and Infernal summons is increased by 30 sec and the cooldown of those spells is reduced by 4 min.
Soulburn grants a 10% increase to your spell power for 10 sec, and Soul Fire cast with Soulburn active now grants a Soul Shard.
Increases the damage done by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities by 5%.
Each time you use Overpower or Raging Blow you gain a 1% increase to attack power for 30 sec stacking up to 3 times.
Your Battle Shout and Commanding Shout abilities increase all physical damage you deal by 10% for 12 sec.
Your Mortal Strike and Raging Blow abilities have a 30% chance to trigger a Fiery Attack, dealing 100% instant weapon damage as Fire.
Heroic Strike costs 10 less rage while Inner Rage is active.
Your Bloodthirst has a 6% chance and your Mortal Strike has a 13% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect on your target for 6 sec.
Increases the damage done by your Shield Slam ability by 5%.
Increases the duration of your Shield Wall ability by 50%.
Your Shield Slam deals 20% additional damage as Fire damage over 4 sec.
When your Shield Block expires, your parry chance is increased by 6% for 10 sec.
Your Revenge ability now also grants a physical absorption shield equal to 20% of the damage done by Revenge to its primary target.
Your Shield Wall ability now grants 50% of its effect to all party and raid members.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Mind Flay and Mind Sear spells by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Shadowy Apparitions by 30%.
While you are in Shadowform, your Shadowfiend deals 20% additional damage as Fire damage and its cooldown is reduced by 75 sec.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target you gain Dark Flames, which increases the damage done by Mind Blast by 15%.
Shadow Word: Death deals an additional 55% damage, and reduces the damage you take from your own Shadow Word: Death when the target fails to die by 95%.
Your Shadowfiend and Shadowy Apparitions have a 100% chance to grant you 3 Shadow Orbs each time they deal damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Heal spell by 5%.
When your Penance spell heals a target you gain 540 Spirit for 10 sec, and being in a Chakra state grants you 540 Spirit for the duration of the Chakra.
Casting your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, and Prayer of Mending spells cause you to regenerate 2% of your base mana every 5 sec for 15 sec.

You have a chance when you cast a helpful spell to summon a Cauterizing Flame at the target's location. Each sec the Cauterizing Flame will heal an injured party member within 40 yards for 10000. Lasts 5 sec.
After using Power Infusion or Divine Hymn, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by 25% for 23 sec.
Your Power Word: Shield has a 10% chance to absorb 100% additional damage and increase the mana granted by Rapture by 100%, and the duration of your Holy Word abilities is increased by 33%.
Increases the damage done by your Templar's Verdict ability by 10%.
Your Inquisition ability's duration is calculated as if you had one additional Holy Power.
Your Crusader Strike deals 15% additional damage as Fire damage over 4 sec.
Increases the duration of your Zealotry ability by 15 sec.
Your Judgement ability now also generates 1 Holy Power.
While Zealotry is active your abilities deal 18% more damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Holy Light spell by 5%.
Grants 540 Spirit for 6 sec after you cast Holy Shock.
Healing with Holy Shock has a 40% chance to grant you 6% of your base mana.
Your Divine Light, Flash of Light, and Holy Light spells also heal an injured target within 15 yards for 10% of the amount healed.
After using Divine Favor, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by 25% for 15 sec.
Increases the healing done by your Holy Radiance spell by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Crusader Strike ability by 10%.
Increases the duration of your Guardian of Ancient Kings ability by 50%.
Your Shield of the Righteous deals 20% additional damage as Fire damage.
When your Divine Protection expires, you gain an additional 12% parry chance for 10 sec.
Your Judgement ability now also grants a physical absorbtion shield equal to 25% of the damage it dealt.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Guardian by 60 sec and increases the radius of its effect by 70 yards.
Increases damage done by your Lava Lash and Stormstrike abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt spell by 10%.
Your Lava Lash gains an additional 5% damage increase per application of Searing Flames on the target.
Your Stormstrike ability also causes the target to take 6% increased damage from your Fire Nova, Flame Shock, Flametongue Weapon, Lava Burst, Lava Lash, and Unleash Flame abilities.
While you have any stacks of Maelstrom Weapon, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and healing spells deal 20% more healing or damage.
Your Feral Spirits have a 45% chance to grant you a charge of Maelstrom Weapon each time they deal damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Flame Shock spell by 10%.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt spell by 10%.
Your Lightning Bolt has a 30% chance to reduce the remaining cooldown on your Fire Elemental Totem by 4 sec.
Your Lava Surge talent also makes Lava Burst instant when it triggers.
Elemental Mastery also grants you 2000 mastery rating 15 sec.
Each time Elemental Overload triggers, you gain 250 haste rating for 4 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Healing Wave spell by 5%.
Grants 540 Spirit for 6 sec after you cast Riptide.
Your periodic healing from Riptide has a 40% chance to restore 1% of your base mana each time it heals a target.
Your Chain Heal spell no longer consumes your Riptide effect on the primary target.
After using Mana Tide Totem, the cost of your healing spells are reduced by 25% for 15 sec.
Increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace by 5 sec, and you gain 30% haste while Spiritwalker's grace is active.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Insect Swarm and Moonfire spells by 5%.
Whenever Eclipse triggers, your critical strike chance with spells is increased by 15% for 8 sec. Each critical strike you achieve reduces that bonus by 5%.
You have a chance to summon a Burning Treant to assist you in battle for 15 sec when you cast Wrath or Starfire.
While not in an Eclipse state, your Wrath generates 3 additional Lunar Energy and your Starfire generates 5 additional Solar Energy.
Insect Swarm increases all damage done by your Starfire, Starsurge, and Wrath spells against that target by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of Starsurge by 5 sec and increases its damage by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of the periodic portion of your Lifebloom spell by 5%.
While your Harmony mastery bonus to periodic healing is active, you gain 540 Spirit.
Your periodic healing from Lifebloom has a 40% chance to restore 1% of your base mana each time it heals a target.
Your Swiftmend also heals an injured target within 15 yards for the same amount.
After using Innervate, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by 25% for 15 sec.
Your Rejuvenation and Regrowth spells have a 10% chance to Timeslip and have double the normal duration.
Increases the periodic damage done by your Rake and Lacerate abilities by 10%.
Each time you use Mangle (Cat) you gain a 1% increase to attack power for 30 sec stacking up to 3 times, and the duration of your Survival Instinct ability is increased by 50%.
Your attacks with Mangle, Maul, and Shred deal 10% additional damage as Fire damage over 4 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to extend the duration of Berserk by 2 sec and when your Barkskin ability expires you gain an additional 10% chance to dodge for 12 sec.

While you have Pulverize active, your Mangle (Bear) critical strikes have a 100% chance to trigger Savage Defense, and your Blood in the Water talent now causes Ferocious Bite to refresh the duration of your Rip on targets with 60% or less health.

Frenzied Regeneration also affects all raid and party members. This effect cannot be triggered if you have been in Bear Form for less than 15 sec. In addition, using Tiger's Fury will also trigger your Stampede talent as if you used Feral Charge (Cat).

Your melee attacks have a chance to grant Shadows of the Destroyer, increasing your Agility by 17, stacking up to 50 times. Each application past 30 grants an increasing chance to trigger Fury of the Destroyer. When triggered, this consumes all applications of Shadows of the Destroyer, immediately granting 5 combo points and cause your finishing moves to generate 5 combo points. Lasts 6 sec.
Your melee attacks have a chance to grant Nightmare, increasing your Agility by 5, stacking up to 50 times.
Your melee attacks have a chance to grant Suffering, increasing your Agility by 2, stacking up to 50 times.
Your melee and ranged attacks have a chance to grant 1000 haste rating for 10 sec.
Increases Agility by 70 and resilience rating by 400.
Increases the regeneration of your Focus by 5% and Agility by 90.

glyphData.name: Anti-Magic Shell
glyphData.use: Causes your Anti-Magic Shell to absorb all incoming magical damage, up to the absorption limit.

glyphData.name: Chains of Ice
glyphData.use: Your Chains of Ice also causes 143 to 156 Frost damage, with additional damage depending on your attack power.

glyphData.name: Dancing Rune Weapon
glyphData.use: Increases your threat generation by 100% while your Dancing Rune Weapon is active, but reduces its damage dealt by 25%.

glyphData.name: Dark Simulacrum
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Dark Simulacrum by 30 sec and increases its duration by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Dark Succor
glyphData.use: When you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor, while in Frost or Unholy Presence, your next Death Strike within 15 sec is free and will restore at least 20% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Death and Decay
glyphData.use: Your Death and Decay also reduces the movement speed of enemies within its radius by 50%.

glyphData.name: Death Coil
glyphData.use: Your Death Coil spell is now usable on all allies. When cast on a non-undead ally, Death Coil shrouds them with a protective barrier that absorbs up to X damage.

glyphData.name: Death Grip
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Death Grip ability by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Enduring Infection
glyphData.use: Your diseases are undispellable, but their damage dealt is reduced by 15%.

glyphData.name: Festering Blood
glyphData.use: Blood Boil will now treat all targets as though they have Blood Plague or Frost Fever applied.

glyphData.name: Icebound Fortitude
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Icebound Fortitude by 50%, but also reduces its duration by 75%.

glyphData.name: Icy Touch
glyphData.use: Your Icy Touch dispels one helpful Magic effect from the target.

glyphData.name: Loud Horn
glyphData.use: Your Horn of Winter now generates an additional 10 Runic Power, but the cooldown is increased by 100%.

glyphData.name: Mind Freeze
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Freeze ability by 1 sec, but also raises its cost by 10 Runic Power.

glyphData.name: Outbreak
glyphData.use: Your Outbreak spell no longer has a cooldown, but now costs 30 Runic Power.

glyphData.name: Pestilence
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of your Pestilence effect by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Pillar of Frost
glyphData.use: Empowers your Pillar of Frost, making you immune to all effects that cause loss of control of your character, but also reduces your movement speed by 70% while the ability is active.

glyphData.name: Regenerative Magic
glyphData.use: If Anti-Magic Shell expires after its full duration, the cooldown is reduced by up to 50%, based on the amount of damage absorbtion remaining.

glyphData.name: Shifting Presences
glyphData.use: You retain 70% of your Runic Power when switching Presences.

glyphData.name: Strangulate
glyphData.use: Increases the Silence duration of your Strangulate ability by 2 sec when used on a target who is casting a spell.

glyphData.name: Swift Death
