glyphData.use: The haste effect granted by Soul Reaper now also increases your movement speed by 30% for the duration.

glyphData.name: Unholy Command
glyphData.use: Immediately finishes the cooldown of your Death Grip upon dealing a killing blow to a target that grants experience or honor.

glyphData.name: Unholy Frenzy
glyphData.use: Causes your Unholy Frenzy to no longer deal damage to the affected target.

glyphData.name: Vampiric Blood
glyphData.use: Increases the bonus healing received while your Vampiric Blood is active by an additional 15%, but your Vampiric Blood no longer grants you health.

glyphData.name: Army of the Dead
glyphData.use: The ghouls summoned by your Army of the Dead no longer taunt their target.

glyphData.name: Corpse Explosion
glyphData.use: Teaches you the ability Corpse Explosion.

glyphData.name: Death Gate
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Death Gate spell by 60%.

glyphData.name: Death's Embrace
glyphData.use: Your Death Coil refunds 20 Runic Power when used to heal an allied minion, but will no longer trigger Blood Tap when used this way.

glyphData.name: Foul Menagerie
glyphData.use: Causes your Army of the Dead spell to summon an assortment of undead minions.

glyphData.name: Horn of Winter
glyphData.use: When used outside of combat, your Horn of Winter ability causes a brief, localized snow flurry.

glyphData.name: Long Winter
glyphData.use: The effect of your Horn of Winter now lasts for 1 hour.

glyphData.name: Path of Frost
glyphData.use: Your Path of Frost ability allows you to fall from a greater distance without suffering damage.

glyphData.name: Resilient Grip
glyphData.use: When your Death Grip ability fails because its target is immune, its cooldown is reset.

glyphData.name: Skeleton
glyphData.use: Your Raise Dead spell summons a skeleton instead of a ghoul.

glyphData.name: Geist
glyphData.use: Your Raise Dead spell summons a geist instead of a ghoul.

glyphData.name: Tranquil Grip
glyphData.use: Your Death Grip spell no longer taunts the target.

glyphData.name: Barkskin
glyphData.use: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by 25% while Barkskin is active.

glyphData.name: Blooming
glyphData.use: Increases the bloom heal of your Lifebloom when it expires by 50%, but its duration is reduced by 5 sec and your Healing Touch, Nourish, and Regrowth abilities no longer refresh the duration.

glyphData.name: Cat Form
glyphData.use: Increases healing done to you by 20% while in Cat Form.

glyphData.name: Cyclone
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Cyclone spell by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Dash
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by 60 sec.

glyphData.name: Efflorescence
glyphData.use: The Efflorescence effect is now caused by your Wild Mushroom instead of by Swiftmend, and lasts as long as the Wild Mushroom is active. Additionally, increases the healing done by Swiftmend by 20%.

glyphData.name: Entangling Roots
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Entangling Roots by 0.2 sec.

glyphData.name: Fae Silence
glyphData.use: Faerie Fire used in Bear Form also silences the target for 3 sec, but triggers a 15 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Faerie Fire
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Faerie Fire by 10 yds.

glyphData.name: Ferocious Bite
glyphData.use: Your Ferocious Bite ability heals you for 2% of your maximum health for each 10 Energy used.

glyphData.name: Frenzied Regeneration
glyphData.use: For 6 sec after activating Frenzied Regeneration, healing effects on you are 40% more powerful. However, your Frenzied Regeneration now always costs 50 Rage and no longer converts Rage into health.

glyphData.name: Guided Stars
glyphData.use: Your Starfall only hits targets affected by your Moonfire or Sunfire.

glyphData.name: Healing Touch
glyphData.use: When you cast Healing Touch, the cooldown on your Nature's Swiftness is reduced by 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Hurricane
glyphData.use: Your Hurricane and Astral Storm abilities now also slow the movement speed of their victims by 50%.

glyphData.name: Innervate
glyphData.use: When Innervate is cast on a target other than the caster, both the caster and target will benefit, but at 40% reduced effect.

glyphData.name: Master Shapeshifter
glyphData.use: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifts by 100%.

glyphData.name: Maul
glyphData.use: Your Maul ability now hits 1 additional target for 50% damage.

glyphData.name: Might of Ursoc
glyphData.use: Increases the health gain from Might of Ursoc by 20%, but increases the cooldown by 2 min.

glyphData.name: Nature's Grasp
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Grasp by 45 sec.

glyphData.name: Omens
glyphData.use: While you are not in an Eclipse, the following abilities now grant 10 Solar or Lunar Energy: Entangling Roots, Cyclone, Faerie Fire, Faerie Swarm, Mass Entanglement, Typhoon, Disorienting Roar, Ursol's Vortex, and Mighty Bash.

glyphData.name: Pounce
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Pounce by 8 yards.

glyphData.name: Prowl
glyphData.use: Reduces the movement penalty of Prowl by 100%.

glyphData.name: Rebirth
glyphData.use: Players resurrected by Rebirth are returned to life with 100% health.

glyphData.name: Regrowth
glyphData.use: Increases the critical strike chance of your Regrowth by 40%, but removes the periodic component of the spell.

glyphData.name: Rejuvenation
glyphData.use: When you have Rejuvenation active on three or more targets, the cast time of your Nourish spell is reduced by 30%.

glyphData.name: Savagery
glyphData.use: Savage Roar can now be used with 0 combo points, resulting in a 12 sec duration.

glyphData.name: Shred
glyphData.use: While Berserk or Tiger's Fury is active, Shred has no positional requirement.

glyphData.name: Skull Bash
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Skull Bash interrupt by 2 sec, but increases the cooldown by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Stampede
glyphData.use: You can now cast Stampeding Roar without being in Bear Form or Cat Form.

glyphData.name: Stampeding Roar
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of Stampeding Roar by 30 yards.

glyphData.name: Survival Instincts
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Survival Instincts by 60 sec, but reduces its duration by 50%.

glyphData.name: Wild Growth
glyphData.use: Wild Growth can affect 1 additional target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Aquatic Form
glyphData.use: Increases your swim speed by 50% while in Aquatic Form.

glyphData.name: Charm Woodland Creature
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Charm Woodland Creature.
Allows the Druid to befriend an ambient creature, which will follow the Druid for 1 hour.

glyphData.name: Focus
glyphData.use: Reduces Starfall's radius by 50%.

glyphData.name: Grace
glyphData.use: Feline Grace reduces falling damage even while not in Cat Form.

glyphData.name: One with Nature
glyphData.use: Grants you the ability to teleport to a random natural location.

glyphData.name: Stars
glyphData.use: Your Moonkin Form now appears as Astral Form, conferring all the same benefits, but appearing as an astrally enhanced version of your normal humanoid form.

glyphData.name: Chameleon
glyphData.use: Each time you shapeshift into Cat Form or Bear Form, your shapeshifted form will have a random hair color.

glyphData.name: Cheetah
glyphData.use: Your Travel Form appears as a Cheetah. This glyph will prevent Glyph of the Stag from functioning.

glyphData.name: Orca
glyphData.use: Your Aquatic Form now appears as an Orca.

glyphData.name: Predator
glyphData.use: Your Track Humanoids ability now also tracks beasts.

glyphData.name: Sprouting Mushroom
glyphData.use: Your Wild Mushroom spell can now be placed on the ground instead of underneath a target.

glyphData.name: Stag
glyphData.use: Your Travel Form can now be used as a mount by party members. This glyph is disabled while Glyph of the Cheetah is active.

glyphData.name: Treant
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Treant Form.
Shapeshift into Treant Form.

glyphData.name: Afterlife
glyphData.use: Increases the chance to summon a Healing Sphere when you kill an enemy while gaining experience or honor to 100%.

glyphData.name: Breath of Fire
glyphData.use: When you use Breath of Fire on targets afflicted with your Dizzying Haze, they become Disoriented for 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Clash
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Clash ability by 10 yards.

glyphData.name: Detox
glyphData.use: Detox heals your target for 5% when it successfully removes a harmful effect.

glyphData.name: Enduring Healing Sphere
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Healing Spheres by 3 minutes.

glyphData.name: Expel Harm
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Expel Harm by 10 yards.

glyphData.name: Fists of Fury
glyphData.use: When channeling Fists of Fury, your parry chance is increased by 100%.

glyphData.name: Fortifying Brew
glyphData.use: Your Fortifying Brew reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, but increases your health by 10% rather than 20%.

glyphData.name: Fortuitous Spheres
glyphData.use: Falling below 25% health will automatically summon a healing sphere near you at no cost. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 30 seconds.

glyphData.name: Guard
glyphData.use: Increases the amount your Guard absorbs by 10%, but your Guard can only absorb magical damage.

glyphData.name: Leer of the Ox
glyphData.use:
Your Ox Statue stirs hatred in the target, reducing their movement speed by 50% and causing them to attack your Black Ox Statue for 8 sec. The statue must be within 40 yards of the target.
Requires Black Ox Statue to be active.

glyphData.name: Life Cocoon
glyphData.use: Life Cocoon can now be cast while stunned.

glyphData.name: Mana Tea
glyphData.use: Your Mana Tea is instant instead of channeled and consumes two stacks when used, but causes a 10 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Nimble Brew
glyphData.use: Clearing an effect with Nimble Brew heals you for 10% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Paralysis
glyphData.use: Your Paralysis ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

glyphData.name: Rapid Rolling
glyphData.use: For 5 sec seconds after using Roll or Chi Torpedo, your next Roll or Chi Torpedo will go 30% farther.

glyphData.name: Renewing Mist
glyphData.use: Your Renewing Mist travels to the furthest injured target within 40 yards rather than the closest injured target within 20 yards.

glyphData.name: Retreat
glyphData.use: When you Roll or Chi Torpedo, all threat is temporarily reduced for 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Sparring
glyphData.use: While Sparring, you also have a 5% chance to deflect spells from attackers in front of you, stacking up to 3 times.

glyphData.name: Spinning Crane Kick
glyphData.use: You move at full speed while channeling Spinning Crane Kick.

glyphData.name: Stoneskin
glyphData.use: When you use Fortifying Brew, all bleed damage taken is reduced by 20% while active.

glyphData.name: Surging Mist
glyphData.use: Your Surging Mist no longer requires a target, and instead heals the lowest health target within 40 yards.

glyphData.name: Targeted Expulsion
glyphData.use: Expel Harm can now be used on other allies, but the healing is reduced by 50% on them.

glyphData.name: Touch of Death
glyphData.use: Your Touch of Death no longer has a Chi cost, but the cooldown is increased by 2 minutes.

glyphData.name: Touch of Karma
glyphData.use: Your Touch of Karma now has a 20 yard range.

glyphData.name: Transcendence
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Transcendence: Transfer spell by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Uplift
glyphData.use: Your Uplift no longer costs Chi, but instead costs 16% Mana.

glyphData.name: Zen Meditation
glyphData.use: You can now channel Zen Meditation while moving.

glyphData.name: Blackout Kick
glyphData.use: Your Blackout Kick always deals 20% additional damage over 4 sec regardless of positioning but you're unable to trigger the healing effect.

glyphData.name: Crackling Tiger Lightning
glyphData.use: Your Crackling Jade Lightning visual is altered to the color of the White Tiger celestial.

glyphData.name: Fighting Pose
glyphData.use: Your spirit now appears in a fighting pose when using Transcendence.

glyphData.name: Flying Serpent Kick
glyphData.use: Your Flying Serpent Kick automatically ends when you fly into an enemy, triggering the area of effect damage and snare.

glyphData.name: Honor
glyphData.use: You honorably bow after each successful Touch of Death.

glyphData.name: Jab
glyphData.use: You always will attack with hands and fist with Jab, even with non-fist weapons equipped.

glyphData.name: Rising Tiger Kick
glyphData.use: Your Rising Sun Kick's visual is altered to the color of the White Tiger.

glyphData.name: Spinning Fire Blossom
glyphData.use: Your Spinning Fire Blossom requires an enemy target rather than traveling in front of you, but is no longer capable of rooting targets.

glyphData.name: Spirit Roll
glyphData.use: You can cast Roll or Chi Torpedo while dead as a spirit.

glyphData.name: Water Roll
glyphData.use: You can Roll or Chi Torpedo over water.

glyphData.name: Zen Flight
glyphData.use: Teaches you the spell Zen Flight. Zen Flight requires a Flight Master's License in order to be cast.

glyphData.name: Aimed Shot
glyphData.use: Your Aimed Shot can now be used while moving.

glyphData.name: Animal Bond
glyphData.use: While your pet is active, all healing done to you and your pet is increased by 10%.

glyphData.name: Black Ice
glyphData.use: While you move through the area affected by your Ice Trap you gain 50% movement speed.

glyphData.name: Camouflage
glyphData.use: Your Camouflage ability now provides stealth even while moving, but your movement speed while Camouflage is active is reduced by 50%.

glyphData.name: Chimera Shot
glyphData.use: Increases the healing you receive from Chimera Shot by an additional 2% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Deterrence
glyphData.use: Increases the damage reduction granted by Deterrence by 20%.

glyphData.name: Disengage
glyphData.use: Increases the distance you travel when you Disengage.

glyphData.name: Distracting Shot
glyphData.use: Your Distracting Shot now distracts the target to attack your pet instead of you.

glyphData.name: Endless Wrath
glyphData.use: While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet cannot be killed, but can still be damaged.

glyphData.name: Enduring Deceit
glyphData.use: Camouflage also reduces spell damage taken by 10%.

glyphData.name: Explosive Trap
glyphData.use: Your Explosive Trap no longer deals damage, instead knocking enemies back from the trap when it explodes.

glyphData.name: Freezing Trap
glyphData.use: When your Freezing Trap breaks, the victim's movement speed is reduced by 70% for 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Ice Trap
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of the effect from your Ice Trap by 2 yards.

glyphData.name: Lean Pack
glyphData.use: Reduces the radius of Aspect of the Pack by 33 yards.

glyphData.name: Liberation
glyphData.use: When you Disengage, you are healed for 5% of your total health.

glyphData.name: Master's Call
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Master's Call by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Mend Pet
glyphData.use: Gives your Mend Pet ability a 100% chance of cleansing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic or Poison effect from your pet each tick.

glyphData.name: Mending
glyphData.use: Your Mend Pet now heals every 1 sec, and heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration.

glyphData.name: Mirrored Blades
glyphData.use: When attacked by a spell while in Deterrence, you have a 100% chance to reflect it back at the attacker.

glyphData.name: Misdirection
glyphData.use: When you use Misdirection on your pet, the cooldown on your Misdirection is reset.

glyphData.name: No Escape
glyphData.use: Increases the ranged critical strike chance of all of your attacks on targets affected by your Freezing Trap by 100%.

glyphData.name: Pathfinding
glyphData.use: Increases the speed bonus of your Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Pack by 8%, and increases your speed while mounted by 10%. The mounted movement speed increase does not stack with other effects.

glyphData.name: Scatter Shot
glyphData.use: Increases the range of Scatter Shot by 3 yards.

glyphData.name: Snake Trap
glyphData.use: Snakes from your Snake Trap take 90% reduced damage from area of effect attacks.

glyphData.name: Solace
glyphData.use: Your Freezing Trap and Scatter Shot also remove all damage over time effects from their targets.

glyphData.name: Tranquilizing Shot
glyphData.use: Your Tranquilizing Shot no longer costs Focus, but has a 10 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Aspect of the Beast
glyphData.use: The Hunter takes on the aspects of a beast, becoming untrackable. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

glyphData.name: Aspect of the Cheetah
glyphData.use: Your Aspect of the Cheetah no longer causes you to be dazed when struck. Instead, the effect is cancelled and all your Aspects are placed on a 4 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Aspect of the Pack
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Aspect of the Pack ability by 15 yards.

glyphData.name: Aspects
glyphData.use: Each time you activate a new Aspect, an animal companion representing that Aspect will follow you for 15 sec.

glyphData.name: Focused Fire
glyphData.use: Focus Fire charges apply a visual to you for each charge active.

glyphData.name: Direction
glyphData.use: Causes your Misdirection target to appear larger.

glyphData.name: Fetch
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Fetch.
Command your pet to retrieve the loot from a nearby corpse within 40 yards.

glyphData.name: Fireworks
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Fireworks.
Launch fireworks from your gun, bow or crossbow.

glyphData.name: Lesser Proportion
glyphData.use: Slightly reduces the size of your pet.

glyphData.name: Marking
glyphData.use: Your Hunter's Mark ability now places a bullseye on your target instead of its usual visual.

glyphData.name: Revive Pet
glyphData.use: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Revive Pet by 100%.

glyphData.name: Stampede
glyphData.use: Your Stampede no longer summons pets from your stable, and instead uses copies of your current pet.

glyphData.name: Tame Beast
glyphData.use: Reduces the time required to complete Tame Beast by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Arcane Explosion
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of your Arcane Explosion by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Arcane Power
glyphData.use: Increases the duration and cooldown of Arcane Power by 100%.

glyphData.name: Armors
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Frost Armor, Mage Armor, and Molten Armor spells by 1.5 sec, and increases the defensive effect of each Armor by an additional 10%.

glyphData.name: Blink
glyphData.use: Increases the distance you travel with the Blink spell by 8 yards.

glyphData.name: Combustion
glyphData.use: Increases the direct damage, the duration of the damage over time effect and the cooldown of Combustion by 100%.

glyphData.name: Cone of Cold
glyphData.use: Increases the damage done by Cone of Cold by 200%.

glyphData.name: Counterspell
glyphData.use: Your Counterspell can now be cast while casting or channeling other spells, but its cooldown is increased by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Deep Freeze
glyphData.use: Your Deep Freeze spell is no longer on the global cooldown, but its duration is reduced by 1 sec.

glyphData.name: Evocation
glyphData.use:
Your Evocation ability also causes you to regain 60% of your health over its duration.

With the Invocation talent, you instead gain 10% of your health upon completing an Evocation.

With the Rune of Power talent, you gain 1% of your health per second while standing in your own Rune of Power.

glyphData.name: Frost Nova
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Frost Nova by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Frostfire Bolt
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of Frostfire Bolt by 0.5 sec.

glyphData.name: Ice Block
glyphData.use: When Ice Block terminates, it triggers an instant free Frost Nova and makes you immune to all spells for 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Icy Veins
glyphData.use: Your Icy Veins causes your Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, Ice Lance, and your Water Elemental's Waterbolt spells to split into 3 smaller bolts that each do 160% damage, instead of increasing spell casting speed.

glyphData.name: Inferno Blast
glyphData.use: Your Inferno Blast spell spreads Pyroblast, Ignite, and Combustion to 1 additional target.

glyphData.name: Invisibility
glyphData.use: Increases your movement speed while Invisible by 40%.

glyphData.name: Mana Gem
glyphData.use: Your Conjure Mana Gem spell now creates a Brilliant Mana Gem, which holds up to 10 charges.

glyphData.name: Polymorph
glyphData.use: Your Polymorph spell also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

glyphData.name: Rapid Displacement
glyphData.use: Blink now has 2 charges, gaining a charge every 15 sec, but no longer frees the caster from stuns and bonds.

glyphData.name: Remove Curse
glyphData.use: Increases the damage you deal by 5% for 10 sec after you successfully remove a curse.

glyphData.name: Slow
glyphData.use: Your Arcane Blast spell applies the Slow spell to any target it damages if no target is currently affected by your Slow.

glyphData.name: Spellsteal
glyphData.use: Spellsteal now also heals you for 5% of your maximum health when it successfully steals a spell.

glyphData.name: Splitting Ice
glyphData.use: Your Ice Lance and Icicles now hit 1 additional target for 50% damage.

glyphData.name: Water Elemental
glyphData.use: Increases the health of your Water Elemental by 40%, and allows it to cast while moving. When in Assist mode and in combat, commanding your Water Elemental to Follow will cause it to stay near you and autocast Waterbolt when your target is in range.

glyphData.name: Arcane Language
glyphData.use: Your Arcane Brilliance spell allows you to comprehend your allies' racial languages.

glyphData.name: Condensation
glyphData.use: Increases the size of your Water Elemental by 40%.

glyphData.name: Conjure Familiar
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Conjure Familiar.
Conjures a familiar stone, containing either an Arcane, Fiery, or Icy Familiar.

glyphData.name: Crittermorph
glyphData.use: When cast on critters, your Polymorph spells now last 1 day and can be cast on multiple targets.

glyphData.name: Discreet Magic
glyphData.use: Your Nether Tempest, Living Bomb, Frost Bomb, Arcane Barrage, and Inferno Blast no longer affect targets more than 5 yds away from their primary target.

glyphData.name: Evaporation
glyphData.use: Reduces the size of your Water Elemental by 40%.

glyphData.name: Illusion
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Illusion.
Transforms the Mage to look like someone else for 2 min.

glyphData.name: Loose Mana
glyphData.use: Your Mana Gem now restores mana over 6 sec, rather than instantly.

glyphData.name: Mirror Image
glyphData.use: Your Mirror Images cast Arcane Blast or Fireball instead of Frostbolt depending on your primary talent tree.

glyphData.name: Momentum
glyphData.use: Your Blink spell teleports you in the direction you are moving instead of the direction you are facing.

glyphData.name: Rapid Teleportation
glyphData.use: After casting a Mage Teleport spell, or entering a Mage Portal, your movement speed is increased by 70% for 1 min.

glyphData.name: Bear Cub
glyphData.use: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a polar bear cub instead.

glyphData.name: Monkey
glyphData.use: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a monkey instead.

glyphData.name: Penguin
glyphData.use: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a penguin instead.

glyphData.name: Porcupine
glyphData.use: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a porcupine instead.

glyphData.name: Unbound Elemental
glyphData.use: Your Water Elemental is replaced by an Unbound Water Elemental.

glyphData.name: Avenging Wrath
glyphData.use: While Avenging Wrath is active, you are healed for 1% of your maximum health every 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Beacon of Light
glyphData.use: Removes the global cooldown on Beacon of Light,

glyphData.name: Blessed Life
glyphData.use:
You have a 50% chance to gain a charge of Holy Power whenever you are affected by a Stun, Fear or Immobilize effect.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.

glyphData.name: Blinding Light
glyphData.use: Your Blinding Light now knocks down targets for 3 sec instead of Blinding them.

glyphData.name: Burden of Guilt
glyphData.use: Your Judgment hits fill your target with doubt and remorse, reducing movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Consecration
glyphData.use: You can now target Consecration anywhere within 25 yards.

glyphData.name: Dazing Shield
glyphData.use: Your Avenger's Shield now also dazes targets for 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Denounce
glyphData.use: Your Holy Shocks reduce the cast time of your next Denounce by 0.5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

glyphData.name: Devotion Aura
glyphData.use: Devotion Aura no longer affects party or raid members, but the cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.

glyphData.name: Divine Plea
glyphData.use: Divine Plea returns 50% less mana but has a 50% shorter cooldown.

glyphData.name: Divine Protection
glyphData.use: Reduces the magical damage reduction of your Divine Protection to 20% but adds 20% physical damage reduction.

glyphData.name: Divine Shield
glyphData.use: Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed. This heal cannot exceed 50% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Divine Storm
glyphData.use: Your Divine Storm also heals you for 5% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Divinity
glyphData.use: Increases the cooldown of your Lay on Hands by 2 min but causes it to give you 10% of your maximum mana.

glyphData.name: Double Jeopardy
glyphData.use: Judging a target increases the damage of your next Judgment by 20%, but only if used on a different second target.

glyphData.name: Final Wrath
glyphData.use: Your Holy Wrath does an additional 50% damage to targets with less than 20% health.

glyphData.name: Flash of Light
glyphData.use: When you Flash of Light a target, it increases your next heal done to that target within 7 sec by 10%.

glyphData.name: Focused Shield
glyphData.use: Your Avenger's Shield hits 2 fewer targets, but for 30% more damage.

glyphData.name: Hammer of the Righteous
glyphData.use: The physical damage reduction caused by Hammer of the Righteous now lasts 50% longer.

glyphData.name: Hand of Sacrifice
glyphData.use: Hand of Sacrifice no longer redirects damage to the Paladin.

glyphData.name: Harsh Words
glyphData.use:
Your Word of Glory can now also be used on enemy targets, causing Holy damage approximately equal to the amount it would have healed.

Does not work with Eternal Flame.

glyphData.name: Holy Shock
glyphData.use: Decreases the healing of Holy Shock by 50% but increases its damage by 50%.

glyphData.name: Holy Wrath
glyphData.use: Your Holy Wrath now also stuns Elementals, Dragonkin, and Aberrations.

glyphData.name: Illumination
glyphData.use: Your Holy Shock criticals grant 1% mana return, but Holy Insight returns 10% less mana.

glyphData.name: Immediate Truth
glyphData.use: Increases the instant damage done by Seal of Truth by 40%, but decreases the damage done by Censure by 50%.

glyphData.name: Inquisition
glyphData.use: When you land a killing blow on an opponent that yields experience or honor, the duration of your Inquisition is increased by 30 sec.

glyphData.name: Light of Dawn
glyphData.use: Light of Dawn affects 2 fewer targets, but heals each target for 25% more.

glyphData.name: Mass Exorcism
glyphData.use: Reduces the range of Exorcism to melee range, but causes 25% damage to all enemies within 8 yards of the primary target.

glyphData.name: Protector of the Innocent
glyphData.use: When you use Word of Glory to heal another target, it also heals you for 20% of the amount.

glyphData.name: Rebuke
glyphData.use: Increases the cooldown by 5 sec and lockout by 2 sec of Rebuke.

glyphData.name: Templar's Verdict
glyphData.use: You take 10% less damage for 6 sec after dealing damage with Templar's Verdict or Exorcism.

glyphData.name: Alabaster Shield
glyphData.use: Your successful blocks increase the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 10%. Stacks up to 3 times.

glyphData.name: Battle Healer
glyphData.use: Melee attacks from Seal of Insight heal the most wounded member of your raid or party for 30% of the normal heal instead of you.

glyphData.name: Word of Glory
glyphData.use: Increases your damage by 3% per Holy Power spent after you cast Word of Glory or Eternal Flame on a friendly target. Lasts 6 sec.

glyphData.name: Bladed Judgment
glyphData.use: Your Judgment spell depicts an axe or sword instead of a hammer, if you have an axe or sword equipped.

glyphData.name: Contemplation
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Contemplation.

Allows you a moment of peace as you kneel in quiet contemplation to ponder the nature of the Light.

glyphData.name: Exorcist
glyphData.use: Exorcism will now appear to remove the evil from its target.

glyphData.name: Fire From the Heavens
glyphData.use: Your Judgment and Hammer of Wrath criticals call down fire from the sky.

glyphData.name: Focused Wrath
glyphData.use: Holy Wrath only affects one target.

glyphData.name: Pillar of Light
glyphData.use: Critical heals on other players display a small pillar of light at their location briefly.

glyphData.name: Righteous Retreat
glyphData.use: During Divine Shield, you can invoke your Hearthstone 50% faster.

glyphData.name: Seal of Blood
glyphData.use: Your Seal of Truth now uses the Seal of Blood visual.

glyphData.name: Falling Avenger
glyphData.use: You slow fall during Avenging Wrath.

glyphData.name: Luminous Charger
glyphData.use: Your Paladin class mounts glow with holy light.

glyphData.name: Mounted King
glyphData.use: Mounting one of your Paladin class mounts automatically casts Blessing of Kings on you.

glyphData.name: Winged Vengeance
glyphData.use: Your Avenging Wrath depicts 4 wings.

glyphData.name: Binding Heal
glyphData.use: Your Binding Heal spell now heals a third friendly target within 20 yards, but costs 35% more mana.

glyphData.name: Circle of Healing
glyphData.use: Your Circle of Healing spell heals 1 additional target, but its mana cost is increased by 35%.

glyphData.name: Deep Wells
glyphData.use: Increases the total amount of charges of your Lightwell by 2.

glyphData.name: Dispel Magic
glyphData.use: Your Dispel Magic spell also damages your target for 3 Holy damage when you successfully dispel a magical effect.

glyphData.name: Dispersion
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown on Dispersion by 15 sec.

glyphData.name: Fade
glyphData.use: Your Fade ability now also reduces all damage taken by 10%.

glyphData.name: Fear Ward
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Fear Ward by 60 sec.

glyphData.name: Focused Mending
glyphData.use: Causes your Prayer of Mending to only bounce between the target and the caster.

glyphData.name: Holy Fire
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Holy Fire, Smite, and Power Word: Solace spells by 10 yards.

glyphData.name: Holy Nova
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Holy Nova.

Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing up to 5 targets within 10 yards.

Healing is divided among the number of targets healed. These effects cause no threat.

glyphData.name: Inner Fire
glyphData.use: Increases the armor gained from your Inner Fire spell by 50%.

glyphData.name: Inner Sanctum
glyphData.use: Spell damage taken is reduced by 6% while within Inner Fire, and the movement speed bonus of your Inner Will is increased by 6%.

glyphData.name: Leap of Faith
glyphData.use: Your Leap of Faith spell now also clears all movement impairing effects from your target.

glyphData.name: Levitate
glyphData.use: Increases your movement speed while Levitating and for 10 sec afterward by 15%.

glyphData.name: Lightspring
glyphData.use: Your Lightwell no longer automatically heals nearby targets, but can be clicked by players to deal 50% more healing than normal.

glyphData.name: Lightwell
glyphData.use: Your Lightwell no longer automatically heals nearby targets, but can be clicked by players to deal 50% more healing than normal.

glyphData.name: Mass Dispel
glyphData.use: Causes your Mass Dispel to be potent enough to remove Magic effects that are normally undispellable.

glyphData.name: Mind Blast
glyphData.use: When you critically hit with your Mind Blast, you cause the target to be unable to move for 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Mind Flay
glyphData.use: Your Mind Flay spell no longer slows your victim's movement speed. Instead, each time Mind Flay deals damage you will be granted 15% increased movement speed for 5 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

glyphData.name: Mind Spike
glyphData.use: Your successful non-instant Mind Spikes, reduce the cast time of your next Mind Blast within 9 sec by 50%. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

glyphData.name: Penance
glyphData.use: Increases the mana cost of Penance by 20% but allows Penance to be cast while moving.

glyphData.name: Power Word: Shield
glyphData.use: 20% of the absorb from your Power Word: Shield spell is converted into healing.

glyphData.name: Prayer of Mending
glyphData.use: The first charge of your Prayer of Mending heals for an additional 60% but your Prayer of Mending has 1 fewer charge.

glyphData.name: Psychic Horror
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Horror by 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Psychic Scream
glyphData.use: Targets of your Psychic Scream and your Psyfiend's Psychic Terror now tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphData.name: Purify
glyphData.use: Your Purify spell also heals your target for 5% of maximum health when you successfully dispel a magical effect or disease.

glyphData.name: Reflective Shield
glyphData.use: Causes 70% of the damage you absorb with Power Word: Shield to reflect back at the attacker. This damage causes no threat.

glyphData.name: Renew
glyphData.use: Your Renew heals for 33% more each time it heals, but its duration is reduced by 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Scourge Imprisonment
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Shackle Undead by 1 sec.

glyphData.name: Shadow Word: Death
glyphData.use:
Your Shadow Word: Death can now be cast at any time, but deals 25% damage against targets above 20% health.

Casting Shadow Word: Death now also does damage to you equivalent to the damage it would do to an enemy above 20% health.

glyphData.name: Smite
glyphData.use: Your Smite spell inflicts an additional 20% damage against targets afflicted by Holy Fire, but that additional damage does not get transferred by Atonement.

glyphData.name: Spirit of Redemption
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Vampiric Embrace
glyphData.use: Your Vampiric Embrace converts an additional 50% of the damage you deal into healing, but the duration is reduced by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Weakened Soul
glyphData.use: Reduces the duration of the Weakened Soul effect caused by Power Word: Shield by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Angels
glyphData.use: Your heal spells momentarily grant you angelic wings.

glyphData.name: Borrowed Time
glyphData.use: Your Borrowed Time is now displayed visually.

glyphData.name: Confession
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Confession.

Compels a friendly target to confess a secret.

glyphData.name: Dark Archangel
glyphData.use: When you apply Devouring Plague to a target, you take on the form of a Dark Archangel for 8 sec.

glyphData.name: Holy Resurrection
glyphData.use: Your resurrection target appears bathed in holy light for the duration of the Resurrection cast.

glyphData.name: Inspired Hymms
glyphData.use: While channeling Hymns, a spirit appears above you.

glyphData.name: Shackle Undead
glyphData.use: Changes the appearance of your Shackle Undead.

glyphData.name: Shadow
glyphData.use: Alters the appearance of your Shadowform to be less transparent.

glyphData.name: Shadow Ravens
glyphData.use: Your Shadow Orbs now appear as Shadow Ravens.

glyphData.name: Shadowy Friends
glyphData.use: Your Shadowform extends to your non-combat pets.

glyphData.name: Shifted Appearances
glyphData.use:
Void Shift causes you and your target to exchange appearances for several seconds.

Does not affect mounted players.

glyphData.name: Heavens
glyphData.use: Your Levitate targets will appear to be riding on a cloud for the duration of the spell.

glyphData.name: Sha
glyphData.use: Transforms your Shadowfiend and Mindbender into a Sha Beast.

glyphData.name: Val'kyr
glyphData.use: While Spirit of Redemption is active, you now appear as a Val'kyr.

glyphData.name: Ambush
glyphData.use: Increases the range of Ambush by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Blade Flurry
glyphData.use: Your attacks have a 30% higher chance of applying Non-Lethal poisons while Blade Flurry is active.

glyphData.name: Blind
glyphData.use: Your Blind ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target that would cause Blind to break early.

glyphData.name: Cheap Shot
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Cheap Shot by 0.5 sec.

glyphData.name: Cloak of Shadows
glyphData.use: While Cloak of Shadows is active, you take 40% less physical damage.

glyphData.name: Crippling Poison
glyphData.use: Increases the chance to apply Crippling Poison to your target by an additional 20%.

glyphData.name: Deadly Momentum
glyphData.use: When you land a killing blow on an opponent that yields experience or honor, your Slice and Dice and Recuperate abilities are refreshed to their original duration.

glyphData.name: Debilitation
glyphData.use: Your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities also reduce the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

glyphData.name: Evasion
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of Evasion by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Expose Armor
glyphData.use: Your Expose Armor ability causes three applications of Weakened Armor.

glyphData.name: Feint
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of Feint by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Garrote
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Garrote ability's silence effect by 1 sec.

glyphData.name: Gouge
glyphData.use: Your Gouge ability no longer requires that the target be facing you.

glyphData.name: Hemorrhaging Veins
glyphData.use: Your Sanguinary Vein ability now also increases damage done to targets affected by your Hemorrhage.

glyphData.name: Kick
glyphData.use: Increases the cooldown of your Kick ability by 4 sec, but this cooldown is reduced by 6 sec when your Kick successfully interrupts a spell.

glyphData.name: Recovery
glyphData.use: While Recuperate is active, you receive 20% increased healing from other sources.

glyphData.name: Recuperate
glyphData.use: Increases the healing of your Recuperate ability by an additional 1% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Redirect
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of Redirect by 50 seconds.

glyphData.name: Sap
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of Sap against non-player targets by 80 sec.

glyphData.name: Shadow Walk
glyphData.use: Your Shadow Walk ability also increases your stealth detection while active.

glyphData.name: Sharp Knives
glyphData.use: Your Fan of Kinves also damages the armor of its victims, applying 1 application of the Weakened Armor effect to each target.

glyphData.name: Shiv
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Shiv ability by 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Smoke Bomb
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Smoke Bomb by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Sprint
glyphData.use: Increases the movement speed of your Sprint ability by an additional 30%.

glyphData.name: Stealth
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Vanish
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Vanish effect by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Vendetta
glyphData.use: Reduces the damage bonus of your Vendetta ability by 5% but increases its duration by 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Blurred Speed
glyphData.use: Enables you to walk on water while your Sprint ability is active.

glyphData.name: Decoy
glyphData.use: When you Vanish, you leave behind a brief illusion that very closely resembles you.

glyphData.name: Detection
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Detection.

Focus intently on trying to detect certain creatures.

glyphData.name: Disguise
glyphData.use: When you Pick Pocket a humanoid enemy, you also copy their appearance for 5 min. Your disguise will unravel upon entering combat.

glyphData.name: Distract
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Distract ability by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Headhunting
glyphData.use: Your Throw and Deadly Throw abilities will now throw axes regardless of your currently equipped weapon.

glyphData.name: Hemorrhage
glyphData.use: Your Hemorrhage ability only causes lingering damage over time to targets that were already afflicted by a Bleed effect.

glyphData.name: Improved Distraction
glyphData.use: Distract now summons a decoy at the target location.

glyphData.name: Killing Spree
glyphData.use: Your Killing Spree returns you to your starting location when the effect ends.

glyphData.name: Pick Lock
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Pick Lock ability by 100%.

glyphData.name: Pick Pocket
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Pick Pocket ability by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Poisons
glyphData.use: You apply poisons to your weapons 50% faster.

glyphData.name: Safe Fall
glyphData.use: Increases the distance your Safe Fall ability allows you to fall without taking damage.

glyphData.name: Tricks of the Trade
glyphData.use: Your Tricks of the Trade ability no longer costs Energy, but also no longer increases the damage dealt by the target.

glyphData.name: Capacitor Totem
glyphData.use: Reduces the charging time of your Capacitor Totem by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Chain Lightning
glyphData.use: Your Chain Lightning spell now strikes 2 additional targets, but deals 10% less damage.

glyphData.name: Chaining
glyphData.use: Increases the jump distance of your Chain Heal spell by 100%, but gives the spell a 2 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Cleansing Waters
glyphData.use: When you dispel a harmful Magic or Curse effect from an ally, you also heal the target for 5% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Eternal Earth
glyphData.use: Your Lightning Bolt has a chance to add a charge to your currently active Earth Shield. This cannot cause Earth Shield to exceed 9 charges.

glyphData.name: Feral Spirit
glyphData.use: Increases the healing done by your Feral Spirits' Spirit Hunt by 40%.

glyphData.name: Fire Elemental Totem
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown and duration of your Fire Elemental Totem by 50%.

glyphData.name: Fire Nova
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of your Fire Nova spell by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Flame Shock
glyphData.use: When your Flame Shock deals damage, it heals you for 30% of the damage dealt.

glyphData.name: Frost Shock
glyphData.use: Decreases the cooldown incurred by your Frost Shock by 2 sec.

glyphData.name: Ghost Wolf
glyphData.use: While in Ghost Wolf form, you are less hindered by effects that would reduce movement speed.

glyphData.name: Grounding Totem
glyphData.use: Instead of absorbing a spell, your Grounding Totem reflects the next harmful spell back at its caster, but the cooldown of your Grounding Totem is increased by 20 sec.

glyphData.name: Healing Storm
glyphData.use: Each application of Maelstrom Weapon also increases your direct healing done by 20%.

glyphData.name: Healing Stream Totem
glyphData.use: When your Healing Stream Totem heals an ally, it also reduces their Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 10% for 6 sec.

glyphData.name: Healing Wave
glyphData.use: Your Healing Wave also heals you for 20% of the healing effect when you heal someone else.

glyphData.name: Hex
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Hex spell by 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Lightning Shield
glyphData.use: When your Lightning Shield is triggered, you take 10% less damage for 6 sec.

glyphData.name: Purge
glyphData.use: Your Purge dispels 1 additional Magic effect but has a 6 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Purging
glyphData.use: Successfully Purging a target now grants a stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

glyphData.name: Riptide
glyphData.use: Removes the cooldown of Riptide, but reduces the initial direct healing by 75%.

glyphData.name: Shamanistic Rage
glyphData.use: Activating your Shamanistic Rage ability also cleanses you of all dispellable harmful Magic effects.

glyphData.name: Spirit Walk
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Spirit Walk ability by 25%.

glyphData.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of your Spiritwalker's Grace by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Telluric Currents
glyphData.use: Causes your Lightning Bolt to restore X% of your mana when it strikes an enemy.

glyphData.name: Thunder
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Totemic Recall
glyphData.use: Causes your Totemic Recall ability to return the full mana cost of any recalled totems.

glyphData.name: Totemic Vigor
glyphData.use: Increases the health of your totems by 5% of your maximum health.

glyphData.name: Unstable Earth
glyphData.use: Causes your Earthquake spell to also reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 40% for 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Water Shield
glyphData.use: Increases the mana generated reactively by your Water Shield when you are attacked by 50%, but reduces the passive mana generation by 15%.

glyphData.name: Wind Shear
glyphData.use: Increases the school lockout duration of Wind Shear by 1 sec, but also increases the cooldown by 3 sec.

glyphData.name: Astral Fixation
glyphData.use: Astral Recall now takes you to your capital's Earthshrine.

glyphData.name: Astral Recall
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown of your Astral Recall spell by 5 minutes.

glyphData.name: Compy
glyphData.use: Your Hex now transforms enemies into a Compy.

glyphData.name: Deluge
glyphData.use: Your Chain Heal now has a watery appearance.

glyphData.name: Elemental Familiars
glyphData.use: Summons a random Fire, Water, or Nature familiar. Familiars of different types have a tendency to fight each other.

glyphData.name: Far Sight
glyphData.use: Your Far Sight spell may be used indoors.

glyphData.name: Flaming Serpent
glyphData.use: Your Searing Totem now resembles Vol'jin's Serpent Ward.

glyphData.name: Lava Lash
glyphData.use: Your Lava Lash ability no longer spreads Flame Shock to nearby targets.

glyphData.name: Lakestrider
glyphData.use: You automatically gain Water Walking while you are in Ghost Wolf form.

glyphData.name: Lingering Ancestors
glyphData.use: Resurrecting someone with Ancestral Spirit causes a ghostly ancestor to follow them around for a short time.

glyphData.name: Rain of Frogs
glyphData.use: You summon a rain storm of frogs at your targeted location.

glyphData.name: Spectral Wolf
glyphData.use: Alters the appearance of your Ghost Wolf transformation, causing it to resemble a large, spectral wolf.

glyphData.name: Spirit Raptors
glyphData.use: Your Spirit Wolves are replaced with Spirit Raptors.

glyphData.name: Spirit Wolf
glyphData.use: Ghost Wolf can be now be used while you are a ghost.

glyphData.name: Thunderstorm
glyphData.use: Removes the knockback effect from your Thunderstorm spell.

glyphData.name: Totemic Encirclement
glyphData.use: When you cast a totem spell, you also place unempowered totems for any elements that are not currently active. These totems have 5 health and produce no other effects.

glyphData.name: Conflagrate
glyphData.use: Conflagrate no longer requires Immolate to snare the target.

glyphData.name: Curse of Exhaustion
glyphData.use: Curse of Exhaustion now reduces the targets movement speed by 70%, lasts half as long and has a 10 second cooldown.

glyphData.name: Curse of the Elements
glyphData.use: Curse of the Elements hits 2 additional nearby targets.

glyphData.name: Dark Soul
glyphData.use: While off cooldown, your Dark Soul ability passively grants you 10% of the active effect, but reduces the power of Dark Soul by 10%.

glyphData.name: Demon Hunting
glyphData.use:
Requires Demonology.

Teaches you the ability Dark Apotheosis.

Dark Apotheosis:
You imbue yourself with demonic energies, reducing physical damage taken by 10%, reduces magic damage taken by 15%, and allows the use of various demonic abilities.

In addition, Soulshatter becomes Provocation which taunts your target, Twilight Ward becomes Fury Ward which will absorb all schools of damage, Shadow Bolt becomes Demonic Slash, and Fear becomes Sleep.

glyphData.name: Demon Training
glyphData.use:
Improves your demon's special abilities:

Your Imp's Firebolt cast time is reduced by 50% and fires in bursts of three.

Increases your Voidwalker's total armor by 10%.

Your Succubus's Seduction ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

When your Felhunter uses Devour Magic, you will also be healed for that amount.

Increases your Felguard's total health by 20%.

glyphData.name: Demonic Circle
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown on Demonic Circle by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Drain Life
glyphData.use: Increases the healing of your Drain Life by 30%.

glyphData.name: Ember Tap
glyphData.use: Ember Tap heals you for an additional 5% of your health, but the health is restored over 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Eternal Resolve
glyphData.use: Unending Resolve can no longer be activated, but passively provides 10% damage reduction from all sources.

glyphData.name: Everlasting Affliction
glyphData.use: Increases the duration of Unstable Affliction, Corruption, Doom, and Agony by 50%, and reduces their damage by 20%.

glyphData.name: Fear
glyphData.use: Your Fear causes the target to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphData.name: Havoc
glyphData.use: Havoc gains 3 additional charges, but the cooldown is increased by 35 seconds.

glyphData.name: Healthstone
glyphData.use: You receive 100% more healing from using a healthstone, but the health is restored over 10 sec.

glyphData.name: Imp Swarm
glyphData.use:
Teaches you the ability Imp Swarm.

Requires Demonology.

Imp Swarm:
Summons 4 Wild Imps from the Twisting Nether to attack the target.

The Wild Imps passive effect is disabled while Imp Swarm is on cooldown. Imp Swarm's cooldown is reduced by spell haste. Also increases Wild Imp's cooldown by 4 sec.

glyphData.name: Life Tap
glyphData.use:
Your Life Tap no longer consumes health, but instead absorbs healing received. This effect stacks.

The absorb lasts 30 sec.

glyphData.name: Shadowflame
glyphData.use: Your Shadowflame slow is increased to 10% but Hand of Gul'dan no longer has charges.

glyphData.name: Siphon Life
glyphData.use: Your spell will heal you for 0.5% of your maximum health when dealing damage.

glyphData.name: Soul Consumption
glyphData.use:
Affliction:
Your Drain Soul restores 15% of your total health after you kill a target that yields experience or honor.

Demonology: You restore 15% of your total health after you kill a target in Demon Form that yields experience or honor.

Destruction:
You restore 15% of your total health after you kill a target with Chaos Bolt that yields experience or honor.

glyphData.name: Soul Swap
glyphData.use: Your Soul Swap leaves your damage-over-time spells behind on the target you Soul Swapped from, but gives Soul Swap a 30 sec cooldown.

glyphData.name: Soulstone
glyphData.use: Players resurrected by Soulstone are returned to life with 100% health.

glyphData.name: Supernova
glyphData.use: When you are killed, all enemies within 8 yards take damage equal to 10% of your maximum health per Burning Ember held.

glyphData.name: Unstable Affliction
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of Unstable Affliction by 25%.

glyphData.name: Carrion Swarm
glyphData.use: Your Carrion Swarm no longer knocks targets back.

glyphData.name: Crimson Banish
glyphData.use: Your Banish spell is now red.

glyphData.name: Enslave Demon
glyphData.use: Reduces the cast time of your Enslave Demon spell by 50%.

glyphData.name: Eye of Kilrogg
glyphData.use:
Your Eye of Kilrogg is no longer stealthed and can now place your Demonic Circle. The casting Warlock must be within line of sight of the Eye of Kilrogg to place the Demonic Circle.

In addition, the movement speed of your Eye of Kilrogg is increased by 50% and allows it to fly in areas where flying mounts are enabled.

glyphData.name: Falling Meteor
glyphData.use: If you use Demonic Leap while falling, you slam into the ground rapidly and will not die from falling damage.

glyphData.name: Felguard
glyphData.use: Your Felguard will equip a random two-handed axe, sword or polearm from your backpack.

glyphData.name: Gateway Attunement
glyphData.use: Demonic Gateways will automatically activate when you step near them.

glyphData.name: Hand of Gul'dan
glyphData.use: Your Hand of Gul'dan can now be targeted at a location.

glyphData.name: Health Funnel
glyphData.use: Your Health Funnel instantly restores 15% of your demon's health, but has a 10 sec. cooldown.

glyphData.name: Nightmares
glyphData.use: Your Felsteed and Dreadsteed can cross water while running and leave a trail of flames.

glyphData.name: Shadow Bolt
glyphData.use: Splits your Shadow Bolt into three smaller attacks.

glyphData.name: Soulwell
glyphData.use: Your soulwell glows with an eerie light.

glyphData.name: Subtlety
glyphData.use: Your Soul Shards no longer display while out of combat.

glyphData.name: Unending Breath
glyphData.use: Increases the swim speed of targets affected by your Unending Breath spell by 20%.

glyphData.name: Verdant Spheres
glyphData.use: Your Soul Shards are transformed into Verdant Spheres.

glyphData.name: Blitz
glyphData.use: Your Charge also stuns an additional 2 nearby targets.

glyphData.name: Bloodthirst
glyphData.use: Increases the healing of Bloodthirst by 100%.

glyphData.name: Bull Rush
glyphData.use: Your Charge generates 15 additional Rage.

glyphData.name: Colossus Smash
glyphData.use: Your Colossus Smash also applies the Sunder Armor effect to your target.

glyphData.name: Death From Above
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown on Heroic Leap by 15 sec.

glyphData.name: Die by the Sword
glyphData.use: While Die by the Sword is active, using Overpower increases its duration by 1 sec and using Wild Strike increases its duration by 0.5 sec per use.

glyphData.name: Enraged Speed
glyphData.use: While Enraged, you move 20% faster.

glyphData.name: Executor
glyphData.use: Killing an enemy with Execute grants you 30 rage.

glyphData.name: Furious Sundering
glyphData.use: Reduces the cost of Sunder Armor by 100%.

glyphData.name: Gag Order
glyphData.use: Your Pummel and Heroic Throw also silence the target for 3 sec. Does not work against players.

glyphData.name: Hamstring
glyphData.use: When you spend Rage to apply Hamstring, the Rage cost of your next Hamstring is reduced by 100%.

glyphData.name: Heavy Repercussions
glyphData.use: While your Shield Block is active, your Shield Slam hits for an additional 50% damage.

glyphData.name: Hindering Strikes
glyphData.use: Your Heroic Strike and Cleave now also reduce the target's movement speed by 50% for 8 sec.

glyphData.name: Hoarse Voice
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown and Rage generation of your Battle and Commanding Shout by 50%.

glyphData.name: Hold the Line
glyphData.use: Improves the damage of your next Revenge by 50% following a successful parry.

glyphData.name: Incite
glyphData.use: Using Demoralizing Shout makes your next 3 Heroic Strike or Cleave abilities free.

glyphData.name: Long Charge
glyphData.use: Increases the range of your Charge ability by 5 yards.

glyphData.name: Mortal Strike
glyphData.use: When your Mortal Strike is affecting a target, healing effects on you are increased by 10%.

glyphData.name: Raging Wind
glyphData.use: Your Raging Blow hits increase the damage of your next Whirlwind by 10%.

glyphData.name: Recklessness
glyphData.use: Decreases the critical chance of Recklessness by 12% but increases its duration by 50%.

glyphData.name: Resonating Power
glyphData.use: Increases the damage and cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.

glyphData.name: Rude Interruption
glyphData.use: Successfully interrupting a spell with Pummel increases your damage by 6% for 20 sec.

glyphData.name: Shield Slam
glyphData.use: Your Shield Slam now dispels 1 magical effect.

glyphData.name: Shield Wall
glyphData.use: Shield Wall now reduces damage taken by an additional 20%, but its cooldown is increased by 2 min.

glyphData.name: Spell Reflection
glyphData.use: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by 5 sec.

glyphData.name: Sweeping Strikes
glyphData.use: When you hit a target with Sweeping Strikes, you gain 1 Rage.

glyphData.name: Unending Rage
glyphData.use: Increases your maximum Rage by 20.

glyphData.name: Victorious Throw
glyphData.use: Increases the range of Victory Rush and Impending Victory by 15 yards.

glyphData.name: Victory Rush
glyphData.use:
Increases the total healing provided by your Victory Rush by 50%.
This glyph has no effect if combined with the Impending Victory talent.

glyphData.name: Whirlwind
glyphData.use: Increases the radius of Whirlwind by 4 yards.

glyphData.name: Bloodcurdling Shout
glyphData.use: Your Battle Shout and Commanding Shout terrify small animals.

glyphData.name: Bloody Healing
glyphData.use: Increases the healing you receive from bandages by 20% while your Deep Wounds is active.

glyphData.name: Burning Anger
glyphData.use: You get so angry when Enraged that you catch on fire.

glyphData.name: Crow Feast
glyphData.use: Your Execute critical strikes summon a flock of carrion birds.

glyphData.name: Gushing Wound
glyphData.use: Your Deep Wounds are even bloodier than normal.

glyphData.name: Intimidating Shout
glyphData.use: All targets of your Intimidating Shout now tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphData.name: Mighty Victory
glyphData.use: When your Victory Rush or Impending Victory heal you, you grow slightly larger.

glyphData.name: Mystic Shout
glyphData.use: Your Battle Shout and Commanding Shout cause you to hover in the air for 1 sec.

glyphData.name: Blazing Trail
glyphData.use: Your Charge leaves a trail of fire in its wake. If you're going to Charge why not do it with some style?

glyphData.name: Raging Whirlwind
glyphData.use: Whirlwind gives you 15 rage over 6 sec, but for that time you no longer generate rage from autoattacks.

glyphData.name: Thunder Strike
glyphData.use: Your Thunder Clap visual includes a lightning strike.

glyphData.name: Subtle Defender
glyphData.use: Removes the threat generation bonus from Defensive Stance.

glyphData.name: Watchful Eye
glyphData.use: Intervene will now target the party or raid member with the lowest health within 25 yards.

glyphData.name: Weaponmaster
glyphData.use: Your Shout abilities cause the appearance of your weapon to change to that of a random weapon from your primary bag for 10 min.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Balance Druid in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Starsurge"}*. Be sure to consume any *{"skill": "Shooting Stars"}* procs instantly from hereon.
single: Cast *{"skill": "Starfall"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Incarnation"}* when entering an Eclipse.
Cast *{"skill": "Celestial Alignment"}* when exiting an Eclipse. Treat the buff duration as a *{"skill": "Lunar Eclipse"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Starsurge"}*. Be sure to consume any *{"skill": "Shooting Stars"}* procs instantly.
Cast *{"skill": "Sunfire"}* and then *{"skill": "Moonfire"}* when entering *{"skill": "Lunar Eclipse"}*. You can refresh them early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs.
Cast *{"skill": "Moonfire"}* and then *{"skill": "Sunfire"}* when entering *{"skill": "Solar Eclipse-boomy"}*. You can refresh them early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs.
Cast *{"skill": "Wrath-cata"}* during and after *{"skill": "Solar Eclipse-boomy"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Starfire"}* during and after *{"skill": "Lunar Eclipse"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Wild Mushroom"}* while moving if less than 3 are active. Cast *{"skill": "Wild Mushroom: Detonate"}* during the next *{"skill": "Solar Eclipse-boomy"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Moonfire"}* while moving if *{"skill": "Lunar Eclipse"}* is active, otherwise cast *{"skill": "Sunfire"}* unless either would overrite a powerful snapshot.
aoe: Proceed with single target rotation, but maintain your eclipsed dots on all targets.
Proceed with single target rotation, but maintain your eclipsed dots on all targets.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.
statPrios.stats: Hit = Exp = Spi (15%) > Haste (5273/3706 T14 4p) > Crit > Haste > Mastery

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Feral Druid in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Tiger's Fury"}*, *{"skill": "Berserk"}*, and any on-use effects.
single: Cast *{"skill": "Tiger's Fury"}* with less than 35 energy.
Cast *{"skill": "Berserk"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Faerie Fire"}* if assigned.
Maintain *{"skill": "Savage Roar"}*, ideally with 5 Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Touch"}* with *{"skill": "Predatory Swiftness"}* procs with 4+ Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Shred"}* with *{"skill": "Omen of Clarity"}* procs.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rip"}* at 5 Combo Points. *{"skill": "Ferocious Bite"}* will take care of this on targets below 20% HP.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rake"}*. You can refresh it early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs.
Cast *{"skill": "Thrash"}* with *{"skill": "Omen of Clarity"}* procs if it has less than 3 seconds remaining.
Cast *{"skill": "Ferocious Bite"}* at 5 Combo Points if it will not lead to downtime on previous steps.
Maintain *{"skill": "Thrash"}* if it will not lead to downtime on previous steps.
Cast *{"skill": "Shred"}* during *{"skill": "Berserk"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Mangle (Cat)"}*.
aoe: Maintain *{"skill": "Rip"}* on all targets during *{"skill": "Berserk"}* and *{"skill": "Bloodlust"}*.
Step 1 and 2 can also be done via *{"skill": "Soul Swap"}* from *{"skill": "Symbiosis"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Savage Roar"}*, ideally with 5 Combo Points.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Guardian Druid in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can tank at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
single: Cast *{"skill": "Berserk"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Faerie Fire"}* if assigned.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Touch"}* with *{"skill": "Dream of Cenarius"}* procs.
Cast *{"skill": "Savage Defense"}* proactively against physical attacks and *{"skill": "Frenzied Regeneration"}* reactively while low HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Maul"}* with *{"skill": "Tooth and Claw"}* procs or if you have excess Rage and will not delay a necessary *{"skill": "Savage Defense"}* or *{"skill": "Frenzied Regeneration"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Mangle (Bear)"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Thrash"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Lacerate"}* as your filler.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions (except Tailoring) and *{"wowBoss": "Mining"}* are very close in power.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Restoration Druid in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can heal at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
single: Maintain *{"skill": "Mastery: Harmony"}*.
Maintain 3 stacks of *{"skill": "Lifebloom"}* on the active Tank. Refreshed by *{"skill": "Healing Touch"}*, *{"skill": "Regrowth"}*, and *{"skill": "Nourish"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rejuvenation"}* on the Tank(s).
Cast *{"skill": "Wild Growth"}* for AoE healing. You should use it after *{"skill": "Swiftmend"}* for *{"skill": "Soul of the Forest"}* whenever possible.
Maintain *{"skill": "Efflorescence"}* on the raid for AoE healing with *{"skill": "Wild Mushroom"}* due to *{"consume": "Glyph of Efflorescence"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rejuvenation"}* on the raid for AoE healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Wild Mushroom: Bloom"}* for AoE healing. Only place *{"skill": "Wild Mushroom"}* to refresh *{"skill": "Efflorescence"}* or during low damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Touch"}* with *{"skill": "Nature's Swiftness"}* for an instant emergency heal.
Cast *{"skill": "Swiftmend"}* for an instant heal, otherwise save it for before *{"skill": "Wild Growth"}* and *{"skill": "Tranquility"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Touch"}* during high damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Nourish"}* as your filler during low damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Regrowth"}* as a quick emergency heal.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Beast Mastery Hunter in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Bestial Wrath"}*, *{"skill": "Rapid Fire"}*, *{"skill": "Rabid"}*, *{"skill": "Kill Command"}*, and any on-use effects.
single: Maintain *{"skill": "Hunter's Mark"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Kill Command"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Serpent Sting"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Cobra Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Stampede-v2"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Bestial Wrath"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rapid Fire"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rabid"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Dire Beast"}*. You can briefly delay this if *{"skill": "Bestial Wrath"}* is about to come off cooldown.
Cast *{"skill": "Kill Shot"}* on targets below 20% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Kill Command"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Glaive Toss"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Focus Fire"}* at 5 pet stacks of *{"skill": "Frenzy"}*. You can briefly delay this if *{"skill": "Bestial Wrath"}* is about to come off cooldown.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Shot"}* when above 70 Focus. Make sure doing this does not delay a previous step.
Cast *{"skill": "Cobra Shot"}* to generate Focus.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.
minor_glyphs: Standard: *{"consume": "Aspect of the Pack"}*, *{"consume": "Aspect of the Cheetah"}*, *{"consume": "Revive Pet"}*

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Marksmanship Hunter in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Pre-cast *{"skill": "Explosive Trap"}* 24+ seconds before the pull.
Cast *{"skill": "Stampede-v2"}* and *{"skill": "Rabid"}*, and any on-use effects.
single: Maintain *{"skill": "Hunter's Mark"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Chimera Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Stampede-v2"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rapid Fire"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rabid"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Fervor"}* with low Focus.
Cast *{"skill": "A Murder of Crows"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Serpent Sting"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Chimera Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Chimera Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Glaive Toss"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Steady Shot"}* twice in a row if there is less than 4 seconds left on *{"skill": "Careful Aim"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Aimed Shot"}* on targets above 80% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Kill Shot"}* on targets below 20% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Aimed Shot"}* with 3 stacks of *{"skill": "Master Marksman"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Shot"}* when above 70 Focus. Make sure doing this does not delay a previous step.
Cast *{"skill": "Steady Shot"}* to generate Focus.
aoe: Proceed with single target rotation, but use *{"skill": "Multi-Shot"}* instead of *{"skill": "Arcane Shot"}*.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.
minor_glyphs: Standard: *{"consume": "Aspect of the Pack"}*, *{"consume": "Aspect of the Cheetah"}*, *{"consume": "Revive Pet"}*

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Survival Hunter in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Pre-cast *{"skill": "Explosive Trap"}* 24+ seconds before the pull.
Cast *{"skill": "Stampede-v2"}* and *{"skill": "Rabid"}*, and any on-use effects.
single: Maintain *{"skill": "Hunter's Mark"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Explosive Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Stampede-v2"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rapid Fire"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Rabid"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Fervor"}* with low Focus.
Cast *{"skill": "A Murder of Crows"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Glaive Toss"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Explosive Shot"}*. Be sure to consume any *{"skill": "Lock and Load"}* procs instantly.
Maintain *{"skill": "Serpent Sting"}*. This is refreshed by *{"skill": "Cobra Shot"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Kill Shot"}* on targets below 20% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Black Arrow"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Shot"}* when above 70 Focus. Make sure doing this does not delay a previous step.
Cast *{"skill": "Ice Trap"}* if there are rootable adds and *{"skill": "Lock and Load"}* is off its internal cooldown.
Cast *{"skill": "Cobra Shot"}* to generate Focus.
aoe: Maintain *{"skill": "Serpent Sting"}* on all targets with *{"skill": "Multi-Shot"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Serpent Sting"}* on all targets with *{"skill": "Multi-Shot"}*.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.
minor_glyphs: Standard: *{"consume": "Aspect of the Pack"}*, *{"consume": "Aspect of the Cheetah"}*, *{"consume": "Revive Pet"}*

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Arcane Mage in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Blast"}* until you have 4 stacks of Arcane Charge.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Power"}* and any on-use effects.
single: Use *{"skill": "Frost Armor"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Mirror Image"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Power"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Alter Time"}* with 4 stacks of Arcane Charge and during *{"skill": "Arcane Power"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rune of Power"}* and stand on it.
Maintain *{"skill": "Living Bomb"}*. You can refresh it early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Missiles"}* at 4 stacks of Arcane Charge.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Barrage"}* at 4 stacks of Arcane Charge.
Cast *{"skill": "Arcane Blast"}* as your filler.
Use *{"skill": "Ice Floes"}* to cast while moving.

Cast *{"skill": "Inferno Blast"}* when *{"skill": "Heating Up"}* procs.
Cast *{"skill": "Fireball"}* as your filler.
Cast *{"skill": "Scorch"}* while moving.

Maintain instant *{"skill": "Pyroblast"}* on all targets if not stacked, otherwise spread dots with *{"skill": "Inferno Blast"}*.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Holy Paladin in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can heal at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
single: Use *{"skill": "Seal of Insight"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Beacon of Light"}* on the active Tank.
Cast *{"skill": "Light's Hammer"}* to AoE heal a stacked group.
AoE Rotation:
Cast *{"skill": "Judgment"}* to generate 1 Holy Power and proc *{"skill": "Selfless Healer"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Radiance"}* to generate 1 Holy Power and proc *{"skill": "Daybreak"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Shock"}* to generate 1 Holy Power.
Cast *{"skill": "Light of Dawn"}* at 3 Holy Power.
Single Target / Spot Healing Priority:
Cast *{"skill": "Word of Glory"}* to consume Holy Power.
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Shock"}* to generate 1 Holy Power.
Cast *{"skill": "Crusader Strike"}* to generate Holy Power.
Cast *{"skill": "Divine Light"}* during high damage on your *{"skill": "Beacon of Light"}* target to generate Holy Power.
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Light"}* during low/moderate damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Flash of Light"}* as a quick emergency heal.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions are very close in power.
glyphs: Standard: *{"consume": "Hand of Sacrifice"}*, *{"consume": "Divinity"}*, *{"consume": "Protector of the Innocent"}*

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Protection Paladin in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can tank at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Holy Avenger"}*, *{"skill": "Avenging Wrath"}*, and any on-use effects.

Use *{"skill": "Seal of Insight"}* in most situations and *{"skill": "Seal of Truth"}* strictly for damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Avenging Wrath"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Avenger"}*.

Cast *{"skill": "Shield of the Righteous"}* or *{"skill": "Eternal Flame"}* to consume Holy Power (both off GCD). You should prioritize *{"skill": "Shield of the Righteous"}* unless the healing from *{"skill": "Eternal Flame"}* would be more benefitial. Against mostly magic damage, prioritize *{"skill": "Eternal Flame"}* instead.
Cast *{"skill": "Crusader Strike"}*. The goal is to always use 2 other skills in between each cast.
Cast *{"skill": "Judgment"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Avenger's Shield"}*. Watch out for *{"skill": "Grand Crusader"}* procs.
Cast *{"skill": "Light's Hammer"}* or *{"skill": "Execution Sentence"}*. The latter will snapshot buffs (GoAK stacks, AW, trinkets, etc).
Cast *{"skill": "Holy Wrath-cata"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Hammer of Wrath-mop"}* on targets below 20% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Consecration"}*.
aoe: Cast *{"skill": "Hammer of the Righteous"}* instead of *{"skill": "Crusader Strike"}*.
Proceed with single target rotation, but *{"skill": "Light's Hammer"}* and *{"skill": "Consecration"}* move up in the priority order.
professions: The rest of the crafting professions (except Tailoring) and *{"wowBoss": "Mining"}* are very close in power.

Cast *{"skill": "Prayer of Mending"}* for AoE healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Penance"}* for single target healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Prayer of Healing"}* for AoE healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Greater Heal"}* for single target healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Flash Heal"}* or *{"skill": "Binding Heal"}* for a quick emergency heal.

Cast *{"skill": "Flash Heal"}* with *{"skill": "From Darkness, Comes Light"}* procs.

Cast *{"skill": "Cascade"}* for AoE healing.

Maintain *{"skill": "Renew"}* on the raid for AoE healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Prayer of Healing"}* for AoE healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Greater Heal"}* for single target healing.
Cast *{"skill": "Heal"}* as your filler during low damage.
Cast *{"skill": "Flash Heal"}* or *{"skill": "Binding Heal"}* for a quick emergency heal.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Assassination Rogue in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.

Cast *{"skill": "Vendetta"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Shadow Blades"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Redirect"}* when switching targets with active Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Vanish"}* at low Energy, followed by *{"skill": "Tricks of the Trade"}* (Off GCD) and either *{"skill": "Mutilate"}* or *{"skill": "Dispatch"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Preparation-cata"}* to reset the cooldown of *{"skill": "Vanish"}*.

Cast *{"skill": "Dispatch"}* on enemies below 35% HP or with *{"skill": "Blindside"}* procs.

Use *{"skill": "Killing Spree"}* at low Energy and when *{"skill": "Adrenaline Rush"}* and *{"skill": "Shadow Blades"}* are not active.
Cast *{"skill": "Redirect"}* when switching targets with active Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Vanish"}* at low Energy, followed by *{"skill": "Tricks of the Trade"}* (Off GCD) and *{"skill": "Ambush"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Preparation-cata"}* to reset the cooldown of *{"skill": "Vanish"}*.

opener: Pre-pot *{"consume": "Potion of the Tol'vir"}* and go into *{"skill": "Stealth"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Shadow Blades"}* and any on-use effects.

Proceed with single target rotation, but make sure to *{"skill": "Vanish"}* *{"skill": "Ambush"}* and then *{"skill": "Preparation-cata"}* *{"skill": "Vanish"}* *{"skill": "Ambush"}* right as *{"skill": "Find Weakness"}* falls.

Cast *{"skill": "Shadow Blades"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Redirect"}* when switching targets with active Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Premeditation"}* in *{"skill": "Stealth"}* or during *{"skill": "Shadow Dance"}* if below 4 Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Ambush"}* in *{"skill": "Stealth"}* or during *{"skill": "Shadow Dance"}* if below 5 Combo Points or 3 *{"skill": "Anticipation"}* charges.
Cast *{"skill": "Shadow Dance"}* at 75+ Energy if *{"skill": "Find Weakness"}* is not active.

Cast *{"skill": "Preparation-cata"}* to reset the cooldown of *{"skill": "Vanish"}*.
Maintain *{"skill": "Slice and Dice"}* at 5 Combo Points.
Maintain *{"skill": "Rupture"}* at 5 Combo Points.
Cast *{"skill": "Eviscerate"}* at 5 Combo Points.
Maintain *{"skill": "Hemorrhage"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Backstab"}* to generate Combo Points or *{"skill": "Hemorrhage"}* if you cannot hit from behind.
Cast *{"skill": "Tricks of the Trade"}*.
aoe: Maintain *{"skill": "Rupture"}* at 5 Combo Points on both targets.
Maintain *{"skill": "Crimson Tempest"}* at 5 Combo Points on both targets.
Proceed with your single target rotation.
Proceed with your single target rotation, but use *{"skill": "Fan of Knives"}* instead of *{"skill": "Backstab"}* and *{"skill": "Hemorrhage"}*.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Elemental Shaman in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
single: Use *{"skill": "Flametongue Weapon"}*.
Use *{"skill": "Lightning Shield"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Stormlash Totem"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Fire Elemental Totem"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Ascendance"}* if *{"skill": "Flame Shock"}* has 15+ seconds remaining, *{"skill": "Lava Burst"}* is on cooldown, and *{"skill": "Elemental Blast"}* is active.
Maintain *{"skill": "Flame Shock"}*. You can refresh it early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs.
Cast *{"skill": "Lava Burst"}*. Be sure to consume any *{"skill": "Lava Surge"}* procs instantly.
Cast *{"skill": "Elemental Blast"}*. You can delay this if *{"skill": "Ascendance"}* is about to come off cooldown.
Cast *{"skill": "Earth Shock"}* when you have 6-7 *{"skill": "Lightning Shield"}* charges.
Cast *{"skill": "Earth Elemental Totem"}* if *{"skill": "Fire Elemental Totem"}* is not active.
Maintain *{"skill": "Searing Totem"}* if *{"skill": "Fire Elemental Totem"}* is not active.
Cast *{"skill": "Lightning Bolt"}* as your filler.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Restoration Shaman in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can heal at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
single: Use *{"skill": "Earthliving Weapon"}*.
Use *{"skill": "Water Shield"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Ancestral Swiftness-cata"}* with *{"skill": "Healing Wave"}* or *{"skill": "Chain Heal"}* for emergency instant heals.
Cast *{"skill": "Spiritwalker's Grace"}* if you need to heal on the move.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Stream Totem"}*.

Maintain *{"skill": "Reinforce"}* from *{"skill": "Earth Elemental Totem"}* due to *{"skill": "Primal Elementalist"}*. You can also use *{"skill": "Empower"}* from *{"skill": "Fire Elemental Totem"}* for more healing but you will lose out on damage.

Maintain *{"skill": "Riptide"}* on the Tank(s). You should also use this to spot heal the raid.
Maintain *{"skill": "Healing Rain"}*. Extended by *{"skill": "Conductivity"}*. Cast *{"skill": "Unleash Elements"}* before it to benefit from the *{"skill": "Unleash Life"}* buff.
Cast *{"skill": "Chain Heal"}* for AoE healing, preferably on a target with *{"skill": "Riptide"}*.
Cast *{"skill": "Healing Wave"}* or *{"skill": "Greater Healing Wave"}* for single target healing, ideally with *{"skill": "Tidal Waves"}* stacks.

statPrios.general: Welcome to the PvE Class Guide for Affliction Warlock in Mist of Pandaria Classic. We'll look at the rotation and opener, best talent build, stat priority, consumables, and more so that you can dps at a high level in raids, dungeons, and challenge modes.
opener: Cast *{"skill": "Dark Soul: Misery"}* and any on-use effects.
Channel *{"skill": "Malefic Grasp"}* until you get your procs (trinkets, enchants, etc).

Cast *{"skill": "Dark Soul: Misery"}*.

Maintain *{"skill": "Agony"}*, *{"skill": "Unstable Affliction"}*, and *{"skill": "Corruption"}*. You can refresh them early to snapshot powerful procs or buffs, otherwise wait until less than half their base duration remains. You usually do this by manually recasting them but if there's a small window of procs, you can use *{"skill": "Soulburn"}* and *{"skill": "Soul Swap"}* to refresh them all instantly.
Maintain *{"skill": "Haunt"}* if your dots have a strong snapshot (cds, procs, etc).
Cast *{"skill": "Haunt"}* with 4 Soul Shards.
Cast *{"skill": "Drain Soul"}* on targets below 20% HP.
Cast *{"skill": "Life Tap"}* for mana, ideally during downtime or movement.
Cast *{"skill": "Malefic Grasp"}* as your filler.

statPrios.stats: Hit = Exp (15%) > Haste (9778/13737) > Mastery > Haste > Crit
